reviews.title: Awesome! 😊
reviews.review_text: This is awesome! It's so easy to adjust the height %26 the angle! I set it in front of me on the couch %26 then put my Bible or my latest mystery book on it. It really helps me to sit more upright, which my chiropractor likes. And it eliminates any strain on my arms or hands from holding a heavy book up. It was completely assembled whit arrived, so I appreciate that there was nothing to put together. I'm enjoying this very much %26 highly recommend it. 😊
This is an excellent lap desk! The angle is adjustable, as well as the height and needs no assembling or instructions! I am well pleased and happy to give this recommendation!

reviews.review_text: Iike it OK. Ihave a 12.4" tablet with a drop protective case. with a hand loop onthe back. I have to turn the stops at bottom bertial to keep tablet gron sliding off. My cell phone has a case and doesn't fit the slot at top. Without cases it should work great. I think it is a good balue for the money.

reviews.title: Good size but has its quirks
reviews.review_text: It didn't have the drawer which is a bummer. Also, the slots for phones and tablets, are too shallow. My phone kept faceplanting and I'm scared it will bust my screen so that's a no for me. It was the same for my tablet. The size of the tray is good. I am a plus-size woman and it fits well over my legs. I love the height adjustment but it's hard to tilt without lifting the whole table to do it. While using in bed, It does fall toward me when my laptop is on it.

Purchased to use when I have surgery. I wanted something adjustable that would fit between the recliner arms. This tray is sturdy and adjustable. However, there were no instructions on how to adjust the legs or lock them in place. I was able to figure out how to raise and lock the legs in place fairly quickly. It took some time to figure out how to rotate the legs of the easel feature. When used as a tray it is a little too tall with the legs at the lowest position.

is kind of expensive for what it is. It's sturdy enough and even though theres no "lock" on the legs they stay open or close. For some reason mine have a loose screw INSIDE one of the legs tube so it rattles when I move it. Overall it works, but should be cheaper.

reviews.title: Nothing but frustration and bruises
reviews.review_text: FIRST LOOK: No instructions, but the assembly seems simple enough. STRIKE 1: One of the plastic blocks to keep things from sliding off when you have the table portion angled is too large to slide into the hole like the other one it came with %26 is also filthy like coffee was spilled , staining it- and looks used. Was this a defective returned product that they decided to re-sell without checking the functionality of it? STRIKE 2: You cannot have the table angled if you're sitting on a bed or couch because the entire table becomes top-heavy %26 falls towards you. I had no intention of sitting on the floor to use this, so this issue is frustrating. STRIKE 3: The plastic drawer is essentially useless . It doesn't slide well, requiring quite a bit of force to open and close. You can already see plastic shavings spiraling off when you try to use it %26 I only tested it out for setup. It wouldn't last long if I tried to use it regularly- or occasionally for that matter. STRIKE 4: One of the spring-loaded clips for height adjustment won't stay locked in the place I want it. Also- I smacked my thumbs MULTIPLE times on the other clip (for adjusting angle) when I was trying to get it to lock in like the other side does. No luck, so it won't allow proper height adjustment either. Frustrated by how often I hurt my thumbs (as mentioned above), as well as smacking my knees repeatedly when trying to flip it over to adjust it when upright wasn't working … the number of injuries/bumps %26 bruises is absolutely ridiculous! I could get better functionality from a cardboard box with a couple books inside to weigh it down: at least with that setup it wouldn't be top-heavy and I wouldn't have to worry about it falling towards me. I suppose that it's my fault for believing that this cheaper option could be useful at all. Returning ASAP %26 buying the more expensive option %26 hoping that it's more functional. Otherwise, that cardboard box idea is looking even more appealing.

I was hoping this table would allow me to be on a laptop and video calls at the same time.

reviews.title: Nice product, would recommend
reviews.review_text: Overall not a bad product. It suits my needs. I love that you can adjust the tray position unlike some other tablet holders where the angle is just off for me. I will say that I was super excited about the leg height being adjustable however they don't really “lock” in place. They've never failed on me, but you really don't have to push the button to be able to adjust them. It's almost like the lock hole is just a little too big. I can raise the height without having to push the button but, on the flip side, you will have to push them to lower it. I would still recommend it. Good product for the price.

reviews.title: Best Choice 6 Quart Enamel Cast-Iron Dutch Oven
reviews.review_text: After looking for a better mouse trap, I found it here. My 4qt crock pot just wasn't large enough for the family to enjoy leftovers the next day. I have used my new dutch oven for beef stews and venison chili and it makes it so easy. I prep the dinner into the pot, then put it it the oven at 225f for 6-8 hours slow cook and the beef is very tender. Family loves it. Also easy to clean.

reviews.title: Great Dutch Oven.
reviews.review_text: The 6-qt. Dutch Oven is very attractive, with large handles that are easy to grasp. Its blue exterior and cream interior enameling is uniform in color and coverage. The lid fits tightly and its large handle is sturdy, well-attached and also easy to grasp. The pot is heavy and holds the heat well, with no apparent hot spots. All in all, an excellent pot!! Highly recommended.

Love the deep burgundy/wine color!! Love the cast iron enamel for cooking!! So easy to clean. No scratches so far. I use it a lot. The gold knob on the lid is not my favorite quality. Also, it is very heavy, caution if your not a strong person. No problem for me but my mom can't lift it when we cook together. I would buy a smaller matching one but only found a larger one available.

Its extremely heavy, which I expected but this one is REALLY heavy. It also chips really easy. I tend to think Im a careful person who takes care of my stuff, however, the lid on the edge chipped the 1st time I washed it. Otherwise its nice to have for the oven cooking.

Quality is good but it is extremely heavy. When cookware is full of food, I can barely lift it. Wanted to replace my bean pot but it is way too heavy for me. Since I have used it, I am sure they will not take it back.

I got the wrong color I do not like the blue I ordered the black one but that's okay I'll use the blue one for my outside grill other than that and it taking forever to get here because of FedEx is a really great product and I love cooking with the porcelain cast iron Dutch ovens
It chipped almost immediately in a few places on the outside and inside. very disappointed. It does heat well though. I would not recommend this item.

reviews.title: Love the Pot but not the several tiny paint holes!
reviews.review_text: I used this for the first time to make Taco Soup. I have noticed several tiny bubbles/little holes on the surface of both the pot and the lid. Has anyone else had this issue? Does this, in any way, shape or form affect the cooking? I'm very disappointed to see these as I really like this Dutch Oven and I did quite a lot of research before I chose this one.

It's a waste for such a high price. I thought when I heard popping, I looked to see what it was, thinking it was the stove not it wasn't. First time using it food stuck to the bottom. It was suppose to be non-stick, so I washed it. Nothing burned mind you. Second time of use, I cooked Fettuccine Alfredo. Had plenty of liquid but I kept feeling something catching a at the bottom. When everything was finished, I kept seeing blackish bits through the food but I thought it was from the ingredients. Well, time for washing and the entire bottom is black with pasta noodles and broccoli that burned. This time it wouldn't come out. I soaked this pot for 2 days. IT STILL DOESN'T COME OUT. Now, I'm trying to boil the bits out, if this doesn't work, the not is ruined after 2 uses. I cannot believe this.

The beef stew was stove top for browning then the oven, came out great. I hope it holds up, which I expect it to.

I shared with a few neighbors and the were impressed that it was so delicious. Although it's a little heavy (18lbs) by it's self and probably 25lbs full with the corned beef,water and other ingredients. I definitely recommend this to anyone who needs to get their cook on.

reviews.title: The very best choice
reviews.review_text: It is the Best Choice product! It came from across the country and I was praying it would arrive Undamaged but I worried needlessly! The packaging was superb! It was wrapped snuggly inside three boxes to protect it! I love the large side handles! It will be so easy to grasp with my oven gloves. I have a 12qt Dutch oven and the handles are smaller than this one. Kudos to whom ever designed it with large handles.

reviews.title: One Dutch Oven Turned to Four!
reviews.review_text: I at first bought one Dutch Oven to see what it was like because I couldn't believe the reasonable price it was selling for. When it arrived, I lifted approximately over 20lbs of well constructed cast iron material sealed in a bubbleless, smooth finish. The lid had a rubber seal around the top allowing a quiet close. Two durable handles made lifting easy. Cooking was fantastic!!! No sticking, no burning, steam stayed within!! Cleanup was AMAZINGLY easy. I purchased an additional two as gifts and a second for myself. I would definitely recommend this oven to others! BCP best purchase again!! JW
Only thing it is very heavy. I bake my sourdough bread in it and it's lovely

I made a stew as our first meal in it, and it was easy and satisfying to brown meat in the pot at a high temperature without burning, then simmer at a lower temperature to allow the meat to tenderize after adding the rest of the ingredients.

reviews.title: Striking appearance on this cast-iron
reviews.review_text: Striking appearance on this cast-iron enamel 6qt Dutch oven. I also purchased same Dutch oven pot for my sister. She, a couple months, had said she had asked me about this style of pot. After receiving my my Dutch oven pot, I ordered her the same unit. I think she'll like. It's fun to surprise sisters.

reviews.title: Gorgeous blue Dutch oven. Made in China
reviews.review_text: I have the blue dutch oven. It is beautiful. It has a creamy enameled coating inside. I have not used it to cook yet. I have no doubt that it will cook perfectly and with no issues. It has a brushed metal knob on the lid. The only reason I gave this 4 stars is because it is made in China and that information was not included on the website description. I had a chat conversation from a very helpful man and he was honest and answered all of my questions. I asked if all of the BCP items are made in China and he said, yes. He said some things are assembled in the USA. Since this is a cast iron Dutch oven, it is 100% made in China. I'm disappointed that BCP doesn't include this information on the website descriptions. I noticed there are several questions on the Dutch oven asking where it is made and there are no answers.I prefer to buy products made in the USA. I do hope this review makes it to the website. If not, I will no longer buy from BCP. The Dutch oven is a gorgeous blue color.

reviews.title: Great quality. Did not burn.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I used this for the first time as a deep fryer. I was very impressed! The pot kept a consistent temperature and it didn't burn the excess flour that settles at the bottom. The food had a great taste! I tend to go heavier on the seasonings and it sometimes will have a burnt taste due to the high temperatures. Not with this pot! The deep fry results were impeccable! I love my pot, and thinking about purchasing another for my sister who also loves to cook. Not to mention the color was a vibrant red. I can't wait to cook my beef stew very soon.

reviews.title: Wonderful, handsome, pot!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've long wanted a nice heavy Dutch-oven like this and am happily enjoying finally having one in my kitchen. Whole roasted chicken, as well as, curried chicken and veggies(photo), pasta sauce, pasta, etc., etc., have all turned out well. Cleaning is easy since the non-stick surface is perfection! I've already sent one to my son who is a chef. “Terrific” was his review :)

reviews.title: Great Quality Dutch Oven
reviews.review_text: This 6 qt. Dutch oven is perfect for making chili while camping. We used it over the campfire and it worked great. The pot discolored a little from the direct flame but that was to be expected as close to the fire as we got it. It is very good quality, very durable and the price was reasonable for cast-iron. I also love the blue color that I purchased. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a Dutch oven. I also love BCP's customer service. It is so hard to find a company that values their customers like BCP does!

reviews.title: Chipped after a few months of light use :(
reviews.review_text: When I received this as a gift for christmas last year, i was thrilled! It was heavy and felt like good quality, I thought it would be my workhorse. I have used it for maybe a dozen dishes in total: veggie stock, homemade chili, risotto, and some breads to name a few. Last night I made risotto and sadly watched as a huge chip flaked off the bottom of the pot. I'm super bummed because I loved the color and feel of this product before it chipped and became unusable. For reference i was always using wooden or silicone cooking tools on this dutch oven, and I didn't use it above the heat recommended. hopefully I will find a replacement that doesn't chip.

reviews.title: Better than name brand
reviews.review_text: Top quality - equally as nice as the really expensive name brand. My sister will love the beautiful red finish and the size and lines are for her family. She has been wanting a Dutch oven for a long time so she will be very surprised that she is getting one for Christmas.

reviews.title: My “new” go to pot!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This has quickly become my go to for soups, stews, and roasting meat in the oven. It is very sturdy, large enough to hold a 5lb. roast, and comes in several cute colors!!! I love it so much, I'm now giving them as gifts!!

reviews.title: Heavy and beautiful
reviews.review_text: I'm very pleased with this purchase. It is definitely heavy, especially when it's full of food, so keep that in mind. I purchased the red color and it is perfect in my kitchen. The glazed finish makes clean up a breeze, and also no long preseasoning process. The only thing I don't really like (and it's minor) the knob on the lid sticks up pretty high, so I have to lower my oven rack to get it to fit in my oven- or slide the pot in on one side. I generally keep my top rack in the center, but with the center heating element the pot is too tall for that position.

reviews.title: Amazing Kitchen Essential!
reviews.review_text: This dutch oven is amazing and cooks superbly! I have been huntinting for the ideal dutch oven on a budget! Love the porcelain finish! Other dutch ovens I remember at it's price point didn't the beutiful white smooth interior but a black one (At least one had it not only black, but rough and not-so-smooth.)! Thr lid fits very well on top and has those spikes that help it "rain" moisture to help make dishes mouthwateringly delicious! The color I got was a pretty blue that looks good in our kitchen. I love that it's oven safe up to 480° F which is I imagine is perfect for virtually every recipe of no-knead bread recipe out there. Besides this, there were dutch ovens that were up to 500°, but I don't remember any of them having all the other desired features besides high temperature at it's price point! Move over LeCreuset! From what I've seen, this trumps all the other enameled dutch ovens at or below it's price range whether it be The Lodge, Tramortina (Cheaper, had a whopping 6.5 quart capacity, and a color similar to mine, but had a measly 450° Oven Safe Temp and small handles!), Amazon Basics (Oven safe to only 400°, are you for real?!), or Uno Casa. The only other oven that I remember that seemed to compete with it was the Puricon, which was oven safe up to a whopping 540°! However, it was only 5 1/2 quarts compared to my 6 quart Best Choice! In the end I preferred 1/2 quart more of capacity than the super high temperature (What recipe is there out there that requires such a high heat tolerance?!)! We've already used it to cook mexican pork cooked with tomato and onion as well as potatos and turned out amazing! This will become our little kitchen workhorse that will last us for years, probably decades to come (I can just feel it!)! I wouldn't be surprised if it gets passed down through the family generation after generation! Move over LeCreuset and don't get too cocky! There's a new kid in town and his name is Best Choice! He brings quality and dependance at a much lower price!

Take months to work when growing from the follicle. So you won't see anything for at a minimum of three months for new growth. Then the time it takes to grow longer on top of that. So you have to stay with it for months. Worst of all if you stop using it all those months of regrowing stop and you lose it all again. So to keep it there you literally have to use it for life or you're just wasting time and money.

reviews.title: Much better than the ointment
reviews.review_text: No more scalp scabs that were caused by the ointment, which I could only use once a day to minimize the scabs. The foam now allows me to use it twice a day as recommended. Also, no more very messy oil residues because the foam now dries quickly in your hair. I had stopped the ointment, but then my hair began to fall out 2 months later, so this means the ointment at 1X a day was actually working so now 2X daily with the foam should be much more effective.

reviews.title: Please make sure you stock the shelf properly
reviews.review_text: The only dislike is that I had to order it online because it wasn't on the shelf. The space was filled with a similar product, but the wrong product. For days I returned to see the shelf was not filled with this product because another foam made by Rogaine was in its place, so I assume the stockers assume its full and put the rest in top stock or something.

reviews.title: It works for hair loss
reviews.review_text: Family history of androgenetic alopecia. I have used this product several times in the past and had great results maintaining what I had plus new hair growth. However, if you stop using using the product, your new hair growth will fall out over time. Use shampoos and conditioners without sulfates or parabens, which hampers regrowth and clogs hair follicles.
Fair price and one of the few places that offers this product. I have used it for years and it is a high quality product compared to other resellers I have tried.

reviews.title: Works to stop hair loss
reviews.review_text: Minoxidil works, it takes time though! I'm a woman with thin hair and I saw a difference after 2 months and a half. It won't grow your hair back but it will stop hair from falling. The only reason why I didn't give it 5 stars is because it dries out the scalp and can cause dandruff due to the alcohol in the formulation. This is a small con in exchange for the ease of use of the liquid version though. If you want to avoid the dandruff and don't care much about taking a little longer when applying, the mousse version also works just as well.

The active drug is fine, but the foam itself is a little odd: you have to REALLY put some pressure on the foam to stick it to the scalp, let alone absorb into the skin... and if you're not already very bald (I'm not), your existing hair makes that nearly impossible. I'd think the liquid variety might work better in this case.

reviews.title: Doesn't foam up properly
reviews.review_text: I have used three cans of this, and it does not foam up like the brand name. I hesitated to review, thinking it was a defective can, but I am now using my third can in 6 weeks, when each is supposed to be for a month each can. The foam melts almost immediately, making it hard to properly apply, leading to a lot of waste. Now, since it is cheaper, it probably is on par with the brand name for overall cost, which lasts longer. But if I am going to use a generic brand, and it ends up costing the same and is more difficult to use, I may as well pay more for the brand name which lasts longer. Equate brands are usually great, not so in this case, it is an inferior product.
Because I haven't received it. Next day delivery was promised and now 2 days later, still no updates... I'm sure you took my money though! That was the easy part for you.. what a crock of ********!
first of all, I got it as an unwanted substitution. the aerosol device stopped working and ask the liquid is inside without a possibility to get it out. a waste of resources and money.

reviews.title: You can use this if you're a female.
reviews.review_text: I can't really say one way or another how I feel about this product as I've only been using it for one month. I have not noticed any new hair growth. I have read that it can take 3 to 6 months before minoxidil starts working. This product is not greasy as other Minoxidil liquids can be. This says on the box that this is minoxidil for men, and if you read the Instruction paper inside the box it'll say that you should not use this if you are a woman. That is complete crap. I have confirmed with my dermatologist that minoxidil 5% for men is the exact same 5% for women. It's a marketing scheme to get women to purchase minoxidil for women, but it's at a more expensive price. If you are a woman considering using minoxidil, you are completely allowed to use minoxidil for men. It's the exact same thing as minoxidil for women. Don't get scared off because of that. I can add more to my review if I start noticing hair growth in the next few months. I am really keeping my fingers crossed that this works

I've been using this for about 20 years, was bald on top and the sides. Was told by doctor to try it sometimes it will work. It works for me. Once you start using this you have to continue. It's easy to use I squirt a little on each side and the top.

reviews.title: women can use too
reviews.review_text: I did some research no reason women cannot use the mens version it's just a way for them to make more money! Now in my 40's my hair thinned out so bad on top can see my scalp so gonna use this for a few more months to see if it thickens back up again. The foam seems to be easier to apply.

reviews.title: Hope it works!
reviews.review_text: Too soon to know if it works. It's being combined with hair recovery protocol consisting of 1mg finasteride daily. Finasteride at 1 yr mark shows it stopped the hair loss. Hoping the minoxidil grows it back where there's diffuse thinning on top. The foam is much better than the liquid dropper formula. Easy to apply and it dries very fast. Doesn't make hair feel weighed down or sticky.

reviews.review_text: Works just as well as brand name Rogaine to slow or prevent male pattern baldness. My brother and father were bald on top by this age.

reviews.title: Defective cans don't empty completely
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for years without any issues. This time, the cans did not empty completely. There is product left in each can, but it will not come out. Some came out as a dribble, not a foam, and some won't come out at all. I will be returning them.

reviews.title: The foam is 10x better than the liquid
reviews.review_text: The foam is a bit more expensive than the liquid formula, but it's very much worth it. It's easier to apply (FAR less messy/drippy), absorbs more quickly into the skin, and causes no irritation, dryness, or dandruff. Some people have trouble with minoxidil causing these symptoms, but it's actually the propylene glycol used as the carrier agent in the liquid formula -- the foam does not have this (which is why the foam formula was created in the first place). Spend a little more and get the foam.

It may make you feel not quite completely helpless about it though. But not much. The older I get, the less I care and will probably discontinue at some point. reviews.title: It worked for me
reviews.review_text: I am a woman who has been dealing with hair loss since my teens, which is over 20 years ago. My hair loss got worse as the years progressed, to the point of being ready for a wig. My last ditch effort was to wait until I was done having kids (for safety's sake), and start on minoxidil. My internet research told me many women have more success with 5%, so I used it twice a day. Like others, I went through the shedding process. Since my hairloss was already so progressed, it made things even worse for about 3 months, at which point subtle regrowth began. This is a slow and steady progress, and I felt comfortable enough stop using Dermatch concealer (which I've used for over 10 years) after 10 months of use. I do occasionally use it only once a day, and haven't noticed any difference in the results. The good: It did regrow enough to my satisfaction, although it is still evident I have some level of hair loss. The bad: you have to use it for the rest of your life, and the shedding period is very frustrating. I am glad I did it, and plan to continue to use it. And the bottles say they should last about a month, but if you have typical woman hair loss like me, it needs to be spread over the majority of your head. A bottle lasts me about 2 1/2 weeks.

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.review_text: I have been balding since 18. I have tried other products such as propecia with little to no results. This is the best product so far. I have been using for 2 months and have white fuzz on my head that hasn't been there in over 10 years. Some are turning my natural hair color. Super excited! Can't wait to see the results in 4 months. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: pitiful and wastful lack of service
reviews.review_text: I placed an order and was notified that it was ready for pickup. I drove to the designated parking spot and called the designated telephone number for alerting them that was there. I had to go inside andfind a store manager because the pickup employees never answered the phone. I came close to cancelling my order. I will never go back in that Walmart Store again.

reviews.title: work well for AA women too
reviews.review_text: I've been using 2% drops for 9 months and this stuff really work BUT it doesn't increase the rate your hair grows. It's waking up the follicles that went dormant so don't EXPECT anything big the first 3 months. My newly awakened follicles put out hair but only at an 1/8 inch growth per month in my problem areas and the rest of my hair grow at normal rate of 1/2 inch a month. So, it takes awhile to get length and coverage. Months 4-6 you'll start seeing more coverage so by your 2nd-3rd box. It has definitely thickened my hair and filled in my crown to the point I don't have to use devices to cover my scalp but it's still the thinnest part of my scalp but I'm fine with having enough coverage to not be as self conscious. I'm switching to foam bcos the itching is real with the drops. If you're a woman, I read that using the 5% once daily is the same as twice daily with the 2%...

reviews.title: Awesome product
reviews.review_text: I hear it doesn't work for everyone but it's definitely working for me. I'm 25 and my hairline was receding at an alarming rate the past three years. I decided I better start fighting it or at least try to slow it down so I bought four months of this stuff. Now I'm a little over three months in and after a disheartening shed process my hair is noticeably thicker and my hairline is almost back to where it was when I was 21. I honestly didn't expect the results but after I stopped shedding it was a matter of two or three weeks when I saw a dramatic, seemingly sudden, change in my hair. I've read people combining products with this but I've just used this by itself to achieve great results this quick. For the price, it's definitely worth a shot if your considering giving it a go. I've been pretty consistent for the past few months but I have missed a few applications. I read not to stress too much about missing an application but to do your best and to wait at least 6 hours after you apply the first one. Good luck hope you get the results you want.

reviews.title: Worth the extra $10 over the liquid.
reviews.review_text: This product in foam version I think is well worth the extra $10 over the comparable 3 month supply of drops. I'd been using the minoxidil drops for about six months and yes, I noticed results, not as great as I'd hoped but overall, yes good re-growth. The results that I did see with the drops however was patchy and uneven, I don't know if I was getting all the areas or what exactly it was. I'd been looking at the foam for a while and wondered if it was worth the extra $10. The answer is YES. I got a 3 month box of the foam a little over a month ago, and I am 100% most definitely seeing certain results, such as growth overall plus new growth in the patchy areas. It's a lot more even looking now. You know the camera that is aimed at the top/back of your head in the Walmart self checkout machine? When I looked at myself in it the other day unexpectedly, I have to say I was really surprised. And pleased!
I Don't Trust Walmart the same way as I would other Businesses

reviews.title: Stuff actually works.
reviews.review_text: Less than a month in and had stubble appearing and the thinning areas looked fuller. At three months had shrunk a 3 plus inch bald spilt down to 1 inch. Do not exceed the recommended amount per use. Headaches and gummy mouth may result.

The driver delivered my items to wrong apartment but luckily I wasn't working today. The photos were a big help, drivers should pay more close attention to the customer address. I normally rate my experience at a five but today it will be a four. Thank goodness my items weren't stolen.

reviews.title: As good as Rogaine.
reviews.review_text: I've used Rogaine for 6 months now and thought I would try this since it's less money. I don't feel the Roagaine has worked, which probably means this wont work either. This is less expensive and causes no irritation (neither did Rogaine) so for the price point I'll try this for the next 6 months. As I said, I don't think I'm growing any new hair but it does make my hair look good, and thick so even as an expensive hair styling product I'll continue to use it as long as I don't see any side effects. It may be stopping further hair loss too. It does last the 3 months, I use A LOT, probably more than I should and each can lasts 1 month.

reviews.title: Better than my over priced mattress
reviews.review_text: Great bed, especially for the price! This shipped super fast. It is super heavy so make sure you have help or you're not taking it too far. I ordered this for the guest house at my Dads. The mattress in there was tagged April 2022, it's older than my daughter. This arrived mattress in 3 days. It set up fast. I slept like a baby, and I have a very expensive mattress at home. I'm looking at a king for my house now. I think this is better than my $3,500 mattress…insanity!

reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
reviews.review_text: After months of sleeping on an air mattress and watching countless review videos, my husband chose this bed. So far, after two sleepings, he loves it. The bed arrived packed inside the box better than anything g we've ever received. Once the many layers of plastic were removed, the bed began to expand. It took about 8 hours for it to achieve its maximum size. We ordered the 14”, but it's actually 13”. In the event we would need to return the bed, it is impossible to put it back in its box. Hopefully, this will continue to be a good purchase and serve us well.

reviews.title: Very happy 😊 repeat Allswell customer
reviews.review_text: This is my second Allswell mattress, and I love it! The firmness is perfect for my back, as a person in my 50's, and a RN, I am very particular about my sleep situation. This first mattress I purchased was the brick (the firmest you can get) a few years ago and ended up putting the cooling foam topper and cloud quilted topper on it, also from Walmart/Allswell. The firmness level was perfect for my back but needed a little extra cushioning for my knees. This combination made my dream bed 🛌 😴. Still use this to this day!!! My most recent purchase was the supreme mattress, and it has a cooling attached topper, which is a must for Arizona 🌵🔥!!! This is in a guest room and the comfort level is perfect!!! I am so happy with the affordability and comfort of both purchases and will be back for sure, this is my go to mattress place now. Thank you Allswell 😊

reviews.title: No hip pain!
reviews.review_text: Exceptional value! I bought the cooling cover feature, and was very impressed. Slept through the night with minimal tossing and turning. we are side sleepers and this mattress makes you feel comfortable and refreshed in the morning.
It came very quickly. I let it air out for a day and put it on the bed. It replaced a mattress that was "custom made" and cost about $800 more. I slept very well and no more back pain!

I had slept on an Allswell mattress at an AirB%26B. I later inquired to the owner and she said I wasn't the first to ask her. We have been very pleased with the comfort and support of our mattress. Since it has coils, I can feel a slight amount of movement when my husband gets up, but not always and just slightly. We had an all foam mattress before which was comfy but less support after a few years. I do recommend this mattress, especially for the price point!

reviews.title: DISCOMFORT MATTRESS FOR SLIM INDIVIDUALS
reviews.review_text: Not good for people under 300 pounds, side or back sleepers. You would have terrible discomfort though the nights. I was always unable to walk for a few minutes getting out of bed everymorning.. l never had such awful discomfort using this mattress. Good quality, good price. Terrible support for slim people.

reviews.title: Don't waste your money
reviews.review_text: It's literally the worst mattress I have ever wasted money on. I bought this one specifically because it's supposed to be cooling, and I retain heat while sleeping. The mattress gets so hot so quickly that I would wake up thinking I had a fever from how hot my skin was. There is no support at all. The matress sinks in the middle, and I consistently wake up with pain in my back and hips. I would have been better off flushing a few hundred dollars down the toilet.

reviews.title: Very disappointed
reviews.review_text: Was not able to use the mattress because it came damaged by the shipper. Having a hard time trying to return it because Im supposed to return it the store. I am senior in age and I am having a hard time moving the extremely damaged box. I live in an apartment complex and had to pay someone to move from the lobby to upstairs in my apartment. Walmart was not sensitive to my dilemma.

matress box was seriously damaged during transport. it was wet from rain, dirty, and the top was open. The men who deivered it were driving an open bed pickup truck. All this makes me the opposite of happy. I really have to ask. Are these matresses "seconds" that couldn't be sold elsewhere ? I ask because the stitching is very uneven, almost as if a child did it. there are many wrinkles on the top of the matress that haven't settled out after sitting undisturbed for more than 24 hours. many wrinkles along both sides that are not settling out. i can submit photos if you like. let me know how we can fix this....??.

I don't know about the mattress yet.It is still setting out It did not come with any paperwork.Only the mattress itself no warranty.No paperwork of any kind no instructions plus it is delivered to the wrong house

reviews.title: Chiropractor approved
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] As a chiropractor, I can tell you that this is a very comfortable and supportive bed. I must say I was skeptical buying a bed online and without testing it. And I am so happy that I did. I have had some of the best night's sleep since purchasing this mattress. Easy to set up, just make sure there is at least one other person to help because the box is heavy.

reviews.title: Excellent in every way
reviews.review_text: I was a skeptic buying a mattress from a company that was new to me. My skepticism was heightened when I found out that they were going to send this to me in a box, rolled up. I have bought other mattresses (e.g. Ikea) in a rolled up form and was not terribly impressed though it worked. My experience with the Allswell Supreme has truly changed my opinions and settled all of my skepticism. The package is heavy. There was no white glove delivery option due to COVID19. The shipping company (FedEx) driver was very careless and rough, destroyed the box. I complained to them for the treatment of the package. Thankfully the mattress itself was undamaged and was wrapped well inside. Getting it up the stairs was quite a feat, it is heavy and awkward. Once it was laid out on our box springs, it was extremely easy. Open up the package and let it air out for 48 hours and it was amazing! The mattress is very comfortable and hugs you a minute after you lay down. It is not an uncomfortable hug but just enough, the springs do not allow for a full sink in, it is perfect. The bed does not get hot at night. The sheets do have to be deep pocket sheets, the mattress is 14 inches. I woke up the next morning for the first time in years without pain in my shoulders and hips (side-sleeper). My fitbit recordings of my sleep have been excellent. My wife and I are so thankful we bought this mattress. It was incredibly reasonable with the Pre-Christmas sale that was running. Value price, Incredible quality, excellent product. I would recommend this to anyone. This mattress may have put my physical therapist and chiropractor out of business.

reviews.title: The Best of Both Worlds!
reviews.review_text: We've only had this bed for a short while, but so far we love it. We had slept on a memory foam mattress for the last three years, but we find the hybrid to more comfortable. That little extra "give" of the individually wrapped coils is just what we were looking for!

Allswell that Endswell. Great ending to the day when you know you are going to sleep on your new Allswell Supreme Mattress the same day you unbox it. My goodness is it nice. Unboxed on top of our box spring, and unrolled plastic wrap forever. Cut the plastic wrap covering the bed itself, and in (2) hours my wife was taking her noontime nappy. Now this is someone who many years ago could smell a dirty diaper from three rooms away. So that is evidence that we experienced little to no off airing of the mattress. Living in FL we did have the luxury of opening our bedroom windows to air out any unpleasant odor. Our first night sleeping on this bed was just wonderful. If you have any reservations about purchasing this bed, forget about it, and order now. Our bed did not come with handles; however, when unboxing on the box springs they are not necessary. Goodnight as Allswell.

reviews.title: Firm to the 9
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Very solid and sturdy mattress, however it is extremely firm for my wife and I. We are both almost 30 and have never felt sore after sleeping in a bed until the first time we slept in the Supreme King. We woke up the first day after having the mattress and were sore all over and couldn't believe it. Continued to sleep on it for the recommended three weeks with no improved comfort. Customer service was great in the return process though.

reviews.title: Great customer service
reviews.review_text: We received our Supreme Queen on a Friday night. When unwrapping, the plastic covering didn't come off easily.. turns out the plastic had melted on top the of mattress. As you can imagine, I was really disappointed because I knew being a Friday, there was no way this would get resolved until Monday. We ended up sleeping on the mattress through the weekend and loved how comfortable it was! With a mattress covering and sheets, we weren't as bothered by the melted plastic. I sent an email to customer service, but never heard back, so I called Tuesday morning. Was never put on hold, was answered by the sweetest representative right away. She was able to pull up the pictures that I sent in my email and assured me this has never happened in the past. She placed a new order and we received another Supreme mattress that Friday. This time no melted plastic! It's been about a month now, and my husband and I LOVE our new mattress. Not sure how this will last for years to come, but right now, we are very happy with our purchase and the Allswell customer service. For reference, I'm 118lb side sleeper, and my husband is 170lbs sleeps on side and back. I also sleep very hot (we live in FL) and this mattress is much cooler than our previous memory foam mattress.

reviews.title: Awesome product, but not for us!
reviews.review_text: Don't let my 4 star rating (instead of a 5) mislead you. The Supreme Cal King mattress is an awesome product as well as an incredible value. This was my first experience with an on-line mattress and a "Bed-in-a-Box". My wife and I had no idea what to expect. The box came in severely damaged and we assumed the mattress would be damaged as well. The abundant wrapping and bagging protected the mattress from suffering any damage from the freight company mishandling. Because of the Covid-19 restrictions, the white glove option wasn't available. This means we had to remove our 20 year old traditional mattress and replace it with the new one ourselves. This was easier than I thought, but not for the feint of heart. The 'trick' is to place the bagged, compressed mattress in place and open an entire end of the mattress bag. the mattress will decompress and you can incrementally work the bag off of the mattress. Sadly, we didn't have the mattress oriented properly, so we had to turn the mattress. This wasn't excessively difficult. It's difficult to to select a mattress on-line. We need a firmer mattress so we thought a medium to firm rating would suffice. Sadly, this wasn't the case. Keep in mind, the firmness ratings differ from retailer to retailer. A firm rating at one site seems to be a medium at another. Another consideration is a hybrid mattress (springs and foam) is quite different from an older traditional mattress. The foam takes some getting used to. To my dismay, this isn't something I could adjust to, even after more than two weeks on the mattress. I'm a tall person with back and knee issues. The foam supported my entire body, but didn't offer the overall alignment I need to prevent back pain. Perhaps one of the other mattresses could, but as an old dog that's not ready for new tricks, I think I'm going to stick with a more traditional mattress. I still think the quality of the mattress is surprisingly good, and the value is spectacular. If you are of normal height and weight, this could be the mattress for you.

reviews.title: Wonderful value, but a tad soft
reviews.review_text: Terrific value. Nice mattress. It's just a tad soft for my taste. The description is "medium firm". I didn't dare go any more firm because I don't care for too firm a mattress. From my perspective I might describe it as medium. I'm pretty happy overall with it, and will likely adjust with no complaints. The edge stiffness is wonderful and accommodates sitting on the edge of the bed nicely. It's one of the perils of on-line shopping/ordering. With no real option to "test" you kind of live with what you get, since returning a mattress is WAY to much of an ordeal.

reviews.title: The Supreme-King
reviews.review_text: I'm still in the infancy stage with The Supreme-King. This is my first mattress with memory foam and is definitely an adjustment but it's been positive so far. Sinking into it every night still catches me off guard but it's enjoyable. I am primarily a stomach and side sleeper and even though my body type is more on the slim side the mattress has suited me well. I am looking towards more nights on this mattress.

reviews.title: My son loves his new bed!
reviews.review_text: My son is thrilled with his new bed. It's become harder to get him out of it in the morning :). The whole experience with Allswell was great! The ordering was easy; the selections weren't complicated to choose from; shipping was easy to track and the order arrived quickly. All-in-all a great experience. Thanks, Allswell!

reviews.title: Great mattress, two noteworthy qualities
reviews.review_text: There were two notable qualities in this mattress that pleased me very much. The first was the overall feel of the mattress. I have always needed a topper with previous mattresses, but not with this one, it was perfect out of the box. If you are looking for something really firm, this may not be for you, but for all others I would say try it. Most comfortable mattress I have ever used. The second pleasant surprise was the complete lack of any noticeable off-gassing, something which I really don't like. Right out of the box this mattress was as neutral as any organic brand. Overall super-pleased, happy to give 5 star review, telling all my friends.

reviews.title: Years of back pain is helped by Allswell Spreme
reviews.review_text: Purchased this mattress after visiting my brother. He had a Queen size in his quest room. I have had a back problem for years in 2011 I had to have rods and pins placed L2-L5. This helped for a few years and due to scare tissue when they tried to place a stimulator they had problems and the stimulator surgery was half done. At my brother's house I would wake up with little pain but during the day I had to use assistance to walk, but because of my ability to sleep and wake up with very little pain I had to own one. Great investment!

reviews.title: FIRM MATTRESS Hard to see why it's called a "Hybrid"
reviews.review_text: I got this mattress because I needed a good hybrid between firm and plush and went with the 14" for height and thickness since I wasn't going to be using a box spring. This mattress is FIRM and it's difficult to see why they call this a "hybrid." I had my roommate sit on it and my boyfriend slept on it and they both agree that it is too firm. The memory foam on top only kicks in a while after you've sat on it, but it's barely any give. The height is perfect and the material is nice but I just can't work with how firm it is. Even when you punch the bed, it is SUPER hard. After the first night I woke up completely sore but I thought it was from moving into my new apartment. But now, it has been a full week and I am buying a memory foam mattress topper because 1) I don't want to go through the hassle of returning this and 2) I don't want to have to research and wait to get a different one. Only get this mattress if you are looking for FIRM support.

reviews.title: Queen Supreme mattress
reviews.review_text: Very comfortable so far! The only thing I don't love, is that the top cover never fully got tight, so now it doesn't lay flat, and parts of it stick up or make a bump. We let it fully inflate for a full 48 hrs before sleeping on it too, so I was hoping it would lay flat, but unfortunately it was still a loose top.

reviews.title: Comfortable and supportive
reviews.review_text: Our mattress arrived on time and the set up was simple. (Recommend having 2 people to get this mattress in to place due to its weight and size) when the mattress expands quickly when released from the 2nd bag that it is packaged in. We did not notice any chemical odors and were able to begin enjoy sleeping on this mattress the same day that we set it up. Our mattress is both comfortable and supportive. I sleep comfortably in many positions. My wife is very satisfied as well

reviews.title: Enjoying good nights Sleep
reviews.review_text: I been sleeping on this mattress for just over a week and so far I am very pleased with it. Firmness and support are meeting my expectations and I am sleeping comfortably with no issues similar to the ones I had with a 5 year old Memory foam Mattress. Very satisfied with my purchase .

reviews.title: Supreme King
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The bed is comfortable. The edges of the bed are pretty soft. Could use more structure around the edges. Major disappointment was when we took the bed out of the bag. There was a major stain in the quilted top.

reviews.title: Terrific mattress for a good price.
reviews.review_text: I am pleased with this mattress, it is very comfortable and spacious. I sleep like a baby. I haven't had any issues with getting hot and sweaty bec it is a hybrid not just a foam mattress. Walmart makes these and I know they wouldn't put their name behind them if they were inferior. Also I know Walmart would make it right if the mattress didn't work out, Everyone is different but for me this has been a great purchase.

reviews.title: Great mattress
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] So far so good. 1 week in, I am sleeping very well. We were used to a foam topper, so my almost 50 y.o. body does have a bit more of a push back in the morning (and we can always add the topper back); however, I stay asleep very easily and also it is NOT hot in any way. If you run hot at night, this is an excellent option. We are very happy with it.

reviews.title: Too firm, not enough edge support
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been sleeping on the Allswell Supreme for more than I month, and I'm probably going to return it--mostly because it's firm enough that I'm still waking up with sore hips and shoulders. I'm also disappointed in the edge support; I feel like I'm going to roll out of bed when my dog crowds me over to the edge.

reviews.title: 3 Mattresses in One Month
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We bought our first Allswell Mattress a month ago for our new second home. Felt a little weird ordering online because it was our first time ordering a mattress through the web (but it's now a trend). We received our Allswell Supreme mattress on time. Set it up. Had the best sleep in a long time. A week later we ordered another Allswell mattress (Luxe) for our guest room. After sleeping on the Supreme mattress for a month, we decided to get a third Allswell mattress (Supreme) for our first home. Now, I'm telling all my friends about Allswell mattress. Thank you!

reviews.title: Middle of the road comfort
reviews.review_text: The mattress is fairly supportive but is only slightly better than our 13-yr old worn out mattress. Back support is better, pressure points not as severe but still exist. It wasn't magical by any means. My concern is how long will it last before it's just as painful as our old one. Probably not 13 years.

reviews.title: Allswell Supreme
reviews.review_text: The bed is comfortable, however is much hotter than previous mattress' I have owned. Part of the reason I purchased this mattress was it said it transfers heat away, yet I feel much hotter than ever. The top also ripples up and creates a bump on or bunch of material that is hard to smooth out. But, the bed itself is comfortable and I don't wake up sore or aching.

reviews.title: Should have known.
reviews.review_text: This is definitely a plush mattress. I don't know who would think this is firm- the website lists it as a 6, but I'd call it a 3. As soon as you sit on it, you sink right in. It's not so plush that you're sore in the morning, but it's plush enough that changing sleeping positions happens way less than on a firmer, more supportive bed. I opted to return using their free mattress pick up service, and instead they refunded me and made removal my problem, instructing me to donate or discard. Not a cool move, since getting rid of it now costs me money when half their value proposition is a risk-free trial.

reviews.title: queen supreme
reviews.review_text: this is a great mattress. at first, it is a cozy, firm feel as you hop on to the mattress & with the heat of your body you sink in for a restful night of sleep. sadly for our mature bodies, this sinking into the mattress feel of memory foam mattresses only exacerbates our aches & pains.

reviews.title: MoJo
reviews.review_text: Been sleeping on our King Supreme for a couple of weeks. I notice the top layer forms “ridges” or bunches up while I sleep. I can smooth it out in the morning and it doesn't seem to interfere with my sleep, but I'm not pleased that it does this. Also I bought sheets to fit a 14 inch mattress, but they are loose. Not sure it the mattress really is 14 inches. I like the bottom fitted sheet to be snug but it is “loose” when I put it on. Mattress felt more “firm” initially and I think is getting softer the more we sleep on it. Is this possible after a few weeks? That is fine with me as I wanted something a less firm and with a soft top feel. Overall, I would not return it, but wanted to give this feedback, since you asked!

reviews.title: Comfy no more sleepless nights
reviews.review_text: Best decision we made. What a relief for my back issues. I am finally getting some sleep 4 mattresses later.

reviews.title: No support
reviews.review_text: The bed is too soft. There is no support and my neck is killing me. I'm trying to figure out how to return it.
This is the 4th allswell king we've purchased. We've purchased queen and twins also. So comfortable!!

reviews.title: Great bed!
reviews.review_text: We really love this bed! It had been recommended to us by a couple of our friends and it was definitely a good buy and a quality bed. Would highly recommend.

reviews.title: Supreme King
reviews.review_text: The mattress is advertised a medium firmness and feels great. The mattress has good motion isolation. However, the edges of the mattress are sub-standard. The edges do not hold well in my opinion. Overall, I would purchase this mattress again.
Everything was excellent. The only issue was the condition of the packaging. It was torn on all sides to where I could see the product inside. Luckily the product was not damaged.

reviews.title: Firm as a rock. Don't buy, save your back.
reviews.review_text: This bed is as hard as a rock. I've slept on a bunch of mattresses in my life and I've never had issues with any of them, but this one is terrible. My girlfriend and I woke up multiple times for a whole week because our backs were so sore.

reviews.title: Supreme King-perfect firm+softness
reviews.review_text: We've had our mattress for about 3 weeks and are very pleased. I like a really firm mattress and my husband the opposite and we've both loved it. It's soft enough for his liking, but you don't drown in it, like others I've hated. Very happy!!

reviews.title: Worth every penny!
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical about this mattress but the quality speaks for itself - it is top notch. Just one night sleeping on this mattress helped alleviate my back pain. Way better than I ever imagined! I want to get one for every room in my house!

reviews.title: Supreme King
reviews.review_text: Slightly soft, but mostly firm. If you're a side sleeper, you may need a thicker pillow to accommodate the mattress firmness. Love that I can't feel my husband move at night, though.

reviews.title: Cushier than expected
reviews.review_text: Not sure why I was expecting this to be on the firm side, but it is certainly not. If you like sinking into a mattress, this is for you! One star down because I feel like I have to climb out of the bed a little bit to turn over.

reviews.title: 5 stars
reviews.review_text: Very comfortable mattress, came rolled up. Opened the seal and let the air out and it formed into the king mattress we have now it's very durable and the edges hold my pregnant wife and I in on the mattress 5 out of 5 stars.

reviews.title: Poor nights sleep. Woke in pain.
reviews.review_text: It was too soft for me. My body sunk into the temper pedic like toping and gave me a sore back in the morning. If u like a soft bed, u may like it but I woke with a pain in my back and neck.

reviews.title: Comfort
reviews.review_text: My husband likes a firm mattress and I like a soft mattress so finding a happy medium has been tough for us, but with the Allswell supreme mattress, we did it! So so comfy! My hip pain is gone, too!

reviews.title: OH YEAH!!
reviews.review_text: This mattress supersedes my expectations of a bed in a box!! It is true to its measurements. it took about 48 hours maybe a little more to get to its full size. It is so comfortable i cant believe i paid what i paid for it. it is way better than the 2500 dollar mattress i had before.

reviews.title: OMG
reviews.review_text: Needed a new mattress. Every night woke up with hip pain from arthritis. I'm a side sleeper but this would force me to lay on my back. Last night was the first time I did not have hip pain. My wife also said her back felt better. Great value for the price. Also box was okay on arrival.

Not the right bed for us. We bought this to replace one we had for 7yrs. In doing research it seems that hybrid is the way to go and really thought this was going to be good. Initially it was decent! Took a couple days to get used to but it was fine. Towards the end of the 30 days my back started hurting. I can't sleep on my stomach at all now without it hurting. My husband hasn't really liked it since the beginning but I guess we'll be dealing with it since the 30 day warranty is over.

reviews.title: Wonderful bed
reviews.review_text: Be warned, the bed is very very heavy. I'm grateful it was just a full size bed, but at 85 pounds is almost too much for one older person. After cutting off the plastic, it was bottom side up. Took a bit of maneuvering around for me to get it flipped. After having a memory foam bed for so long, it was unusual to have a bit of a bounce back. I had such a nice sleep. The mattress was the perfect mix of foam and coils. No big complaints, all are simple solutions. I will need a mattress protector to help with the slick top. The fitted sheet did slide around a bit.

reviews.title: Cali King superb
reviews.review_text: Great mattress, great delivery and easy to unbox. So comfortable and supportive
Super comfortable! Reminds of the beds used by Wyndham

reviews.title: Happy with an overall excellent mattress
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Upgraded from an old spring mattress. I'm 6 feet, 175-180 lbs. Back and side sleeper. Very happy with it so far (about 3 months in). Edge support reasonable. Does run warmer than a spring mattress as expected, but doesn't bother me. Would buy again given value.

reviews.title: Love this mattress
reviews.review_text: Been sleeping on the allswell supreme for a few weeks now. Let me just say, I'm IN LOVE. I'm 27 and a nurse and mom to a young toddler, my back was aching every day with my 8 year old traditional spring+pillow top mattress. I was doing most everything in my power to feel better, but nothing was helping... for months! I decided it was time for a mattress upgrade. From night 1 I noticed a difference. A few weeks later and I just noticed- no more ibuprofen, and heating pads every evening... I feel great! The only thing I can attribute it to is this new mattress. I'm still working just as hard and playing just as hard with my baby, but my back feels great! Some added bonuses I wasn't looking for but am loving: very minimal motion transfer- I can't even tell with my partner gets up, or even moves in the bed unless he's directly touching me. Also I had been warned about the smells with bed in the box, and I hardly even noticed any off-gasing smells at all. Maybe the first night, if you shoved your face into the bed, you could smell a slight chemically smell. But it wasn't bad or overpowering, kinda like a sharpie smell? Definitely didn't take long to disappear. Overall, would definitely recommend!

reviews.title: Comfy Bed
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this bed. It is not too firm and not too soft. The hybrid composition does not feel like memory foam but it shapes to my body. As a side sleeper, I feel like this bed gives me excellent alignment. I've looked at and tried beds that were much more expensive and found this to be equal in quality. The bed is the right thickness for my sheets and platform bed as well.

reviews.title: Comfy!!
reviews.review_text: It's amazing, my husband & I are in love. Extremely soft, firm perfect combo. Also keeps us cool at night. What I absolutely love the most is that I cannot feel my husband move because he is a mover! 100% recommend & love this bed. If you're thinking about it then get it!

reviews.title: Not firm enough for me.
reviews.review_text: I needed a firm mattress, and unfortunately this is not it. I was hoping I'd still feel "on top" of the mattress, but the memory foam top is too soft and makes me feel like I'm sinking in. Also, the edges of the mattress push down when you sit. I really wanted to love this mattress, but it just doesn't work for my sleeping style. I'm sure side sleepers or those that prefer a softer mattress would really enjoy it.

reviews.title: Super Comfy
reviews.review_text: We really like our mattress. It is very comfortable and almost exactly what we wanted. There is a slight spring to it because it isn't just solely foam. The edge support is pretty good too. We have an infant and miss being able to bounce him in bed, but we knew that would not last forever so we chose this mattress. I think it is a keeper. It does run a little bit warm but it is winter now so I am not noticing it much. I am interested in seeing how it does in the summer months. I am always happy to lay down in bed. My back and hips don't hurt anymore and I am thrilled about that! We are side and back sleepers.

reviews.title: New mattress
reviews.review_text: It does feel very different to switch from a mattress and box spring to a new mattress that doesn't require a box spring. It takes a few days and then it feels GREAT. This was purchased for my daughter, she needed a new mattress for a long time. She has back and knee problems so I was very careful to select a high quality mattress. She is sleeping better and doesn't want to get out of bed because it is so comfortable.

reviews.title: Good quality
reviews.review_text: I feel like the quality of the bed is excellent. My issue is the feel. It claims to be a medium feel but it's pretty soft. I feel a little sunken into the mattress and I'm 180 lbs. My girlfriend who is 120 lbs also says it feels soft to her. It might need more of a firmer foam on top.

reviews.title: Great Bed - Still not used to mattress shipping
reviews.review_text: I really do love the bed! It is super comfortable and I no longer wake up with a sore back. My only complaint is that there is a section of the bed (of course on my side) that has a permanent fold from the packaging / shipping. I did wait 48 hours to let the mattress rise in hopes that the crease would go away, but it did not. I will see if it settles out over the next month or so and if not will reach out to the company. Other than that one minor item - the bed is AWESOME and so much more affordable than the other beds I was considering.

reviews.title: Great mattress!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The ordering process was fine, but the delivery had a "glitch". Should have received it within two weeks, but upon investigation, apparently the label was damaged and mattress was returned to Allswell. Called Customer Service, Samantha K., she was great! Got it all straightened out and another mattress sent and received within a week. The box it arrived in was notsealed well. The tape on what should have been the "bottom" of the box, based on the arrows, was completely unsealed - all flaps could open. Thankfully, nothing was damaged and the tape on the rest of the box held. I give this only so the shipping tape, etc. can be improved upon for your future shipments. The mattress - GREAT!! My husband's word "I felt like I was sleeping on a cloud"; it is really comfortable and especially since we both sleep on our sides alot. We're "technically" seniors (don't "think" as a senior), so every once in a while these joints can get "tricky" in the shoulders and lower back - no problems so far - love it!

reviews.title: Stop researching and buy this one.
reviews.review_text: Literally the greatest thing I've laid down on in my life. I had a Tuft and Needle mattress for about 5 years before getting an Allswell. I thought I had a great mattress. Then this one was delivered. In 3 nights of sleep, my back pain is gone and I felt as though I could actually feel the stress in my hips unwinding the first night I slept on it. I will be telling everyone I know about this mattress. I put in roughly 5 hours of mattress research, driving myself bonkers, but this result was so worth it.

reviews.title: Sound Sleeper - great quality
reviews.review_text: I am very satisfied with my new supreme queen mattress and will definitely recommend to others. There was a defect in the mattress cover and Allswell resolved the issue promptly with my complete satisfaction. Thank you Samantha K for your exceptional customer service!

reviews.title: So far, so good.
reviews.review_text: We've only slept on this for a total of 2 weeks, so my review is based on that. Firstly, the package arrived in a very badly damaged box and there was a slight rip on the top of the mattress after opening (and trust me, we were VERY careful cutting the plastic). As for the comfort level, it's definitely good so far. nice and firm when laying down but with a little cushion on the top. it's too soft for our preference at this time, but we were previously on a firm foam mattress so it's an adjustment that will need more time to see if its the best fit. So far, so good.

reviews.title: Allswell Supreme Mattress
reviews.review_text: I have been sleeping on my new Allswell Supreme mattress for about a month so far. The first night I felt like I was sleeping on a cloud after years of my old, too firm mattress. I was worried about the edges not being firm enough, but they are only slightly less supportive than my old, traditional mattress. I love this mattress so far! I have constant back pain due to an injury. I've been falling asleep faster and sleeping all night most nights compared to waking several times per night trying to get comfortable with my old mattress. I would recommend this mattress to anyone who has back pain or who wants a comfortable & supportive mattress. Just a side note, my two cats love it too! They have slept with me every night since I got this mattress.

reviews.title: Supreme King
reviews.review_text: So happy with our new mattress! After a week of sleeping on it, I noticed a huge difference in how well I was sleeping! With my old mattress I was constantly waking up, rolling over with a back ache. I'm no longer waking up multiple times throughout the night. Also customer service was amazing and helped with any and all questions! Highly recommend ALLSWELL!

reviews.title: So Worth It!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I first slept on an Allswell this past summer while visiting friends. My husband and I slept on it for a week and couldn't believe how comfortable it was and how well we slept AND how great we felt in the morning. So of course as soon as we got home we ordered one to replace the mattress we purchased just 2 years ago. The difference of how comfortable it is and how well we feel in the morning was so worth it!

reviews.title: Great Mattress Great Value
reviews.review_text: We bought two of these for the kids last year and they loved them. When it came time to replace our mattress and the guest mattress we looked at all options. This mattress is exactly what we were looking for. I was worried due to some reviews that said it was soft and you sink in. I did not find that to be the case at 260# supports me just fine. My wife is a Goldilocks and it is just right for her as well. Her back pain is GONE. I have nothing to compare it to other than my old mattress but glad I got this one instead of one that is 100s more. Can't imagine them being that much better.

reviews.title: Finally Blissful Sleep
reviews.review_text: I am now getting wonderful and refreshing sleep since getting my Allswell Supreme Mattress! I appreciate both the combination of softness that puts me to sleep and firmness that supports my body so I wake up without stiffness or body aches in this 60 year old body! I have recommended to several of my friends who are looking for new sleep experiences. Great product Allswell!

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: We really like this mattress. We had never had a memory foam mattress and were a little scared of how it would feel. For us, is the perfect combination between firmness and softness (I prefer mattresses not super firm). If you like yours firm, this might not be the one for you, but it's not super soft either. It clearly provides enough support for back and stomach sleepers.

reviews.title: Mattress does not support your back
reviews.review_text: The Supreme was put forth as a hybrid that could be used with conventional box springs. I did not find this to be true. There is no support without a bunkie board. After adding a board, the mattress is still not supportive especially in the lumbar region. I am very disappointed in this product. For the price I could have bought a much more comfortable straight foam mattress and not have back pain every morning.

reviews.title: Great Mattress
reviews.review_text: Really surprised at the comfort of this mattress! I was going to have surgery and wanted a more comfortable mattress after the surgery and this has been a blessing! Great support, but soft and comfortable! I have had this for about 3 weeks and could not be happier with my purchase. Shipping information was provided and the mattress was delivered on time. Easy set up!

reviews.title: If a mattress can hug you, the Supreme-King does!
reviews.review_text: The Supreme-King is a dream! Every night, it's as if it gives us a gentle welcoming hug. I haven't stopped saying how much I love it every night when we go to bed. The Supreme-King is the perfect firmness and softness all at the same time. I'm a back and side sleeper and my fiance is a side and stomach sleeper and it's so perfect for both of us! Do not hesitate. Buy this immediately and be ready for a great night of sleep!
The product was well priced, but was not as firm as what was expected, causing some body pain issues.
I've only had it a few days. So far great but mattresses take time to assess and since this review was solicited, I give 3 stars

reviews.title: Bang for your buck!!!!
reviews.review_text: Love this matresss! Feels luxury!!!super thick me and my man love it!!!

reviews.title: Best
reviews.review_text: I have three of these. I'll never buy a different brand.

reviews.title: bunchy
reviews.review_text: the very top layer bunches up and when you lay on it you can feel the creases and overlap. otherwise i like how it supports

reviews.title: Allswell King Mattress
reviews.review_text: Easy set up. Very heavy! Only expanded to 12 inches not 14 inches. Mattress is firm but comfortable. Great for the price!

reviews.title: Too firm
reviews.review_text: Too firm for sensitive joints. Edge is also weak as stated in other reviews. I could feel thr coils so maybe a better pillow top.

reviews.title: VERY comfortable value!
reviews.review_text: Easy out of the box setup. Super comfy for this back / side sleeper. And no disturbance from bed partner movement.

reviews.title: Not comfortable .
reviews.review_text: Super firm and uncomfortable. Now I've got to figure out how to return this thing as there's no way it's going back in the box .

reviews.title: Returning
reviews.review_text: We do not like. Even for heavy people it is way too firm. Have not been able to sleep throughout the night on it

reviews.title: Heavy but worth it
reviews.review_text: This mattress is heavy and tricky to maneuver. Be sure to have a second person to assist. Comfortable mattress and expanded easily.

reviews.title: review
reviews.review_text: still trying it out but after 3 days i haven't got any back pain so so far so good. I like that its plush and its really cooling.

reviews.title: Disappointing Walmart Experience
reviews.review_text: Product came with scratches all over. Also it had grease stains all over the Matress. I'm not able to bring back nor have the Matress picked up because of my situation. And Walmart wouldn't even offer a refund.

reviews.title: Great purchase!
reviews.review_text: This mattress is exactly what the description says! I love it so much. It's super easy to unpack, and we barely had to wait for it to fluff up to the full size. It's a perfect firmness.

reviews.title: medium firmness
reviews.review_text: in the firmness rating, it was a medium. However, this should be a step above medium. maybe a medium . It took a few days to air out. It has nice edge support. it is quite comfortable.

reviews.title: Great mattress
reviews.review_text: When I read that Walmart was the first to implement "mattress in a box" I thought I'd try it. The box springs were a surprise, and I needed help with that. The mattress has provided a perfect sleep every night, so I highly recommend it.

reviews.title: I think i really comfy
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to buy because I wanted cheaper, but to be honest I do not regret buying it, it is comfortable, not too soft not to hard, it has a little plastic smell when first comes, but it goes away with time

reviews.title: Very impressed..
reviews.review_text: I am very impressed, my wife and I are side sleepers and this mattress is perfect. Good Job WM.
It will take a few weeks to tell how good the bed is
I wish it was a little softer, said medium firm but it is pretty firm to me!

reviews.title: Online Purchase
reviews.review_text: Replaced our mattress with this due to backaches in the morning. The satisfaction guarantee made the decision to purchase online easy. We intend to assess the choice at 6-8 weeks of use, we'll rate 4 stars after 2 weeks of use.

reviews.title: Doesn't work for me
reviews.review_text: This appear to be a well-made mattress but unfortunately it is too firm for me. I'm trying to schedule a pickup which hasn't been as straightforward as I'd hoped.

reviews.title: Long Lasting Temperature
reviews.review_text: This set is so amazing. The stainless steel bottle keeps my water so cold that my ice doesn't even melt, and the outside sleeve on the bottle means it won't sweat! I prefer the straw lid, but the other two lids are really functional for drinks other than water. Highly impressed.

reviews.title: 20 oz Ozark Tumbler & Lid Set
reviews.review_text: I received my tumbler in the mail a couple days ago. I noticed how nice and sturdy it looked. After washing it out I put my water in it's my daily routine. We have a 5 yr old. He is my test study. Used it for about an hour or so and our 5 yr old was eying me to use it. First 5 minutes its on the floor being trampled by our 80 pd dog. About an hour later its outside and had fallen off the steps. Water still cold, straw still working and no leaks. This is my favorite tumbler by far. Its strong enough for our 5 yr old son and our 80 pd dog, and its 2 days later. I expect this tumbler to last a long time and keep my drink cold ! The reusable straw is one of the strongest also.

reviews.title: A versatile & sturdy travel tumbler set.
reviews.review_text: There are lots of travel mugs and tumblers on the marker but the Ozark has a really unique design and comes with a variety of great accessories. This is a great option for using during outdoor activities such as camping or fishing. Likewise it is wonderful for daily use at home or the office.

reviews.title: Tough tumbler
reviews.review_text: My boys and I loved the tumbler!!! It has so many different attachments for either hot or cold drinks. I like the unique design. I like the small indentations on sides of lid for finger grips. We tried it with hot tea. It kept the drink about same temperature as when prepared for over 4 hours. Also when we used ice water it didn't sweat on outside and kept drink very cold for hours.

reviews.title: What a great tumbler!
reviews.review_text: I use mostly tumblers these days for drinking and this one keep my cold drinks cold and I even have ice in my glass after a long night which is not normal for me. I did use it for coffee once and it kept my coffee hot for hours! I really like the inclusion of the 3 different tops/lids. It's actually pretty ingenious to have all 3 options for one tumbler. All in all, not one complaint!

reviews.title: Perfect Set!
reviews.review_text: I love this Ozark Trail Tumbler & Lid Set. It's perfect for every need. It has the straw for at home, has a sealed cover for coffee on the go. It has even a tumbler top with screw on lid. It's great, its metal inside so I do not need to worry about it getting gross if I use things other than water. This is exactly what I was looking for.

reviews.title: Ozark Trail tumbler and lid set
reviews.review_text: I love tumblers. I buy them often because I'm always drinking cold drinks throughout the day and I love having many different tumblers to use. I love this one, with its 3 different lids for whatever you need it for. It's a great size, and color as well.

reviews.title: Tumbler review
reviews.review_text: It's amazing. I've never had a tumbler set before like this one. I love how it came with three different lid options. And when I make coffee or hot coco it keeps it warm for hours. And if put something cold in it. My drink will stay cold for hours as well. Definitely must have

reviews.title: Travel Cup with options
reviews.review_text: My husband and I both love the texture on the outside of the tumbler. My husband when he first saw it thought it was an early Christmas gift for him because it has such a masculine appearance to it. I like all the different lid options for it, but I don't like that it did not come with a case or bag to carry to storage the different lids when you're not using them. I also did not like that I had to read the directions to learn how to open the mug lid or the even after reading the directions I do not know if the mug is dishwasher safe or not.
