So to be on the safe side I have just been hand washing it. I would not recommend only because it does not give you a travel case for the lid options, because I do like that all the lid options seal properly and it does not spill.

I purchased a set for myself, then one of my daughters seen it and asked for a set and we went to visit my other daughter and she asked where her set ones because her sister had been talking about how great it is. We all agreed that the "hot" lid was designed more difficult than it needed to be (open to far and you're taking the lid off again) and is hard to drink (very large lip) out of so looses a star for that. We all love the lid versatility since all of us are huge water drinkers, my girls love the reusable straw top where I like the bottle option. One cup and 2 lids is all you need for your entire day.

reviews.title: Great Tumbler Set
reviews.review_text: This tumbler is awesome! It holds a good amount of drink it definitely keeps it hot or cold. I use it for cold drinks in the day, one ice cube and it stays cold all day. I use it for tea at night and it really keeps it hot practically the entire night. The bottle lid that comes with it is very handy if you're on the go. This set would be a great purchase.

reviews.title: Ozark Trail Tumbler & Lid Set is great!
reviews.review_text: I love it!! It keeps my drinks cold for hours! I love the top that makes it into a bottle, that's awesome. Everything about the Ozark Trail Tumbler & Lid Set is wonderful. The interchangeable tops are great. It's easy to take care of, just wash with warm soap and water.

reviews.title: Very versatile bottle/tumbler
reviews.review_text: I was very pleased with how cold my water stayed during my 8 hour work shift as a nurse. The screw top is actually my favorite feature. I like the way the tumbler easily turns into a bottle. It's leakproof and shatterproof. This is a really great product

reviews.title: Perfect Gift
reviews.review_text: The Ozark Trail Tumbler and Lid Set makes a perfect gift! I love that it has so many different lid options! I am always looking for specific bottles with specific lid types depending on what I will be using it for. This will allow me to have one cup with a variety of uses!

reviews.title: My new favorite tumbler!
reviews.review_text: I received the ozark trail tumbler and lid set and now it's my favorite!! This tumbler is so versatile. It can have hot coffee or cold tea. The heat stays with the hot coffee and also stays cold with iced tea. The different lids that came with it are also very awesome. Interchangeable types of lids makes this tumbler a dream. I was bragging on this tumbler the very first day I received it. My new favorite!

reviews.title: Best tumbler ever!
reviews.review_text: I love my 20 Oz Ozark Trail Tumbler & Lid Set! I am a coffee drinker but I drink my coffee very slowly. It is usually cold by the time I finish. But not with this tumbler! It keeps my coffee hot for hours. This tumbler is also helping me drink more water. I only drink water when it very cold and I can sip on cold water all day. I would highly recommend this tumbler to everyone!

reviews.title: Love the top options!
reviews.review_text: When I placed a hot beverage in the tumbler, several hours later it was still hot. When I used the tumbler for an iced drink and left it in my car overnight, it still had ice in it the next morning although it was a cool night. When I used the tumbler for an iced drink on a hot day, the ice melted within a couple of hours. I really like the wide top accessory you can use to pour a soup or stew from the tumbler. I also like the screw top and how it allow you to drink you beveridge with using a stray. Overall I was pleased with the variety of ways I could use this tumbler for hot or cold.

reviews.title: wish there were color options
reviews.review_text: Bought these for riding the side by side. originally had my brumate which I love! but it was getting ruined so I set foot to look for a decent substitute... looking at walmart I found these, they looked textured and was neat it had 3 options to use it: including a straw, bottle top or coffee mug type. it seemed to be pretty well made. so after using it about a week riding off and on it still stands up and hasn't been ruined by the cup holder in the side by side! overalls was a great purchase and I am glad I took a chance on these! only thing I wish was there were different colors to separate my husbands and mine from each other!

reviews.title: My new favorite tumbler set!
reviews.review_text: I primarily used this tumbler as my travel coffee mug and I love it! It keeps hot drinks hot for a long time! The bottle lid is very nice for when I go hiking and need to keep my water cold! The exterior of the tumbler is highly textured making it easy to grip in the event that it gets wet. My one minor gripe would be that the coffee lid is not the easiest to wash. I have been using baby bottle nipple brushes to clean all of the groves in the underside of it. Otherwise, this is my new favorite travel mug!

reviews.title: Excellent product
reviews.review_text: The 3 -in- 1 Tumbler set worked great! The coffee lid was excellent. Kept my coffee hot forever! The straw lid worked great for my ice tea, and the bottle top lid was great for when I was shooting baskets in the driveway. I would highly recommend this product for anyone and everyone.

reviews.title: great for the weekend adult beverage!
reviews.review_text: It was a little confusing to figure that it was a screw top as my other Ozark are gasket seal top and the directions were hidden inside the sealed top. Also not sure about the bottle top as its to small for a beer unless you pour the beer inside prior to putting the bottle top on and even then its not really full. Overall I love Ozark and like the texture of this one. The screw top also feels more secure and great for activities and keeping bugs out. Ozark also keeps my drinks cold for a good long period of time.

reviews.title: 20 ounce Ozark Trail Tumbler & Lid Set
reviews.review_text: The tumbler is the right size, well insulated, and the outside texture is great for durability and gripping. The locking lid is difficult to open, and it is awkward to drink from. I will not use it. The bottle lid is nice and easy to use, but the hole is too large for drinking. The straw lid has an oversize hole for the straw, thus possible large leakage if overturned.

reviews.title: I Love It
reviews.review_text: I'll just be honest, I love this tumbler. I love the fact that it comes with a slim lid w/straw, a lid for hot liquids, and my favorite is the accessory/lid that turns the tumbler into a bottle, it actually extends the tumbler with a plastic piece shaped like the top of a bottle and then has a stainless lid that goes onto that. I use the tumbler in bottle form most often, I even fill it up with ice water every night and keep it beside my bed in case I need a drink in the middle of the night. In the morning I still have ice in the tumbler. I really like everything about this product, it looks good, it is very functional, the accessories allow it to be used in different and unique ways, etc. Overall, I am very happy with this tumbler set from Ozark Trail.

reviews.title: Great option for everyone!
reviews.review_text: The OzarkTrail 3-IN-1 Tumbler has become my favorite cold and hot drinking cup. I can take my coffee on my way to work as well as drinking my favorite cold drink during the day, all I have to do is switch the lid and use it with the straw. My daughter loves the option of the tumbler because she brings cold water to school, it was easy for her to add the ice and then screw the lid to add water. I like that it's leakproof and shatterproof, perfect for my daughter to bring it to school. This is a great option for everyone because all you need is just one cup that does it all! I highly recommend it!

reviews.title: Not for Me
reviews.review_text: I gave this tumbler to my husband to try. He has been using it around the house and at work. This is a good tumbler because it is a nice dark color and it is textured for grip. I like that it fits into a cupholder securely. The coffee lid is nice and easy to use. This tumbler doesn't leak which is very important to me. It is well insulated and kept my drink cold for most of the day. The only thing that I don't like about this product is the straw lid and the lid that is supposed to convert this tumbler to a bottle. The bottle lid is too large and it is awkward to drink out of.

reviews.title: I love the product
reviews.review_text: I like the color , the versatility. i love i can use it for hot or cold drinks. I love the differents lids. I love the one that looks like a bottle lid, the one for hot beverage(i love it).

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love my Ozark Trail Tumbler and Lid set, 20oz. It keeps my cold beverages cold and my coffee hot. I switch out the kids to my preference for the day. The exterior texture keeps my hands from slipping as well.

reviews.title: Great Product!
reviews.review_text: The Ozark Trail Tumbler & Lid set is great! The different tops allow you to customize it to your activity. My water stayed cold for hours. This is a great product!

reviews.title: Great cup
reviews.review_text: I love how this product is for hot or cold! It came with 3 different kinds of lids one was a bottle lid, another was a straw lid and another for your hot drinks. I would recommend this product to my friends.

reviews.title: Great cup
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favorite tumbler. I absolutely love the design, the size and the different ways I can use it. I will definitely be putting this cup to a lot of use.

reviews.title: Adaptable cup
reviews.review_text: This tumbler set is pretty much all you need . The different lid attachments make it be the tumbler you need ( water bottle, iced drink or coffee ) I am very interested to see if it will be available at larger sizes and different colors .

reviews.title: Great tumbler!
reviews.review_text: This tumbler is great! It's very sturdy, but not overly heavy. The three different lids it comes with is what does it for me. You can literally use this tumbler for anything by just switching a top! Definitely would recommend.

reviews.title: Must buy item!
reviews.review_text: OK folks this product is next level great! Not only does it keep your drinks cold the lids actually work like they are supposed to. Nothing leaks or drips its fantastic! I love the lid for a bottle to be kept in the tumbler what a great idea!

reviews.title: Great tumbler
reviews.review_text: The Ozark Trail Tumbler and lid set is really great. You can drink out of it with a straw a no spill lid or a water bottle lid. It does not leak. My ice stayed frozen all day. Drinks stayed cold and or hot. Amazing

reviews.title: A new cup
reviews.review_text: The ozark trail tumbler and lid set . I want to buy one for all my family and friends for Christmas they all would love on so bad. It's easy to use and wish too. You don't spill it on you at all.

reviews.title: Great tumbler
reviews.review_text: This cup is great. It keeps my cold drinks cold and my hot drinks hot for a long time. I love the extra attachments that come with it. In my opinion it is as good as the very expensive brand.

reviews.title: Nice and Warm
reviews.review_text: I love the different options with this tumbler. I have used this for keeping coffee and tea warm in the mornings for bus drop off and after work for going on outdoor walks. Keeps beverages warm for a long time.

reviews.title: Innovative design but not for my needs
reviews.review_text: The uses of this product are somewhat limited. You're discouraged from using it for any food and beverages that include sugar, dairy, etc. So, I guess it's mostly just for water. I appreciate the ability to convert it into a bottle and a tumbler with a lid/straw combo but there's no option to simply sip coffee (or any hot or cold beverage) from the tumbler.

reviews.title: Great Tumbler
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely perfect for my husband to bring to work with him! The 3 in 1 is a great feature and I love that it's outdoors!

reviews.title: Loving ittt must try
reviews.review_text: It is best for work I can take anything in it if I take juice it stays cold ,if I take coffee it stays hot and the straw can be cleaned so easily

reviews.title: Good and very useful
reviews.review_text: Its a very nice and good quality tumbler set with all the required accessories along with it. Easy to use and carry

reviews.title: Happy with my tumbler
reviews.review_text: I like this tumbler cause I can have my coffe hot or my beer cold is easy to change the lids and to wash it

reviews.title: Forever warm!
reviews.review_text: Sturdy well made and keeps drinks at their optimal temp forever! I was shocked by how well the insulation works, my drink was warm hours later!

reviews.title: Nice tumbler set
reviews.review_text: I feel that it works just as good as my Yetis. i would definatley buy it and even give as gifts. My son even said that it was good.

reviews.title: Amazing product
reviews.review_text: I loved this set love love love i really recommended i had to go buy one for my hubby cause he wanted to keep mine lol thanks hometesters club.

reviews.title: Great product, very happy
reviews.review_text: This tumbler set is a great product. Easy to clean, has plenty of room and I like that it can have two different tops. I give it 5 stars.

reviews.title: Absolutely worth it
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the water bottle part of the cup. I used it on my 7 mile hike and it stay cold the whole time unlike my other cups

reviews.title: Great!!
reviews.review_text: I love this set! It's super easy to use and works great for all types of beverages both inside and outside the house

reviews.title: Traveling companion
reviews.review_text: I liked the size of the container. Usually they are much smaller and I have never seen the the 2 lids and the bottle pourer before

reviews.title: amazing product a must buy
reviews.review_text: great tumbler very comfortable to carry love all the options for drinking fits all my hot and cold drinking needs definitely recommend

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.review_text: I love how it comes with three different lids! The locking lid is a genius idea! And the bottle lid is a definitely a go to! 10 out of 10!
Great insulated cup with 2 different lids. One lid also includes a clear plastic straw for easy drinking, and the other lid has a cap on it for easy screw off/on option. I also bought one as a gift.

reviews.title: Its amazing product
reviews.review_text: Very nice cup love it for weather changes warm up in cold climates

reviews.title: How can you go wrong 3 in 1
reviews.review_text: We love the 3 In 1 factor versatile feature is awesome we highly recommend this product

reviews.title: Love this tumbler!
reviews.review_text: I love this tumbler! Its so stylish and its perfect for using ice to keep drinks cool!

reviews.title: The Perfect water Bottle
reviews.review_text: Great Set. perfect for Gift giving or for yourself. everything that you need to keep hydrated.

reviews.title: Tumbler its good
reviews.review_text: It doesn't keep ice for very long like some other tumblers

reviews.title: Cold drinks!
reviews.review_text: It keeps my cold for hours even when left in the car

reviews.title: Ozark tumbler
reviews.review_text: Great cup and so versatile! Definitely would have wanted if I saw it on the shelf.

reviews.title: Good for camping
reviews.review_text: I love this it's not bulky. It's decently sized and does an amazing job keeping my drinks cold while camping.

reviews.title: Great tumbler
reviews.review_text: I love this tumbler set. The three lids that come with it are great. I like that I can have a lid to switch up so depending on what I'm drinking it makes it more confusing. I like how well it keeps mu drink hot for hours and does the same thing when I put something cold . The cup is super durable so even if you drop it you don't have to worry about it breaking .

reviews.title: Ozark Trail is my top choice
reviews.review_text: I have tested several similar tumblers and the Ozark Trail Tumbler has blown them out of the water. This particular tumbler actually keeps liquids hot when you want them hot, and cold when you want them cold. I love the versatility with the top, it allows you to have many uses all in one durable and well designed Tumbler!

reviews.title: Awesome tumbler
reviews.review_text: The tumbler's sleek design not only looks great, but it also fits comfortably in my hand. The double-wall insulation keeps my drinks at the perfect temperature for hours. Plus, the lid seals tightly, preventing any spills while I'm on the go. Overall, this tumbler has exceeded my expectations, and I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a reliable and stylish drink companion.

reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold or hot!!!
reviews.review_text: I purchased the Ozark Trail Tumbler and Lid Set 20 oz. to take my coffee to work. It keeps my coffee hot for hours. I have also used it for ice tea and it keeps cold for hours as well. I like the screw top lid as well. This is a great tumbler.

reviews.title: Tumbler
reviews.review_text: I love this appliance so much that I got to try it first hand. I did not feel comfortable with the price range, but I enjoyed using it on a daily basis. WHat strucked out to me the most was the functions available. Tumbler

reviews.title: Good
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed the Ozark Trail Tumbler & Lid Set on my last trip. I thought I would test it out when we took our kids to the zoo. It was easy to use with no leaks. I will continue using it.

reviews.title: Awesome drink mixer!
reviews.review_text: I used this camping and I mixed my drinks with it. It even comes with a reusable nice straw. It kept my drink very cold for like ten hours overnight there were still ice cubes in it!

reviews.title: Buy it! Worth your money!
reviews.review_text: Bought this product, as well as other products in this same brand for a multi state camping trip over the winter. This set was worth the money by far. I loved how it came with different lids, and the straw. It kept water cold for a long period.

reviews.title: Great for on the go
reviews.review_text: I love this because it is great for on the go. I use it for my cold or iced drinks. I also use this for my hotter drinks in the fall and winter. It is also easy to clean, even the straw!

reviews.title: Great tumbler
reviews.review_text: Great tumbler that keeps beverages warm or cold for hours!! Without the steep price of other tumblers out there this product is exceptional.

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.review_text: This Ozark Trail Tumbler & Lid Set 20 Oz. is very nice to used. It's light and handy. It's easy to clean .

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.review_text: I love this ozark set. It works great with hot and cold beverages. It is very easy to clean and use. Also perfect for camping. Highly recommended

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: This is a must have for work or home as it always keeps my drinks hot and it is easy to use and clean. Highly recommend

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.review_text: Great option for a variety of drink choices when you are on the go. Keeps stuff hot/cold for a very long time and the lid straw are great to have.

reviews.title: OZARK
reviews.review_text: Works great ! Keeps hot beverages hot for a long time.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.review_text: This tumbler is awesome! It holds a good amount of drink it definitely keeps it hot or cold

reviews.title: Love this cup
reviews.review_text: This cup is amazing! The lid locks very well for it. No leaking and the different lid selection.

reviews.title: Awesome product!
reviews.review_text: Awesome product. Keeps beverages hot/cold for hours. Perfect for camping.

reviews.title: Product Greatly Exceeded My Expectations
reviews.review_text: Super soft and the perfect size for me! I have tried Turkish Bath sheets but they are too big and heavy, and often rough. This is the perfect combination. And it is very well made and will not come unraveled as some do. Highly recommend! In fact, after I tried this towel my dog inherited my Turkish bath sheets.

reviews.title: Great quality, beautiful color
reviews.review_text: I usually buy all my towels at the big box stores, but this time I went into two big box stores and Walmart to feel the quality and see the colors and these Better Homes and Gardens towels were definitely superior and I was really surprised. I went back home and ordered them from Walmart online and had them shipped back east as a gift for my adult kids with the matching bath rug. They were absolutely thrilled with the quality and the color. I'm really glad I went into all of the stores to feel the quality and see the color, otherwise I might have passed up these Better Homes and Gardens towels.

reviews.title: Best towels yet, if you prep them right that is...
reviews.review_text: Before purchasing I went through many reviews in order to make the right decision. The last towels I purchased was a name brand but they do not absorb any water and you feel cold just trying to dry off. So after reading one person's review on what her mother did I tried to copy that step by step and I love how they came out. I may not have everything she said in her directions but for the most part....first put them in a cool dryer for four or five cycles to get rid of most of the fluff. Then wash with (I used cold water) half cup vinegar. Then dry as normal. They came out wonderful. Soft fluffy and absorbent. And I did the before and after test as shown by the manufacturer. They did actually almost doubled in size after that one wash. Oh, I did not mention, do not use fabric softener. Enjoy!

reviews.title: Soft %26 Absorbent
reviews.review_text: Very soft but absorbent. Just make sure to look at the size before buying, especially if you limited on storage space. I was expecting extra large towels but I was surprised at exactly how large these bath sheets were. It was my fault for not reading the full description %26 I still love them so no harm done. The only issue I had was the shipment packaging was poor. Most were items were not in a plastic wrap. The bath sheets and washcloths were just thrown into a box. The box was poorly taped on top and bottom and was partially opened. It was bad enough that the delivery person recommended I check to see if all my items were there. I don't know at what point in the packaging or shipping process it occurred but at least the items were all there with original tags.

reviews.title: They're okay
reviews.review_text: These towels are nice and thick. They are large enough and do the job. However, they are not super absorbent. I did not look at cotton content. They are 90% cotton and 10% viscose. We have washed the towels twice and both times the dryer vent was FULL of lint from the towels and they continue to shed in the bathroom. I'm hoping the lint issue gets taken care of.
I bought these for my boys' bathroom and they're a great size for thier over 6 ft. frames. These are plush and soft and dry you pretty well (especially after they've been washed a few times).

I have bought the Better Homes and Gardens brand from Wal-Mart before because they are made in the USA. I specifically looked before ordering again and they were listed as made in America. When I received this order, the towels are marked and NOT made in the USA.

reviews.title: Worst towels I have ever purchased!
reviews.review_text: These are the absolute worst towels I have ever purchased in my entire life. I've washed them 5 times already and the lint coming off them is incredible. I see lint pieces inside the tub of my washer and the lint screen for the dryer is choked with lint. Imagine taking a shower and as you are drying yourself off the towel is leaving pieces of lint all over your body that stick and you have to pick the pieces off. Coming from the Baby Boomer generation, I grew up with Better Homes and Gardens being a solid and trusted name, but apparently that is no longer true. You've sold yourself out now for more money combined with no quality. Now I have to throw these towels out and search for something better!

reviews.title: No good
reviews.review_text: Nice color and towel is soft but useless. Not absorbent. The water just sits on top of towel a d it does nothing to dry you or absorb water from body. Seems to me that makes it useless as a towel.

reviews.title: Never Ending Blue Lint %26 Dye Everywhere!
reviews.review_text: I sprung for some new blue towels to match my bathroom. These felt thick, plush, and were a beautiful Navy Blue. What a joke. Thick and plush indeed, but after 4 months, they still put off blue lint everywhere when you dry off with them. After too many washes to count, I can still only wash them with each other because they are still putting off blue dye as well. I do not recommend

reviews.title: Order Cancellation
reviews.review_text: I ordered 3 towels and 3 washcloths but only received 3 towels and 1 washcloth. My order for the remaining 2 washcloths was cancelled. So now I have to return the 2 towels without matching washcloths. Why wasn't my request backordered until more stock was received?

reviews.title: If you want a towel that dries, look elsewhere.
reviews.review_text: I'm old school when it comes to towels. I want a towel that dries, not smears water around. I looked at the ratings on this brand of towel and while some people did give it a bad rating (that's normal) the majority did give it a good rating so I purchased it. I took it home, washed it first (didn't find any lint balls like some people said although it did shed a lot in the dryer on medium heat) and then I took a shower. That's when I knew it wasn't for me. It smeared the water around instead of absorbed it. Just like all the rest. I have old towels from the 70's and 80's that when you use them the water is GONE when you wipe. They ABSORB moisture. This one didn't do that. This was a bath sheet for goodness sake and I still had to use a separate towel to completely dry off (yes I'm a large person but still...) Would not recommend this at all.

reviews.title: Towels Bead Up
reviews.review_text: The towels are soft but not very absorbent. However, after several washings they continue to bead up and get little "beads" over anything else you wash with them. Additionally, the little "beads" fall off onto the floor after the towels are dry whenever you use them. Very disappointing, as they create quite the little mess.

walmart.com is slow in delivering! The boxes were pretty torn and retaped and busting when arrived. Very disappointed in the delivery and delay. We purchased towels and the towels are great and were fine upon delivery. But it sure went through some poor packaging skills and poor timeliness. Two weeks past the posted delivery time and we needed those towels for our guest but did not have.

These towels have spots on them like bleach splattered on them and I don't use bleach. Also, I had to use a lint brush on them to get all the piles of lint off of every towel and washrag. I am so disappointed in them. I have another set of Better Homes and Gardens towels from about 8 years ago and they have been wonderful. That's why I bought these. I am so disappointed in this purchase.

reviews.title: Towels that Stand the Test of Time
reviews.review_text: For years and years I have used Better Homes and Gardens signature towels and never been disappointed!! I noticed recently that I needed more and ordered sets of them.. Since they arrived, I am thrilled. They are the best and stand up to a lot of washing and drying. I simply love them and think thiey are the very BEST!!!!

reviews.title: Beautiful soft, rich, towel set.
reviews.review_text: Beautiful towel set. Luxuriously soft, heavy, well made. This is a rich deep green. I have found they wash well, color stays rich after multiple washings %26 gets even softer with use. I did wash set alone prior to use due to deep color in case of some color loss after 1st wash. I did not notice any loss of color.

reviews.title: A great value for the money!
reviews.review_text: I needed new towels for the guest bathroom. I couldn't find anything worth anything. I spotted these in a Walmart store in another color and purchased them for my bathroom. I was very happy with them, so I purchased them in rose. They are lovely, soft and puffy.

I initially bought these on a whim because our old towels were tattered. These were in a color my husband and I could agree on and the amount of plush in the store was better than many of the other towels on the shelves. There was not a lot of lint created on first and subsequent washing and the towels got fluffier. The towels are very absorbent. My only quibble is they don't dry quickly enough so I end up washing them after 2-3 uses. I loved the towels so much I ordered 2 more thru Walmart . Now considering the tub mat. Not too bad considering I'd written off Walmart towels in the early 90s. This was a big surprise.

reviews.title: Too Plush to Dry Body Quickly %26 Easily
reviews.review_text: I’ve always been super pleased with the quality, construction, %26 colors of Better Homes %26 Gardens bath sheets…until now. What happened?! The towels feel more plush on each side which sounds like it would be great but it is not at all. While cozy, they’re so plush that they don’t seem to wick moisture away as easily as their predecessors. I don’t want to be in bed with my towel blanketing me so coziness only goes so far. I like the previous bath sheet that had differing terry construction on each side. One was more flat - though looped and terry - and the other side a bit more cozy but not to the level of the newest version. The color didn’t meet the image advertised. I was expecting what one may call a muted teal. I rec’d something closer to a medium blue with a tinge of teal. Perhaps that sounds the same. To the eye, it just isn’t except to the eyes of my spouse who is color-blind. It is not a horrible color - it’s nice - just doesn’t meet the advertised image. I hope BHG returns to their previous construction. I love my bath sheets most when they make it easy to dry my body. Who knew that would be the expectation? lol

reviews.title: Niiiiice but heavy on the lint
reviews.review_text: These are great, large and fluffy and great color. Took one star off as they shed a TON when washing (lint trap was completely full after two cycles of drying) so a little wary these may lose quality after a few washes is all. But for the price etc. these are great.

reviews.title: A Great Towel But Also A Lint Factory
reviews.review_text: This towel is soft and absorbent, but don't wash it with anything of color or it will be covered with lint--and not just a little. Make sure you clean your lint filters too. And that stays true for several washings and dryings. Otherwise, it is a great towel.

reviews.title: Gray Towels
reviews.review_text: This is the bath sheet, which is much larger than a regular towel. Some of these size towels are so heavy when they are washed that they throw off the balance of the washing machine. These do not. They wash well and are heavy enough to feel hefty, but not heavy!

reviews.title: They are a great towel but not color fast
reviews.review_text: The towels are plush and great for the purpose of a towel, but the color hasn't stayed in all the towels. These are not even heavy color saturated towels. And yes I did wash originally in cold, but after using them we wash them in hot. (its towel it should be able to handle hot water with other towels of the same color. ) Some not all of the towels I purchased, but i would say 1/3 look more tie dyed now. But if you are looking for something to just dry your body with they are great,

reviews.title: Huge but not thick.
reviews.review_text: Good quality bath sheet. Larger overall but not as thick as my Sam's club bath sheet (which cost me only a buck or two more than this one). The color (taupe) is dull, but for the $4 sale price it's a great deal. If you need a huge towel this is the one to get.

reviews.title: Nice hand and bath towels, but...
reviews.review_text: Nice hand and bath towels, but...The second time I used the wash cloth to wash my face, it discolored while drying on the towel bar. I used a sensitive skin, minimal product face wash and yet it looks likes it was bleached. I purchased several of these and will be returning the rest. These towels appear to be of good quality, however I do not recommend purchasing these towels.

reviews.title: Excessive amount of lint
reviews.review_text: After washing these towels twice before use, there is still an abundant amount of lint left on them and also in the washer and the dryer. I've used a lint roller to clean off most of the lint but haven't been able to actually use them due to the lint problem

I love these towels! They are thick, plush, soft and hold up well in the laundry. No pulls or pilling. They have not faded from use or washing and maintain their softness. One thing I enjoy is wrapping myself in a plush towel after a shower, a luxury feeling without the luxury price. I personally prefer a bath sheet but the regular size bath towels are a substantial size and I'm very happy with this purchase.

reviews.title: Still shedding, but wonderful towels
reviews.review_text: I've washed these towels 3 times and they're still shedding! Not as much as the first time, but they're still shedding. On the other hand, they are wonderful towels! They are very soft and absorbent. The color is charcoal gray, not black. The color has not faded after being washed three times!
they are much better quality than i expected especially for the price. I highly recommend them! i have washed them 4 times now and they are like the day i received them. Get them while you can.
Returned! I was surprised by the low quality of this particular BHG bath towel. After the first regular wash, they not only spotted, but material fragments came off when drying.
Ordered 2 which l received from store delivery and 4 more delivered which l did not order. Color does not work. Once again unable to set up a return

clearly states low lint. my entire washer was covered in towel lint. even after scrapping it off the next load i did was darks and they came out with towel lint all over them. my dryer vent was laoded with lint after drying them.

reviews.title: SUPER soft, oversized towels
reviews.review_text: I purchased these towels for my son who is over 6'3” tall and he loves them. I followed the instructions I read in another review for drying prior to washing, and they have held up beautifully. Definitely would recommend these towels!

reviews.title: Old Rose Bath Sheet is so Luxurious
reviews.review_text: The softest bath sheet ever. Beautiful Old Rose color and is a larger sized bath sheet. Very lofty and launders well with very little lint. It is a heavier towel but so absorbent and luxurious. Good value.

reviews.title: Not quite
reviews.review_text: Great color and size however it was as if I was drying off with a cotton ball. It didn't seem to absorb any moisture. Also they came with snags in them.

reviews.title: Nice, but not as described
reviews.review_text: Towels were thinner than i have already, and the color was suppose to be beige and is a light sage color. Does not match my existing towels of the same brand

reviews.title: Washing NIGHTMARE
reviews.review_text: These are beautiful towels, but they massively “shed” a huge amount of pill/fiber/cotton material when they came out of the washer. It got even worse in the dryer. Getting them “de-pilled” took me hours. 🙁🙁🤕

reviews.title: Luxury feel for a budget price
reviews.review_text: These are beautiful towels; soft, well made, good size, at an incredible price point. However, this particular color (Old Rose) while beautiful, did not match my decor, so I will be exchanging for the Almond Biscuit color.

reviews.title: I love these towels
reviews.review_text: These towels are soft, absorbent and well made. I ordered the first set for myself and liked them so much that I bought a set for each of my adult children.
I have bought many, many towels over the years and the Better Homes and Gardens towels are the best I have ever purchased. I will continue to buy them! I just wish they had them in more colors.

reviews.title: Nice cotton towels!
reviews.review_text: I like these COTTON towels! Soft, thick, absorbent, and the right color for what I needed. They seem to wash well, but if that changes I'll let you know.

reviews.title: Pilling even after washes
reviews.review_text: Great towels EXCEPT even after several washes they are still pilling really bad and get “fluff” on anything washed with them. They've retained softness though so I'm hopeful the pilling will stop and the soft will stay!
Absolutely love this brand, Better Homes %26 Garden. i highly recommend the towels, great in color and texture. But most of all the price is fabulous, you can never go wrong with an affordable price!

reviews.title: Good quality and price
reviews.review_text: These towels wash well, no fading and absorb are soft. I purchased green and last purchase was blue. I recommend because feel and dry better than expensive towels at other department stores.
Better Homes %26 Gardens Signature Soft Solid 6 Piece Towel Set added the perfect visual touch to my newly remodeled bathroom plus feeling great in action. I love them.

reviews.title: A DEFINITE YES
reviews.review_text: The color is vibrant, and the towels are soft and absorbent. There's a nice thickness to it and long enough to wrap around the more voluptuous.😉. I purchased more colors.

reviews.title: Buyer beware!
reviews.review_text: Buyer beware! These towels will leave lint all in your washer and dryer. VERY low quality. Unfortunately I waited too long to return them. Lesson learned.

reviews.title: STILL SHEDDING?
reviews.review_text: Everything is great except for the never ending shedding....The 2 towels have been washed and dried 6-7 times and are still shedding... Cant use them since balls og lint continue on my wet skin...

reviews.title: More colors please
reviews.review_text: LOVE these towels. These are the only towels I buy. I buy the standard size for my kids and the bath sheet version for myself. Love how soft and plush they are and they hold up well for the price. Wish they came in more colors!!

reviews.title: Soft, lovely, affordable
reviews.review_text: Love the color, love the softness, love the price. They've been through 2 months of use and washing and are holding up really well. Couldn't be happier.

reviews.title: Ok but beautiful color
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color in the bathroom. Super thick and soft but the lint that comes off on your skin is super annoying. Otherwise perfect but the price is high. Wish Walmart would carry USA made towels with USA cotton

reviews.title: Soft %26 Absorbent
reviews.review_text: Very soft but absorbent. Just make sure to look at the size before buying, especially if you limited on storage space. I was expecting large towels but I was surprised at exactly how large these were. It was my fault for not reading the full description %26 I still love them so no harm done.

I WILL NEVER BUY ANY OTHER TOWELS!! I honestly didn't expect to care about these towels, I just thought they'd match and we needed more towels so I bought a few to add to what we already have. THEY ARE THE PERFECT TOWELS. Unbelievably soft %26 cozy, fluffy, a good size, and I love the almond biscuit color for a beige theme. We have the matching rug also from Walmart and they look beautiful together and the rug is also 10/10!!! I think im becoming obsessed with the quality and selection of BH%26G items! They are becoming our family's go-to brand for home selections!

reviews.title: BHG Signature Soft Towels
reviews.review_text: The Better Homes and Gardens Signature Soft Towel Set are the best towels I've ever had! I've had high end Department Store towels and they don't compare. These towels are so thick and absorbent and soft! They come in many colors, I use them in all my bathrooms.

reviews.title: Not For Me
reviews.review_text: These are soft towels. They do wrap around comfortably but are not as large as I had hoped. I should have gotten the bath sheet. They are almost too soft, not enough texture for me. The green fuzz flakes off even after several washes. It’s hard to feel like I get completely dry. I want a matching set just to have more and I love the color but I don’t love the texture at all.

These towels are simply the best. They are large, they are incredibly absorbent, unbelievably soft, colors are great, prices are terrific, and possibly the best part is not having to buy an entire set. Sometimes you don't need extra hand towels, but you can use 6 bath towels. I tried these and wound up buying them for the 4 bathrooms in my home. Plus I haven't had a guest who hasn't commented about the quality.

reviews.title: Don't pass these towels up!
reviews.review_text: Towels seem to b getting smaller so that extra 3 inches in width was a welcome surprise. The towels fluffed up nicely after washing and are extra soft. I ordered white towels, and they are snowy white, wash well, and are very absorbent. Great purchase at a great price, I'd buy them again.

reviews.title: Super soft and absorbent, plus a great value!
reviews.review_text: I ordered these bath sheets in shadow grey, and I love them! They're super soft and absorbent. On the same day, I ordered some sage green Turkish bath sheets on Amazon. The Better Homes and Gardens towels were so much nicer! Not only are they more soft and absorbent than the Turkish towels, they were much less expensive, too. I can't speak on how much the BH%26G towels fade because I've only washed them a few times, but I will say they don't leave an excessive amount of lint in my dryer's lint screen. I highly recommend these bath sheets, and I'll probably order more for myself.

The items that I recently purchased for my bathroom are beautiful! The colors quality the softness of the towels. Everything was perfect. I have gone to other stores and I've always regretted it and if I had to take them back and go back to my Walmart. I just purchased of daystray bras. I can't tell you the problem I had trying to find the perfect bra. I purchased several and always ended up taking them back. When I found these bras, I am stocking up on. I can tell you that. They are the most outstanding bras I have ever Seen or had And I will continue to shop only at Walmart

reviews.title: here's why you shouldn't buy this
reviews.review_text: I personally like to use bath sheets. someone told me they got some in the store that were on clearance. I decided to try online and see if I could find some and stumbled upon these. I thought they were really nice. until I washed them. Well, I have never seen towels that shed like this in my life. The washing machine was full of lint I put them in the dryer when I took them out their was lint all over them. ▪️I decided to put them back in the dryer just to run them through again and when I took them out there still was a lot of lint all over them. well I guess I'm stuck with them and the price reflects why they are on clearance. You decide.

reviews.title: Nice Towels
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a new set of towels and saw these on sale so decided to purchase them. I have not used them just yet but they are really nice and I am planning to buy more.

reviews.title: Poor delivery service
reviews.review_text: No issues with the towels. Box was at end of my driveway where anyone could take. I buy a lot from Walmart but don't need to continue if this is how items are going to be delivered.

reviews.title: Towels
reviews.review_text: They are great towels but I suggest washing several times plus drying several times to get all the lent out before use so f not you will have all the lent all over you after a shower and first use…

reviews.title: Terrible packaging
reviews.review_text: Terrible tape job. Physically could see in the box 2 towels and a can off coffee Come on Walmart my last shipment was the same from Walmart. Terrible tape job. Single piece of tape that is not strong enough or the adhesive horrible

reviews.title: Big, soft, fluffy
reviews.review_text: Nice, thick, soft towels. I bought them specifically to make car seat covers out of them. They are oversized and work well for this. I've used them before for seat covers.

reviews.title: Best towels I've purchased in years
reviews.review_text: These are without a doubt the best towels I have purchased in years. Towels are plush, extra absorbent and maintained their softness after washing. Love the colors and sizes. I will definitely buy more of these towels and recommend them to others.

These towels shed like crazy. I washed and dried them and the machine was covered in fuzz. I then used one and I was covered in fuzz. Terrible towels, would never recommend! Will possibly use them for lake days since I can't return

reviews.title: You will love these Towels!
reviews.review_text: These towels are a remarkable value. They are a very good size, absorbency is great and i love that its open stock. Buy 1 or 21, now or in future. Sometimes you just don't want to buy a full set of towels. Thank you Better Homes %26 Gardens, and Walmart.

reviews.title: Its So Fluffy!
reviews.review_text: I normally get my towels from a department store, but I needed one delivered quickly for a gift. Mostly ordered this based on the price and was very happy with what I received. It is surprisingly soft and fluffy. I figured it would be average quality, maybe a little nicer than the main stays brand. It is much nicer than I expected. Better quality than some of the towels I've paid more for at other stores. No loose threads, or skipped loops, tight weave, and wonderful to touch. I'm planning on replacing my towels in the future with these. Honestly, I'm writing this review so I can remember which one it was when I need to order again!

reviews.title: Decadent, rich towel
reviews.review_text: I put this in our guest bath. This baroque pattern has a luxe look and feels high end. I know it's supposed to be a bath towel, but it wasn't thick enough to be a bath towel. And since I only got one, it was unrealistic to use it as a bath towel. So we put it up as a hand towel instead. Beautiful, lovely pattern. Looks rich.

reviews.title: Color fading out after only one wash
reviews.review_text: My wife purchased two bath sheets, two bath towels, and two hand towels. She washed them one time before using them, and started noticing that there were yellow patches and streaks appearing on them, like the color was fading out. We are returning them.

reviews.title: Blue Admiral color throwing away lint when washed
reviews.review_text: I purchased 4 of these bath sheet towels. I loved all of them except this Blue Admiral color because when I washed this towel it started throwing away lint and it was all over the other towels. I only had this issue with this color in particular, the other colors washed well. I will be returning it.

reviews.title: Great Quality Towels
reviews.review_text: The Better Homes & Gardens Signature Towels & Wash Cloth are a Great choice for Towels. I got the Towels in the Soft Silver which is a combination of Silver & Off-White / Cream Color. The Towels are rather thick and this increased upon laundering. The 1st time I washed them I didn't add Fabric Softener, but I've added it since. There was no extra lint the 1st wash and dry. The Towels are So Wonderful. They're thick, absorbent and are beautiful hanging. I have been looking for new Towels & the Better Homes & Gardens Signature Soft Towels excell at the high standards I set for a Great Towel.

reviews.title: Soft Substantial Bath Sheet
reviews.review_text: This towel washes well and came out very soft. Don't use fabric softeners on towels as they won't be as absorbent. The absorbency on this towel was good. The shading of the towel is interesting and a nice change from a solid color towel. This is a very large towel because it is bath SHEET size. This is also a good size for a dog.

reviews.title: Thick and soft
reviews.review_text: These towels are so plush and luxurious. The only reason that I did ot give them 5 stars is because they fill the lint filter in my dryer beyond capacity with lint that they shed. They have been washed and dried 3 times and it hasn't gotten any less.

reviews.title: My new favorite towels!!!
reviews.review_text: For me personally, I LOVE THESE!!! I wanted to replace my towels at an affordable price and got these. They were so soft when I received them and they were still pretty soft after washing and drying. They did shed a lot of lint and I had to clean the trap out twice, but that was not an issue for me, new towels are normally like that at first until you've washed them a few times. They fluffed up very nicely and they are not too thick nor too thin in my opinion. I think they are absolutely beautiful and they look expensive at a cheaper price than most places! They look amazing in my linen closet and have a salon/spa vibe to them! If you just got married or moved to a new place and you need quality and affordable towels that look and work great, I would 100% recommend these!!!

reviews.title: Very soft towels
reviews.review_text: At first I was a little discouraged when I received these towels. They felt thin and not especially soft, however the do fluff up and feel much softer when you wash them. They are thinner than others I've had but just as effective in drying off. And because they are thinner than other more plush towels, the Better Homes and Garden towels require less time in the dryer. I definitely recommend these towels.

reviews.title: Not Sure About the Towels
reviews.review_text: I was disappointed with the color of the towels. They look like a nice dark olive green on the picture, however in person they are a dark sage green. Which is fine but they weren’t the color I wanted. I decided to keep them anyway and when I washed them and I did follow the washing instructions, I pulled out a huge coat of lint from them. I was really shocked by that. I wondered what was left of the towels? They were fine and still fluffy/full. I have posted 2 pictures showing the color difference and the horrible amount of lint I pulled out from the dryer. Only time will tell if these last long.

reviews.title: Best towel EVER!
reviews.review_text: So I received the better Homes & garden bath towel in a light grey color. This towel is the best towel I've ever had. It's so soft & the perfect size. The directions do say to wash before use & we did that, had no fibers or fuzzies when drying off & towel stayed soft & no fading of the color.

reviews.title: Love these towels!
reviews.review_text: I got these originally for my daughter as shes grown out of the little newborn baby bath towels and i got her the white ones and omg they're so thick and fluffy! idk if its becaue I usually buy the thin cheap ones for myself but that's what my family used to get and I still have them years later, even though they suck lol but i wanted to get my daughter some nice towels that didnt cost like $50 per towel lol and these are amazing! she's dry as soon as i wrap her up in them and transfer her to the couch to moisturize and chnge her, i hardly have to dry her, and the towel stays dry! but she is only 6 months old so now much to dry conpared to an adult . We plan to buy some for us! I washed them on the gentle cycle and dry them in the dryer so they're fluffy and not stiff and they do give off a good amount of lint in the dryer and some on my daughter's body when drying but its okay, it comes off later on as the day goes by and shes dry. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Best towel ever
reviews.review_text: This has to be the most softest towel i have ever owed. It feels like velvet, silk soft. The towel is a bit thicker and heavier than a normal towel. It wraps around my body nicely. But the best part is it dries super fast. After my shower i hang it up to dry and it dries quick. I would highly recommend this towel. We love it.

reviews.title: Thumbs Up! for Super Soft and Extra Absorbent
reviews.review_text: This towel does what it claims it does! It's made of cotton, SUPER SOFT cotton that is. It's extra absorbent, and durable. A very well made towel with pretty reinforced borders. I like the shade of blue against the bright white color. I can imagine these thick towels will last a very long time. I used mine right after a shower and only had to go once over with this towel to absorb very shower drop. I'll be buying these towels, that's for sure. They are a great value, definitely worth the price.

reviews.title: Big and comfy bath towel
reviews.review_text: Better homes and garden viscose bath towel is one of my favorites towel to use after the shower. It's very big and wraps around my whole body after the shower. It dries off your skin completely. It is very soft and keeps it form after a wash and dry cycle. It is easy to clean and never smells musty. It dries completely and gets fluffy after it dries. I got the Grey and white flower pattern on my towels. I definitely recommend these towels for your next must have purchase!

reviews.title: not your average towel
reviews.review_text: This is a big towel. This is a soft towel. This is a pretty towel. This is a beautifully soft, huge towel. I dont generally buy the expensive or really big towels. I usually buy the smallish, cheapish towels. This is one of those towels that I can only fit 2 or 3 into my washer. I will enjoy this towel and probably not do a good job of sharing this towel. It is mine.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this towel. I bought the blue floral towel for a houseguest. First wash and my washer was full of blue fuzzies. I then dried it and 2 weeks later I'm still pulling blue fuzz out of my dryer. My houseguest used the towel once. There is blue fuzz all over my bathroom, including in the tub. I will be throwing this towel away and buying better quality bathtowels elsewhere.

reviews.title: Luxurious! Softest thickest best made towels ever!
reviews.review_text: Luxurious. Ultra soft and thick - the softest, thickest towel I've ever felt. Very well made. Super absorbent. Quality quality, quality! This will be my go-to towels from now on. A little bit resilient at first, but after first wash, still luxurious, soft and thick, and more absorbent. Better Homes %26 Gardens, you really nailed this one - the best of the best! My highest recommendation!

reviews.title: Love this towel
reviews.review_text: This towel is so soft! It is very plush yet also dries you off quickly. I also love how the color matches easily with everything because it's a subtle grey/silver. The size is perfect for my entire family, which is awesome since I have some tall kids!

reviews.title: impressed, good quality
reviews.review_text: Very impressed with the quality of these towels beautiful color and great texture. Fairly absorbent I typically only buy 100% cotton. These are a mixed blend but worked very well. No lint left behind. Look great after a few washes. Would definitely buy again in different colors.

reviews.title: Loveeee
reviews.review_text: I really love these two bath towels. They are extremely cute and comfortable. They are really soft and really great material. They are fluffy and really long. I was really surprised by how thick these towels are. They absorb water easily and make perfect decorative towels for your bathroom. I would definitely recommend this set. It’s is extremely nice and good quality.

reviews.title: Super big and super soft
reviews.review_text: I love these bath sheets. My husband got them for me because I love extra large towels. He saw these and how big and soft they were and knew immediately I would love them. Which I do. They're the best bath sheets I've ever had. I would highly recommend them to anyone who is as picky as I am about my towels. I'm a little bit big and they fit around me perfectly and have no problems staying up when I tuck it in. I love how soft they are as well. I really love better homes and gardens products. I have towels, sheets, blankets and a few other items from them and I really like all of them.

reviews.title: Nice towel set
reviews.review_text: I received this better homes and gardens 90% cotton, 10% viscose bath towel. It comes with a bath towel, wash cloth and hand towel. It is well made. It holds up to being used and also washes and dries well. It is a nice Grey color and is soft to use.

reviews.title: Big Comfy Bath Towel
reviews.review_text: I received the better homes and garden bath towel to try it is Big and very comfortable Bath Towel the color is very pretty and the softness is something i really love with this towel and it is long in length and drys you off without leaving wet spots.

reviews.title: Very disappointing! Oddly does not dry you!
reviews.review_text: Looks great! Very soft. I bought two 3-piece sets in navy. Washed before using, and they left lots of lint in the lint trap. It snagged long threads when I dried a comb on it! Does not feel good when drying yourself after a shower and leaves lint on you. That might improve after multiple washings. Very soft, but oddly doesn't dry you well. Just odd feeling. Must be the 10% viscose?? I bought this brand years ago and they were great. Still using them, but they're 100% cotton. These do not dry you. Do Not recommend.

reviews.title: Beautiful, thick towel
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this towel. Yes, I know, it's just a towel, but like everything else, there are good and bad. This towel is amazing! It's very thick. It's very absorbent. I love the color and design. It washes and dries well with minimal lint (and no fuzz on me!). It dries quickly and doesn't have a musty damp smell. I plan to buy these for both bathrooms since I love them so much.

reviews.title: Soft and thick
reviews.review_text: This is a nice quality towel, soft and thick. It dries well. I use unscented detergent so I can't speak to the scent lasting technology that it claims to have, but it did initially have a bit of a chemically smell that took a couple of washes to go away.

reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY
reviews.review_text: Very nice hand towels. The Grey is a dark stone grey, but not black. They came fast. Nicely packed. They wash up nicely. No fading or shrinkage. Wash in cold water, no bleach use Clorox Sanitizer liquid disinfectant cleaner. Dry on low. Keeps them from shrinking. The quality is outstanding their not your $2.99 towels their medium weight. I liked them so much, I ordered the matching bath towels. Their Great! Highly Recommend. You have to pay a little more to get Quality.

reviews.title: Super Soft!
reviews.review_text: I selected these Better Homes & Gardens Signature Soft Solid Bath Towel - Arctic White towels to replace my current bath towels. I like to rotate my towels every few years or as needed. The description sounded promising and offering good quality. However, I was very surprised how soft these were, right out of the box. The description mentioned how “extremely soft and fluffy” they were, and they truly are. I have washed them 2 times using laundry soap and bleach and they remained just as soft and fluffy. I hate to say it, but I can defiantly feel the difference between these new towels and my older towels. They are also thick and very absorbent. I use the Hand Towle for the guest bathroom and my guest even commented on how soft the hand towel was. I have always purchased white towels because of the ability to always use bleach to wash them, but sometime the bleach tends to add roughness to the texture of my towels, but I can pleasantly say that these towels continue to be very soft. I plan to purchase more of these towels as I change out and rotate my towels. I highly recommend these towels.

reviews.title: Best Bath Towels EVER!
reviews.review_text: Better Home and Garden bath towels are the best. They take one or two washes to remove the lint, but that’s all. They are so soft to dry with and absorb excess moisture from your skin and hair very quickly. I have used one for almost a year and it has stood the test of time. I just bought four more to replace the ones that I received as a gift from the Pottery Barn.

reviews.title: Good Product!
reviews.review_text: Overall, I am fairly happy with the Better Homes and Gardens bath towel. It is a Signature Soft bath towel that is made with cotton that is sustainably grown in the USA. It is very soft and fluffy and has a nice thickness to it. However, the only thing I wasn't happy with is that I don't find it to be as absorbent as I personally like a towel to be, and even after a few washes, it didn't seem to get more absorbent. I think for most people, it will work just fine and it has some great features that will appeal to others. It is fade resistant and has low lint. It has an Intellifresh freshness protection that keeps it smelling fresh over time. It has PureLOFT technology that makes the towel loftier after the first few laundry cycles in the washer and dryer. It's a pretty standard sized bath towel at 30 inches by 56 inches. I love the silver color and it looks great with a lot of décor. I like the simple stitching design pattern because it's just enough to give it a little bit of interest, but doesn't seem overpowering to be able to pair with other towels or décor. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a unique towel with some features, that is a simple design to match most décor!

reviews.title: Check towel patterns closely!!
reviews.review_text: I love these towels; quality, softness, and thickness are very good. However, I took off 2 stars off because the towel pattern on this order of bath towels was different from pattern on my previous order (ex: bath towels are one pattern and wash cloths were another pattern). Hence, bath towels do not match with other towels in our bathroom. I am not sure why/how this happened. Next time, I will buy in store to ensure towels match.

reviews.title: Plush but not not moisture wicking
reviews.review_text: I was excited to use my new Better Homes and Gardens Bath Towel. These towels feel extremely plush, soft, and fluffy, like hotel-style towels. They do pick very easily, and the weaving/loops of fabric were picked easily when removing the tags. It seemed to wash well several times. When using, the towel feels great, but it is not very absorbent. Although it feels great on your skins, the plushness of the towel doesn't wick away water; it just smears it around. Feels luxurious, but doesn't really hold up to the purpose of a bath towel.

reviews.title: Nice Towels!
reviews.review_text: Needed to order towels online for pickup and was nervous doing so since I couldn't see them in person first. I went with these since I have other Better Homes %26 Gardens products that are nice so was hoping for the best. Luckily, these are perfect. They are soft and thick, but not too thick. They absorb well and wash and dry nicely. I purchased wash cloths, hand towels, and bath towels and am happy with everything.

reviews.title: So soft
reviews.review_text: I recieved Better Homes and Gardens Thick and Plush Fashion Bath - Paisley Silver. The bath towel and hand towel are super soft. The towels soak up water easy but it doesn't feel wet against your body. The Paisley design is pretty. The towels stitching is good. They are white with silver on one side and silver and white on the other. They don't leave lint behind. The towel is big and wraps around me all the way. I will be purchasing 3 more. One more silver and two blue ones to match.

reviews.title: never buy towels online
reviews.review_text: Reviews for this item varied widely but were mostly high. Perhaps now I know why. I ordered 4 white hand towels, I expected them to match. I received 2 towels that were thick and beautiful and 2 towels that were thin and cheep looking. If I had received 4 matching thick towels I would have rated 5 stars, if I had received 4 thin cheep towels I would have rated 1 star - so lets split the difference 3 stars

reviews.title: Must have towels
reviews.review_text: Love this new Better Homes and Garden towel! I love the size! It's a full grown towel, almost beach towel size except with it's not thin like a beach towel. It is super soft but still soaks up so much water!! No crazy designs or weird stripes, just a nice classy towel that is perfect for decoration as well as effectiveness!! Will definitely be buying a few more

reviews.title: Soft, absorbant, and holding up well so far
reviews.review_text: I was actually very pleasantly surprised by the quality of this towel! I love a good bargain in most cases but I am very particular about the towels I buy because I want them to be soft, absorbent, and last for a very long time. I usually get pretty pricey ones from a department store so I have to be honest that I just wasn't expecting this towel to be as nice as it seems so far. It was completely unabsorbent and frustrating after the first two washes but starting after the third wash it has an incredible texture and so far, after five washes, I haven't seen any loose threads or pulling/misshapen areas. The color is very pretty, sort of a slate grey blue, and the waffle texture looks pretty hanging in the bathroom. I wash my towels with all natural odor removing detergent after every second shower so I haven't really noticed or had this one long enough to know if the "Intellifresh TM Freshness Protection" really does anything to help but I do like the idea of it. It's also very important to me that it's made with USA grown cotton. If it was organic cotton it would absolutely be a five star towel. I really prefer organic cotton so I'm on the fence about whether I'll buy more or not but I would absolutely recommend them to anyone who isn't quite as concerned about that.

reviews.title: Not 100% cotton. EW.
reviews.review_text: Ugggh why do companies make towels that aren’t 100% cotton??? These just smear water around—they don’t actually absorb anything! Yes, my mistake for blindly trusting the Better Homes and Gardens name. It never occurred to me that they would have such low quality items. I know better now. These are junk.

reviews.title: Top notch quality towels!
reviews.review_text: Better Homes & Garden Signature Soft Textured Bath Towel In Admiral Blue is a top quality product. It's soft to the touch. The pattern is one sided which is also a design that will help it dry quickly. The size is generous for a bath towel. The color selection is great and I'm happy with the Admiral Blue. It's rich enough to look even more expensive than it was. You can't go wrong with these absorbent towels. They wash up nicely, too.

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.review_text: These are lovely. Very thick and soft and wash up well. They do shed a bit when you first use them but after washing them a couple of times they get better. I think these would make a lovely gift to add to a set as well. I love the fact they come in three different colors. I think it adds to the beauty.

reviews.title: Soft and plush
reviews.review_text: This towel is of very good quality. As recommended, I washed it before using it and it came our super soft and fluffy right our of the dryer. The blue water color is a soft, beautiful color that eqsuly blends with the reat of my bathroom decor. This towel features "intellifresh" freshness protection which should keep it from smelling bad or musty after repeated use. I found this towel to be very absorbent. I will have to get other sizes to complete the set.

reviews.title: My Favorite Towels!
reviews.review_text: These towels are exceptional. So plush that you feel you've bought linens from where 5-star hotel spa's buy from. No joke! They are amazing quality. I purchased the sets in Old Rose color and they are perfect for my Dusty Pink bathroom. I would recommend them to everyone who loves plush "expensive-feeling" towels without paying the expensive price!

reviews.title: Super plush, soft towels the whole family love!!
reviews.review_text: I love plush towels. I feel like there is nothing better than a nice thick, plush, soft towel after a nice shower. Well these towels fit the bill. My 6 and 10yr olds were impressed when I unboxed these and wanted to snuggle them like blankets. They have been used, washed and dried many times in less than 2 weeks time. Each time they come out of the dryer someone grabs it (instead of the bathroom Set) for their showers. They are beautiful and just amazingly soft! I definitely plan to get more of these to have on hand so I don’t have to keep sharing mine haha ;)

reviews.title: Never-ending lint
reviews.review_text: Still sheds lint horribly after multiple washes.

reviews.title: Lost hope.
reviews.review_text: This is a nice big towel for curvy people, BUT!!!! This is a lousy towel as for as the amount of lint it leaves on your body. Will be returning!

reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
reviews.review_text: These towels are top tier quality. I was pleasantly surprised. They wash well and maintained their softness. I highly recommend.
This is a very soft bath sheet, i had older ones of the same brand that i was replacing, glad the quality is still the same.
love the towels, washed and dried and they fluff right up. Big and fluffy and dried off fast. Great for absorbing water. Will buy more.
Was supposed to be a pack of 4 wash cloths, and I only got 1 wash cloth! Waiting for the other 3! It was a pack of 4! Please ship these to me!

reviews.title: Big %26 soft.
reviews.review_text: Love how soft they are as well as the size of the towels. Always look for other colors when I'm in Walmart.
Love. It feels very luxurious and it's huge. The cost is incredibly low. Excellent value. Walmarts really stepping up their game. Wtg

reviews.title: Best Bath Sheet
reviews.review_text: The material is very high quality. It absorbs moisture very well. Arrived on time. Great value for the money. Beautiful color hasn't faded yet.

reviews.title: Luxury quality
reviews.review_text: I gave these a try on a whim after being influenced on IG and I'm now replacing all my guest towels with these!

reviews.title: Just Okay
reviews.review_text: Towels are above average. The wash cloths have such a large design stripe on them that it makes the cloth very rough and uncomfortable.

reviews.title: B H %26 Gardens Old Rose Plush Hand Towels
reviews.review_text: Plush hand towels. Old Rose is a soft beautiful color. It's not pink but a very elegant tone. More of a neutral shade. Good quality and price.

reviews.title: Excellent set of towels
reviews.review_text: Very fluffy, thick and have not faded or lost color. Very pleased with these towels. Seems like more expensive set of towels.
Really big, super soft and comfy. Got a great deal probably because of the color but I don't care it's a fabulous towel.

reviews.title: Too fluffy
reviews.review_text: These are really nice towels , but are a little thick and fluffy to my liking. Wash cloths are even worse, seems to be same thickness as towels. Probably when they are half worn out they will be fine.
Love the BHG towels from Walmart. Purchased BHG plush towel set several years past. It was time to try them again. Wash well and are soft ane absorbent. Recommend.

reviews.title: Towels will lose color after one wash
reviews.review_text: Washed the towels once before use (no prior loads with bleach before this wash) and behold the towels look like they’ve been bleached. I’m so upset do not buy these !
Fabulous to the touch....thicker, softer, and way yummier than the few other brands that I purchased online via Walmart recently for my newly renovated house.

reviews.title: Seams Unraveling
reviews.review_text: The towels are super soft and wash well. However, after just a couple of washes, the seams started unraveling and completely coming unsewn. Bad, cheap quality. I guess you get what you pay for. Would not recommend.

I purchased two of these towels. Washed before using and used once and the ends of the towels started to unravel. Not happy with them at all. I purchased some 7-8 years ago and they're still holding up.
After one washing, there was a lot of lint that is getting over everything in the bathroom when we use them. I don't recall the BH%26G towels I previously bought doing that. Very disappointed.

reviews.title: blue skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this towel in dark blue , when I use it it leaves blue dye and blue lint like pieces on my skin. I expect better from this brand, waste of money

reviews.title: Great Towels at a Great Price
reviews.review_text: I bought a few in store and I wanted a few more but this one was the last available! I love these bath sheets. They are so huge and quality material. They have stayed soft and thick throughout multiple uses and washings

reviews.title: The worst towels
reviews.review_text: This towel sheds fibers on my body, and inside the tub where I dry off. I can't believe how much this costs for such poor quality. I wouldn't recommend these towels to anyone.

reviews.title: Fabric will fall apart
reviews.review_text: The fabric is too soft, it will just fall apart and you'll be covered in a thin layer of fabric after using it.

reviews.title: skip
reviews.review_text: color blue was a litte light but still a great product will buy again with a dark blue

reviews.title: soft towels
reviews.review_text: like that it's thick and soft haven't used yet but have purchased better homes and garden towels before and they've lasted for years
Snags. Even when package came, snags. Price too good to pass it. But this particular one pulls. You get what you pay for

reviews.title: Love ‘em!
reviews.review_text: Love these towels! They are so soft and absorbent. I have purchased several sets. Please keep stocking them!

reviews.title: Good Delivery
reviews.review_text: They delivered it perfectly, (lately I have an issues with delivery). Item is as described. Currently washing it now to get it fluffed.

reviews.title: Great towels.
reviews.review_text: I like these towels and will buy them again. They are soft, thick, and I felt my money was well-spent.
Better Homes %26 Gardens is my brand for Towels, which I can buy without looking at the reviews. This Admiral blue is very attractive.

reviews.title: Spa-like towels
reviews.review_text: These hand towels are well worth the price. They are very soft and luxurious and look like spa towels. They look fantastic with my bathroom redo.

reviews.title: A Little Too Fluffy
reviews.review_text: I wanted thick, fluffy towels. These are definitely thick and fluffy! They are a little hard to dry off with and take forever to dry in the dryer.

reviews.title: Beautiful and plush
reviews.review_text: This towel set is exactly what I needed! They are so soft and plush. I love how it is reversible and both side are so beautiful. I can't wait to order more.
These towels are top quality towels. They are so soft and stay soft! I washed and dried them as directed and they are just as soft as they were out of the box!! Good investment! large bath sheets!!
Good quality, fairly expensive especially with shipping, but I couldn't get it at the local store so online was a good second option. Not one I will use often though.

reviews.title: AWESOME QUALITY :)
reviews.review_text: These towels are AWESOME, really the best I've ever bought. Super soft yet still absorbent. Originally bought a set of 4 and just came back for another set! Excellent quality, worth every penny! BH%26G quality :)

reviews.title: Very Soft.
reviews.review_text: Great towels I originally ordered these towels as a wedding gift they where are so thick and soft I bought some for our house. I definitely would purchase these again. You won’t be disappointed.

The best towels I have ever owned!! Larger size, super soft which only gets better with each wash. And they get thicker and fluffier after washing. They are super warm as well. I have already ordered more.

reviews.title: Beautiful color in a good quality good value towel
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color that matches with the shower curtain and assessories in a heavy but soft towel that absorbs water and dries well. The color does not fade with numerous washing nor does it pill.

reviews.title: luxurious
reviews.review_text: I thought it was very thick and luxurious but decided to go with a different color and size to make my great grandson's hooded bath towel. I would recommend it to anyone who wants and extra large and nicely thick bath sheet.

reviews.title: bought multiple times!
reviews.review_text: i ADORE these towels!! i bought one each for both my husband and i, and between its size its softness, we had to go ahead and buy another set! these are so nice!

reviews.title: Buy them.
reviews.review_text: Really nice. Wash great dry well no lint after initial few washes. Do not use fabric softener. They are soft enough and absorb well as is. Great buy all sizes.
The towels seem great. I just haven't had a chance to use them yet. Received some of them as a gift and wanted to get a few more to have a complete set. They appear to be good quality though.
They need to make these so you can pull the tag off them. The tags are way too big for the towels and they are obnoxious aside from that. The towel quality is very good.

reviews.title: Better Homes %26 Garden Signature Bath towels
reviews.review_text: I got one of each color. Big, Nice material. Thick. Worth the price, I bought them on sale. I won't be buying any other brand but this one if they keep it the same and don't change anything.

reviews.title: DURABLE CLASSIC TOWELS.
reviews.review_text: Very soft, absorbent and thick. I have 3 sets and the colors are rich, they wash well and no issues with wear. One set is over 2 years old and still looks fresh with no fading. I highly recommend. Value for money!
they are a perfect towel for drying off after a shower, they are really soft and warm and they are the best towels I've ever had and are great for this 72 year old man.

reviews.title: Fuzz Everywhere!
reviews.review_text: These towels are the worst! They discontinued the other Better Homes towels. Which, were of course, $2.00 less. Do not buy. Huge chunks of lint all over the towels and my washer.

reviews.title: Awesome thick towel
reviews.review_text: Thick plush soft towel. Love the plush and size. Good stitching that hopefully won't unravel like some of our other towels. Color doesn't seem to fade in wash. Good asorbency is appreciated after bathing.

reviews.title: Love the size, not the shedding of lint
reviews.review_text: Love the size, but it sheds and lint gets all over everything. Guess I should have washed it first. But once again love the size and thickness for the price.

reviews.title: Poor service
reviews.review_text: Towel is decent. However I ordered 6 and got 2. They claimed because they had a picture of the delivery I had the merchandise. I went back and forth with customer service 3 times. It was a difficult process. Finally the 3rd person helped and I'm told they'll be making the refund now.

reviews.title: Best towels in the store
