reviews.review_text: Great bath towels! Used to by designer labels @ TJ Maxx but haven’t been satisfied so thought if I tried these I wouldn’t lose a lot of money if I wasn’t happy. These are now my favorites! Working on replacing all towels in both bathrooms. Super soft %26 absorbent they do shed a lot of lint in the dryer so time will tell on how well they hold up.

reviews.title: Poor Online Return Process
reviews.review_text: The towels are okay, pretty decent for a low-price towel. The online ordering experience was awful. I am recovering from a foot injury, so walking through a parking lot and big box store is challenging for me. I'd seen these at a friend's house and liked them, so I ordered four bath towels online. I received three bath towels and one bath sheet in error, so I started the exchange process online. One of the return options was to send the towel back through a FedEx Office location. I checked, and there were several including one in my town, so I chose that option (again, trying to avoid going to the next town and dealing with the Walmart parking lot and store). The next screen only gave me limited FedEx Office locations, the closest being in that Walmart I was trying to avoid. At that point, I couldn't go back and change my return option. So, I brought the bath sheet to my Walmart on the next Saturday, only to discover that the FedEx Office in the Walmart is only open limited hours on weekdays, meaning I will have to do all of that again on Monday and rush to make the hours after work. If I had a lot of free time and if I weren't recovering, this would STILL be an annoying inconvenience. Next time, I will use Amazon.

reviews.title: Did not receive what I ordered
reviews.review_text: I ordered 2 Better homes and Gardens 4 packs of signature soft bath towels. However I only was sent 2 towels. Each towel came in a separate box. My order shows that both quantities of four towels I ordered was delivered - but clearly was not. Very disappointing.

reviews.title: Poor refund transaction still waiting on full refu
reviews.review_text: Towels were delivered timely and all white however two different designs. I submitted a return but was not refund for one towel out of four and one washcloth out of 10. My email shows all four towels and all 10 washcloths. I called customer service and I assume it is being completed but have not yet seen total refund

reviews.title: Soft towels
reviews.review_text: I like these towels. They are soft and fluffy and the color is appealing. They come out of the dryer feeling as soft as they were when new. They are not quite as heavy in the hand as the very expensive towels, but they have a good weight and I love how they feel.

reviews.title: One of the better towels I've owned!
reviews.review_text: Every time I need new towels I always buy the Better Homes %26 Gardens Signature line. It's a quality product that holds up and washes very well. They last a long time. Top notch quality. Everything holds up so far from the stitching, no unraveling. The cotton is soft and strong. Love it. Just be careful ordering online because sometimes they'll send you different decorative stitching. I imagine BHG did a design change and some of the warehouses have different stock. So the decorative banding might be different. So might be better to buy in the store to make sure you get everything matching.

reviews.title: Love these towels!
reviews.review_text: Returned these towels b/c the color didn’t match the BR.Very disappointed b/c I love these towels- perfect softness, medium weight, absorbent (I have a different color in my other bathroom) and wash well with some initial wash/dry lint but no fading.

reviews.title: Worth every penny
reviews.review_text: These towels are as soft and absorbent as other reviews stated. I’ve come to expect new towels to be non-absorbent until many washes, however these are very absorbent from the first washing. And they’ve maintained their fluffy softness. However as also expected with new towels, there is a lint factor that exists and I would imagine will go away with a few more washes. Overall, they’ve hit 2 out of 3 out of the ballpark and I therefore recommend these towels. Also, cannot beat the price for the quality provided.

reviews.title: Various in dye lots and can catch on necklaces
reviews.review_text: These are fluffy and absorbent towels. However, there was color variation between shipments of these towels. Also, they tend to catch on jewelry chains to the extent that I was afraid the chain would break when trying to free it from the towel loop.

reviews.title: Nice washcloth
reviews.review_text: These washcloths are nice and thick. They are large enough and do the job. However, they are not super absorbent. I did not look at cotton content. They are 90% cotton and 10% viscose. We have washed the towels twice and both times the dryer vent was FULL of lint from the towels and they continue to shed in the bathroom. I'm hoping the lint issue gets taken care of.

reviews.title: Great except for lint initially
reviews.review_text: Perfect color for my white and light silver color bathroom. I've washed them once, and there was a ton of lint. Make sure you don't wash them with anything else in the beginning. I don't know how many washings until they stop shedding. They are thick, soft, fluffy and very well priced.

reviews.title: Its ok
reviews.review_text: Just like the picture but it leaves too much residue of the fabric when used.

reviews.title: Plush, absorbent, stylish!
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love these towels. They are so soft, and even after washing several times they remain just as soft. No pilling, pulls, or pieces of the towel coming off. Usually I have found that if a towel is that soft it isn't as absorbent. But these ones really are. And they don't feel soaking wet after using them. The bath towel is a generous size and dries pretty quickly. I love the pattern as well. The detail in the stripes and the trim along the bottom are a nice touch. The hand towel is being used in our powder room/guest bathroom because it looks so nice! These look and feel well-made and would definitely make a great engagement, bridal, or housewarming gift.

reviews.title: Pretty and fluffy but already starting to unravel
reviews.review_text: These towels are so pretty and even though they are soft and fluffy, they don't seem to dry me very well and I don't use fabric softener in the wash or the dryer. Also, after only the first washing, the sides started to unravel already so I will not recommend. So we'll see how long these last.

reviews.title: Bath & Hand Towel a Joy To use!
reviews.review_text: When I received the towels package, I was surprised to find a hand towel included too. The navy blue color is rich looking. Once you pick it up you can feel that it's soft, And a nice thickness. Once you feel it wrapped around you, I noticed you dry off much quicker. The strip ripping in the BATH towel pattern, makes it look fresh and modern looking. Once you wash, it looks brand new again. It's so nice to have a HAND towel to match the bath towel for show, and to just grab to use for Hand washing for fast drying. You might want to get more than one set, because you will fall in love with it, once you use it!

reviews.title: it's soft and dries well
reviews.review_text: I have a thing with textures, I have to have soft cloth I just can not with scratchy material. This towel is soft and absorbent. I am a bit disappointed it came with 2 loose threads, but I snipped those off and it seems to be fine now. Still looks nice, matches my décor, and does what it is intended to do.

reviews.title: Soft and fluffy
reviews.review_text: These towels are so soft and fluffy. They're a wonderful thickness, they absorb well, and they hold their shape after washing. These towels make you feel pampered because of their softness and thickness. Even after washing, they felt wonderful and even a bit more fluffy. I like the fact that after washing the cotton trim didn't shrink up; they stayed smooth and the towels retained a new look. I have the navy blue ones and the color is a rich dark blue. The trim and stripes are very pale blue; not white. Bath size towel is 30"W x 54"L. They are made of 100% soft cotton, in China. The quality of these towels is excellent.

reviews.title: Pretty but not well made
reviews.review_text: I bought these bath-sheets and laundered them by themselves in my front loader before using. They came out of the dryer covered in pull places with strings hanging everywhere! This is ridiculous. I have towels from Sam's that I've used for 5 years that haven't done this after years of washing and drying. These weren't cheap either at $15 each!

reviews.title: Don't do it!
reviews.review_text: This towel really sucks! It made me hate all my other towels. Its like drying in the lap of luxury. Its so thick and soft. And its super absorbent! I love it. The color is amazing. If you want to regret every other towel purchace youve ever made, buy this one.

reviews.title: Terrible Towel
reviews.review_text: Looked great when I got them, love the color. love the fluff. BUT after only 2 washes, 1 in cold and 1 on warm, no bleach, there are strands coming out of towel and the whole towel has splotches of yellowing. The towel looks like Ive had it for years instead of less than 2 weeks. I thought Home and Garden was a good brand and the reviews were really high but my experience was horrible and I will not waste any more money on a shoddy product like this.. i would definitely not recommend this towel, unless you like crappy looking towels after 2 uses.

reviews.title: Thick and Plush Fashion Bath Towels
reviews.review_text: I was given the opportunity to get this FREE from Walmart Spark Review program to give my opinion on the Better Homes & Gardens Thick & Plush Fashion Long Bath towel & hand towel. Which came in 1 package. The design is unique as i never seen towels like this before by BH&G. The hand towel is very absorbent and soft to the touch. No loose strings, very well made. The huge bath towel also very well made & very soft to the touch. I was able to dry off after my shower with no issues. The color scheme is perfect for my home & my sons are envious i got this to check out. Cant wait to find this in the store and buy more towels for my home.. I highly recommend for you to purchase.

reviews.title: So Soft and Luxurious!
reviews.review_text: This Better Homes & Gardens towels is great! It is very fluffy, thick, and luxurious feeling. It's recommended you wash it first before initial use. It laundered well in my washer and dryer and came out perfectly. I really appreciate the large size of the towel- I am 5'4" and it reaches from my armpit to below my knees, and wraps around with enough coverage in the front. It's very absorbent and feels wonderful on the skin. Also, there's no annoying lint left behind! I'd definitely recommend getting a set of these for the whole household!

reviews.title: Great quality!
reviews.review_text: This towel is so soft i love the texture and the weight of the towel even the size is larger than the regular. After the first wash it looks just as new and I'm shocked because I've bought name brand towels and they either shed or start falling apart after the first wash but not these. One last thing to mention is the absorbance I was completely dry really fast I love these towels i really recommend them.

reviews.title: shedding all the time
reviews.review_text: Leaves type body full of lint. i washed 2 times hoping the lint was from the factory but no, the material feels like is slowing disintegrating, it is awful. i bought 4 colors, the darker ones are the worse. The darker ones also stained the lighter ones when i washed them together. BAD BAD BAD MATERIAL
Soft thick fluffy towels! Exactly as I wanted. I bought this same brand 10 years ago and they have held up beautifully.
The towel fibers get all over you. I’ve had to wash and dry and it multiple times.

reviews.title: Too Much Lint
reviews.review_text: After one washing, the towels left a lot of lint. I don't recall the previous BH%26G towels I purchased doing that. Very disappointing.

reviews.title: A perfect blend of portability, power, and eco-fri
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The compact design of the Belkin BoostCharge 45W USB-C Wall Charger allows me to carry it effortlessly in my handbag, making it especially convenient during travels. Previously, I had to carry both a cable and a bulky adapter, which was inconvenient and took up unnecessary space. This Belkin charger has resolved that issue; it's powerful enough to charge my devices quickly and compact enough to carry anywhere. The foldable prongs are a thoughtful feature, preventing any damage to my bags and making it incredibly travel-friendly. Overall, the Belkin BoostCharge Compact USB-C Wall Charger 45W has exceeded my expectations, combining efficiency with portability.

reviews.title: USB-C Compact Charger
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The universe must have known, because as soon as I received this compact usb-c charger, my phone broke and my new phone uses a usb-c cable. And the phone only comes with the charging cable, not the outlet cube, so this was literally perfect timing as I have no other usb-c chargers. I was initially surprised at how small the charger is (see picture with hand for size reference), but it is small but mighty! I love the compact design, as I can take this charger with me anywhere. I throw it in my work bag, bring it in my car and have even used it in the small space between the outlet and our sofa. I love that the portion that plugs into the wall can be folded up back into the charger, helping its compact size. My usb-c charging cable works perfectly with this, and my phone charges very fast. I've really found great use and have been loving this compact usb-c charger! Overall I definitely recommend, especially if you're on the go and need a charger that you can bring with you anywhere!

reviews.title: Very fast charger
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Belkin BoostCharge Compact 30W USB-C Wall Charger is a great solution for fast and reliable charging of devices. The first thing you notice is the compact design. The charger fits easily into your pocket or bag, making it ideal for use on the go. As for performance, 30W of power is enough to quickly charge smartphones, tablets, and even some laptops. I tested it with several devices, and charging was significantly faster compared to regular adapters. Particularly pleasing is the support for Power Delivery, which ensures optimal charging for compatible devices. The build quality is top-notch, which is typical for Belkin products. The USB-C cable connects firmly, and the charger itself does not heat up even with prolonged use. This gives confidence in its durability and safety.

reviews.title: Efficient pocket sized charger

Works on all of them without issues. - **Build Quality**: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5) Solid construction with a very nice looking design, built to last and perfect for everyday use. - **Value for Money**: ⭐⭐⭐⭐ (4/5) It's a bit on the pricier side for some, but you get top-tier quality and reliability. - **Heat Management**: ⭐⭐⭐⭐ (4/5) Stays cool most of the time, although occasional slight warmth during prolonged use. Overall, it's a reliable and practical choice if you're looking for a fast and efficient pocket-sized charger.

reviews.title: Fast, Compact, and Classy
reviews.review_text: I've been using this Onn wall charger for a few weeks, and it's a solid addition to my gadget lineup. It has two ports—one standard USB-A and one USB-C for newer iPhones—and pushes out 32 W of power. It's not as beefy as my 120 W original Apple charger, but it still charges my iPhone to 100 % in about 30 minutes. The plastic shell wraps around all four sides, giving it a clean, elegant look, and the white finish feels classy. The foldable plug makes it easy to toss in a bag when I travel. The only downside is that it doesn't support higher wattage or Power Delivery required for laptops, but for everyday use, it's stylish and does the job well.

reviews.title: Works amazing!
reviews.review_text: This Onn charger is amazing!! First, I love that it's pink! I also love that it's a dual charger, I have an iPhone and and iPad and being able to charge both devices at the same time on the same charger has been wonderful. I've also been enjoying the fast charge feature. My phone charges so fast!

reviews.title: It works it's cute IPhone 11 and higher compatable
reviews.review_text: My old Apple charging cube was getting really hot and wasn't consistently charging my phone so I ordered this one and it arrived the next day. I've used it for about a week and I've had no problems. I've previously bought lots of Onn products and for the most part I've found them dependable. The fast and free shipping straight to my backdoor is an additional plus. I have an IPhone 11 that uses the USB 3 but should I upgrade my phone it'll charge it too! That's another plus! Oh, and it's cute!

reviews.title: Dual port for everything use
reviews.review_text: I received the ONN Dual Port USB C / USB wall charger to test in exchange for this review. The charger is really nice, I love the design and that it has ports for cables that I use on a daily basis. The charging speed is really good and it was easy to set up as it's plug and go. There is small light showing it's working which is great but I didn't notice it until I turned the charger right side up. Overall I'm really happy with the charger and would totally buy this again.

reviews.title: Love a duo anything!
reviews.review_text: Best of both worlds when it comes to the charger and wall connects from both options! We loose and always have to switch either chargers or wall plug in because they're all different connections and honestly I get annoyed sometimes because I can't find both matching pairs sometimes! Super easy to just have one wall charger and be able to connect either or! Not only that I can connect and charge two things at once if need be! Color is cute a blue/ light purple and gender neutral if that's the route you go about things!

reviews.title: So stylish
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this charger! The dual port feature is super convenient—I can charge my phone and iPad at the same time without needing multiple outlets. reviews.title: Loving It!
reviews.review_text: I've been using this ONN dual port USB-C/USB wall charger and I honestly love it. It charges my phone way faster than my other chargers, which is a huge win for me. The fast charge power delivery really makes a difference, and the LED power indicator is a nice touch so I always know it's working. It also has short circuit protection, which gives me peace of mind, and the design is sleek and travel-friendly. I really like the overall look and feel—it just feels like a high-quality charger. Definitely a great pick if you're looking for something reliable and fast!

reviews.title: ONN Dual Port USB
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this dual port USB portable charger. It's honestly so great super small, lightweight, and incredibly convenient to take everywhere. It fits easily in my bag or pocket and charges two devices at once without any hassle. Perfect for travel, work, or just keeping in your car or backpack. Highly recommend! As I work two jobs it's much needed.

reviews.title: Affordable & Efficient Dual-Port Charger
reviews.review_text: The onn Dual-Port USB-C / USB Fast Charging Wall Charger has proven to be a reliable addition to my charging setup. The charger features a 20W USB-C port with Power Delivery, allowing for fast charging of compatible devices. I can charge my phone up to 50% in about 30 minutes, which is quite convenient. The additional 12W USB-A port is handy for charging a second device simultaneously, though at a slower rate. One aspect I appreciate is its compact design, making it easy to carry around. However, I noticed that it doesn't have folding prongs, which would have been a nice feature for travel. Overall, for its price point, the Onn Dual-Port Charger offers solid performance and convenience. It's a great option for those looking for an affordable charger that can handle multiple devices.

reviews.title: Great Travel Charger!

I am very impressed with the "fast charge" and feel that is accurate. The only thing, and it could be just me misunderstanding the wording on the package, is the LED lighting. I tried it in different lighting and didn't see an LED light anywhere. That said, I don't care at all about that (I don't need a nightlight in my hotel room), so I'm not going to reduce my overall rating for that. It could easily be a fault in this unit that doesn't have any bearing on how it functions and honestly, I'm happier without the light. It has been a great charger and it is currently in my travel bag awaiting a trip this weekend!

More like 10Ah than 20Ah. But your mileage will vary depending of drawn current. I got more long term succes if my cell phone is already at 100% and I plug the power bank the whole day so phone battery never drains. In this case current drawn is 0.5A. If I let the cell phone deplete close to zero and plug the power bank to both charge and continue to use the phone, then I might get 1.5 charge during one day. In this case current drawn is 1.8A. Also performance decrese below 12oC (55F) and charge time increase. Below 0oC (32F) it's useless for high drain applications. It might still be usefull for load below 0.5A.

reviews.title: It Gets the Job Done
reviews.review_text: It Gets the Job Done, But Nothing Special I bought this power bank mainly for traveling and daily backup charging. It works fine for the most part — it charges my phone about 1.5 times on a full charge, which is decent but not amazing for the size. It's not the fastest when it comes to recharging itself either, so you have to plan ahead. The build quality is alright — feels a bit plasticky but hasn't given me any trouble so far. The size is pocket-friendly, which I like, and it's light enough to carry around in my bag. Overall, it's an okay backup option, but I wouldn't rely on it for heavy use or long trips. reviews.review_text: it didn't take my husband much time at all, maybe 30 ish minutes, to put it together. it rolls smooth and lays back easily. its a little stiff but its new so thats ok.

easy to assembly. quality is okay. The seat is very firm, and I had to put a cushion seat just to get comfortable. those two cushions for neck and back are very firm, and if you stay in the chair for a long period of time, then the back and neck are starting to wear down. Would be nicer if the foam was not as firm as it is.

reviews.title: Great chair!
reviews.review_text: Great chair. My son loves it. He's 9 years old and he fits perfectly in the chair. Only thing is the feet rest installation wasn't right in the instructions. The screw had to go in the right side when facing the chair. Otherwise, putting it together was easy and fast.

reviews.title: Decent but splurge on something better
reviews.review_text: The chair is definitely more comfortable than the cheap one i had before, but there are a couple noteable flaws. the pillow for your back is much too thick for anyones spine unless you have scoliosis, its just uncomfortable and we had to take it off. Second, the "foot rest" only extends about a foot, making it effectively a knee rest with your feet dangling off with no support.

reviews.title: Waste of money poorly made
reviews.review_text: One arm will not stay on no matter what I do. The screw is fine but it's the default Is what I'm screwing into, poorly made. Footrest complete disaster. This chair is horrible. I had my coworker (maintenance)assemble it. He assembles everything at my place of work. Biggest waste of money Cheap poorly made product

reviews.title: Great chair, no assembly instructions
reviews.review_text: I really love this chair. The size is perfect; it feels wide and tall while the chair itself is slender. The reason I am not giving this chair 5 stars is that there were no assembly instructions included. The website also did not provide instructions. Luckily, youtube has it all. I would still recommend the chair.

reviews.title: Really all around great chair
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my 10 year old and he absolutely loves it. Fully adjustable, from many aspects, foot rest, back rest, next rest, lumbar support. My child loves it. It's great as a chair for an adult too. Honestly, his chair isbetter than my chair :)

reviews.title: Sweet Buy!!
reviews.review_text: Shipping was prompt and the price was nice. I bought this chair as a helpful tool for recovering from my ACL surgery, as I needed the footrest for leg elevation. It was fairly easy to assemble and seems pretty sturdy. Came with extra parts, which weren't needed, but handy to have. Just wish it had come with an extra caster, but they seem to be standard ones, so easily replaced if needed. Over all, a pretty good buy. Recommended, especially for the price.

reviews.title: Good for the meantime
reviews.review_text: Generally speaking, the quality of the chair is “good for the meantime”. It is a comfortable chair and rolls really nicely. The chair functions overall, as intended. The main issues I have with the chair are the arms of the chair and the foot rest. The overall design of the foot rest makes pulling out the foot rest easy but, extremely difficult to put back. You have to wiggle pretty aggressively to return it back out of the way. Furthermore the arm rests come with covers that cover the nails to tighten the arms, makes the design look sleek, however dot com, it makes it more challenging to tighten the arms as frequently as it needs. That all being said, my cats enjoy stealing it from me and it was comfortable for the meantime but I had to replace it already with something a little better and actually cheaper!

reviews.title: Surprised.
reviews.review_text: It went together pretty easy. I have had it a few months and it is still as comfy as day one! I did not expect this quality of product for the price. I was looking for a chair to "make due" but ended up getting a good chair that might last! Is it a secret labs chair? No. Is it worth $100ish bucks? Heck yes!

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: I ordered this chair for work as an upgrade to the one I had prior. If you are questioning whether or not to get it, GET IT! I love my new chair! My boyfriend had to help me with the assembly because the parts were a bit heavy. Which ultimately gives the chair a sturdy and quality finish! I can sit up with lumbar and neck support during a meeting or I can recline, put my feet up and watch a movie in my office. And the color! 10/10 I would recommend!

reviews.title: It's worth the money and very comfortable!
reviews.review_text: My cheap gaming chair failed at my place at the beach that I purchased in 2020 and I needed a replacement ASAP since I was only there for a week. Amazon, Best Buy had nothing that could be shipped to me in a short amount of time. So, I checked Walmart, and they had the GTRACING GTWD-200 gaming chair in-stock and could pick it up that day. The chair costs approximately $125.00 including tax; excellent value. It took approximately 30 to 35 minutes to assemble, and it comes with the tool to assemble the chair, so no extra tools needed. It is very comfortable and is great for big guys. The chair has plenty of room to sit comfortably and has multiple adjustments to reach your comfort zone. Overall, great value for the money and I recommend.
The price is better then expected, The quaility is better then expected, Walmart next day delivery service better then expected. 5 stars all the way. THANK YOU

reviews.title: BUY A DIFFERENT BRAND THESE BREAK ALL THE TIME
reviews.review_text: I wouldnt reccomend because we have bought 4 chairs in 10 years from GT RACING brand and they always fall apart this last chair we bought our 8 years old broke already. its always the arms then the leather then the stuffing

reviews.title: Good quality but not the most comfortable
reviews.review_text: I was expecting the chair to be more comfortable and sturdy when I got it. It is nice quality and has a nice appearance. Assembly wasn't super difficult. Overall I'd recommend.
This chair is big, in a good way. The color is what it appears to be in the site. It seems to be very durable. Everything works like it should. Overall a good deal.

If I could put zero stars I would but you all will not let me. I packed the box with the chair in it up three flights of stairs. I started to put the chair together and when I thought I was almost done because all I needed to do was put the arm rest on . I noticed that it was missing the screws to put the arm rest on. I contacted my local Walmart and was informed that I would need to bring the chair back . Are you kidding me . I was not about to take the chair apart then drag it back down 3 flights of stairs for just some missing screws. I asked did they have any and if I could come get them . I was told that I would have to pay for the screws. Never again!!!!!!!

The colors are great, but assembly was a little hard as everything is not labeled and the pictures are hard to follow. We will see how it goes as i work from home and this chair will get use 8 hours a day. i plan on buying my husband one if this one lasts.

reviews.title: Great First Gaming Chair
reviews.review_text: I bought this chair for my son to replace his old chair. This year was a great upgrade from the simple chair that he had. this is a great first gaming chair for anyone who needs a chair in the gaming world. I know that there are better chairs out there. But you have to start somewhere. This is where I started for my son. Not a bad place to start if this is you.

reviews.title: Great for this price
reviews.review_text: This is a 4 to 5 star chair FOR THIS PRICE. This is an absurd price for a chair this reasonable. I've only owned it for about a month but it has shown 0 sign of slowing down. - easy to assemble - good quality for this price compared to competitors - the footrest is strong enough to last a little but don't expect something durable especially if you're weighing over 190lbs. - as with most 'gaming' chairs, headrest is basically useless as well as the lumbar support but it's not uncomfortable by any means. - It doesn't lean back that far so beware, but I suspect this is to help keep it durable for longer. - Hard to beat at this price, it's about as comfortable as some much more expensive chairs but it's certainly not winning points on overall material quality in comparison. - Great beginner chair IMO or if you need something reasonably comfortable for cheap

This chair is great, but I for some reason just cannot get the armrests on properly. Maybe I used a wrong piece somewhere, but they just don'r screw in well. One is worse than the other and it seems once I have it screwed in to place about 1/2 way, it's like the screw or something is stripped so it just turns and turns and goes no where, and if too much pressure is put onto the armrest it pops out.

reviews.title: Honest Review of a Everyday Consumer
reviews.review_text: Just got this chair for my good friend before her trip, so I built it myself and honestly the building itself was way to complicated however for the price it was more then fair. The building material was extra durable and felt like the chair will last and the cushion on it was so good, I fell asleep on it sitting up with no pain. I'm way over weight and I was able sit and it had a lot of comfort. 10/10 would have definitely got one myself if I needed a chair.

reviews.title: Good chair for the price
reviews.review_text: Putting it together was a breeze, like, half an hour. But, I can see how it might be tough for some people. The chair's comfy for me. Though, I don't sit in it for ages.

reviews.title: Buy it!
reviews.review_text: Tried plenty of “gaming” chairs under $200 and this is the best one I've used. Not perfect bc nothing is but for under $160 this is the closest to perfect you'll get.

reviews.title: LOVE IT!
reviews.review_text: The chair is so pretty and much larger than I thought! Lots of thigh room and it's not too bad assembly wise!! The foot rest photo may have the wrong way on the paper the screw goes on the right side underneath not by the recline mechanism.

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.review_text: Best low tier chair available it seems. Not super comfortable and wears out after a year or two, but not uncomfortable and it does have plenty of support options.

reviews.title: Great product!
reviews.review_text: Product was easy to set up. I also felt like the quality was really well built with good comfort. The best part I found was the hand rest. They were soft unlike hard plastic we find in most of them

Very comfortable chair. So comfortable I've found my son sleeping on it on several occasions. Only drawback is not being able to adjust armrests as they're part of the reclining feature. Still, it's a solid 4.
Its a solid chair. The covering isn't the GREATEST but its a value chair and cats can be rough on the vinyl covering anyway. All together its really a great chair for the price.

reviews.title: waste of money
reviews.review_text: purchased this chair tonight and broight it home. opened the box to assemble it and the legs dont fit into the base. it was a toral waste of money. will be returning this tomorrow

reviews.title: Solid chair.
reviews.review_text: Only minor issues with assembly, but overall a solid buy. My son uses it every day, and his only complaint is the pull out foot rest is too short to actually use and be comfortable.
Excellent chair especially for the price. Very sturdy and comfortable. I use another pillow on the footrest for added comfort. It also looks really good.

For the price this things great. If you weigh over 200 pounds I would not recommend, but other than that. Tbh I almost can sleep on it, but like I said for the price it's amazing and I got it the next day!

I've bought two of these in the past This is the third two of them came with ripped vinyl and one had four missing screws . used screws from old one. bottom vinyl bore down and ripped off bottom within 3 months

reviews.title: I love this chair.
reviews.review_text: This chair is easy to put together and very comfortable. My son loves it as well. It's great for my back. I can recline and lay back easily. It also looks very nice in person.

reviews.title: Comfortable
reviews.review_text: I played a game on my laptop in this chair for about 5 hrs lol and wasn't sore from sitting for so long. Definitely worth the money wish I would of got a chair like this a long time ago.

reviews.title: Red Gaming Chair
reviews.review_text: A chair that's easy to build, aesthetically pleasing to look at and is as comfy as it looks?….10/10. I bought this for my boyfriend. We built it in an hour and he loves it!

reviews.title: Great chair for decent price!
reviews.review_text: Disclaimer: I am a current Walmart Associate! The ease of assembly is great- all parts were included and I didn't need any additional tools- all were included with the chair and its hardware! The only issue I had was getting the wheels on, but I'm not the strongest person and could find someone to help with that. Everything else I could do myself. Both me and my mom love the chair and its ability to recline.

reviews.title: Very comfortable and sturdy
reviews.review_text: So comfortable and surest! My last chair collapsed on me 😵‍💫 and I needed a new one asap. Always wanted a gamer like desk chair so it was the perfect opportunity to get one. Assembly maybe took 30 minutes. Love the lumbar support pillow. Overall I'm happy with the purchase.

reviews.title: I'm in love
reviews.review_text: I love this chair, I actually got it for my boyfriend for Christmas and he's also in love . I'm going to have to get myself one! Assembly was easy enough, we had fun putting it together. It's very sturdy and the leg rest is amazing! Being able to pull the leg rest under the chair is perfect. Overall great chair!

reviews.title: Comfy chair
reviews.review_text: It's a great entry-level gaming chair, like the appearance, value, and ease of assembly of the chair. The ergonomic design provides exceptional lumbar support, uality. I love that it reclines and supports my back and also my neck. Height adjusting of the seat and arm rests works well. The fabric isn't really leather, more of a plastic type covering over foam.

i could give a honest review butnits gmgardvwhennyoubdont get half the parts and none of the hardware to assemble this major mistake i want to receive a refund without wasting time and money try to deal with this store if inwas store or manufacturer o would rather thrown the parts that were in there in the the teash and letnthe customer get something out of the deal like a laugh or something this us insane

reviews.title: Perfect alternative to “better” gaming chairs
reviews.review_text: Obviously you're still putting something together so you need a day to build this and have a couple tools with you, but it's completely worth it, I've had it for almost half a year now and it has really no wear and tear on it. If you're looking for a gaming chair and don't want to cheap out but the “better” ones are way too expensive, this is a great choice.

reviews.title: Great gaming chair!
reviews.review_text: Assembly of this was so easy and fast. the only thing to note to at the end with the footrest, it made no sense bc it wouldnt go under the chair as in the pics. then i realized we had to remove the screws and flip it upside down before installing that last part. Otherwise its great %26 matches his desk from last xmas perfectly.

reviews.title: Expensive, lacking in comparison to other models
reviews.review_text: Son has the same brand in a different style and wants to return this one and repurchase previous style. Says this one isn't as supportive and has to add pillows for support. Not something you would think a twenty something yr old would need to do esp for a $100 gaming chair.

after two days of use the armrests are already dented in from my forearms/elbows and its now started making writd noises when i move some or adjust myself in the chair. (not the wheels). i didnt havr much expectation for this chair but it definitely but after two days and its already acting up im disapointed. i did order it and got it delivered the same day so theres that.

I rated the product highly due to the fast delivery and excellent quality of the office chair. However, I found the prices in the furniture section to be a bit on the higher side. Overall, the shopping experience was smooth and efficient, making it easy to order what I needed.

reviews.title: comfort
reviews.review_text: this is the third chair l have bought , l gave one to my daughter. l have one at my computer and the last one l have at my kitchen table .l am elderly and this chair supports my back , all round just a very comfortable chair , great value for your money

reviews.title: Good Quality Gaming Chair
reviews.review_text: Purchased for my teen son for Christmas. He assembled it and everything went well, except for a bent piece of the mechanism. Contacted the manufacturer and emailed a few pictures and 2 weeks later we received the replacement piece. Good experience, reliable company. This is the 2nd chair I've purchased from Walmart now. There are many other variations and manufacturers, but some of those the vinyl separated. This one I purchased the 3 year extended warranty. I hope we don't need to use it though.

reviews.title: Saw the color and immediately fell in love
reviews.review_text: I love this chair my husband has one first for his music studio, then I brought one for my son for his gaming room but the black and white ones, then I saw this color immediately fell I love because my whole room is pink everything. Only advice I can give you be careful wearing jeans or certain ringtone belts if wearing your pants low because it will ruin your leather.

Love this chair! I bought it for my bf specifically for gaming but i also use it for reading and watching tv. It is super comfortable and has different settings so you can sit different ways. It doesnt take up too much space either which is nice. It shipped fast with no broken parts. It is a bit of work to put together and I recommend using 2 people to assemble because its awkward. Other than that it is perfect and I highly recommend it!

reviews.title: don't buy
reviews.review_text: the part that slides the foot rest in and out is not functional. it is so cheaply made that not only does it not really slide, it does not stay in the stored position. The chair itself is extremely stiff and uncomfortable. like hard plastic, no give to the padding.

reviews.title: Buy it
reviews.review_text: His computer chair really changed the look of my computer set up and brought it together. I can't recommend it enough. Don't spend five $600 on a namebrand chair. The quality of this chair will last you at least 34 years and is definitely worth the money.

reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
reviews.review_text: I tried (emphasis on tried) to purchase this chair for my son. He is adept in assembling all kinds of things. The chair is so poorly made that it could NOT be assembled. The parts did NOT fit. The chair cylinder did not fit the base or the bottom of the chair. DO NOT BUY, IT'S A WASTE OF MONEY.

I should have paid closer to other reviews of this product. The design for installing the arms on this chair is really flawed. Not even an hour after assembling one of the arms felt loose. Under further inspection it had to do with the “bolt” out the one side that you would screw into. The bolt came loose and when unzipped the cover my husband discovered the weld broke. He was able to sort of fix by drilling a hole in the metal piece and put an additional bolt to anchor. The look of the chair is nice and the features offered are good but another issue is the reclining feature doesn't seem “stable”. What I mean is that if you even slightly lean back the chair will keep reclining. Just beware.

High quality, looks awesome, super comfortable, and way easier to put together than the reviews said. I bought two and put them together in 20 minutes each. As for the foot rest, you have to make sure the slides are straight and slides like butter. Plan on buying 5 more for each of my kids.

reviews.title: Good packaging and directions
reviews.review_text: This was not hard to put together with my 14 year old son. The packaging for the screws is well labeled, and if you are familiar with IKEA directions, this is similar. My son is of average height and weight and finds it comfortable. I was very hesitant, but do recommend!

My son loves this chair, especially the footrest, and has even fallen asleep in it some nights. I was able to assemble it in around 15 minutes, and all the hardware was clearly labeled. Definitely a winner, and I definitely recommend this chair to anyone!

reviews.title: Great chair !!
reviews.review_text: The first thing that struck me was the sleek, modern design. The black and red color scheme gives it a professional yet edgy look, and the premium PU leather feels durable and comfortable. The stitching is flawless, adding a touch of class that makes it stand out compared to other gaming chairs in this price range.

reviews.title: It Leans To One Side
reviews.review_text: The chair would be great if it did not lean to the left. The seat leans and you can feel your weight being shifted to the front left corner. The back of the chair also leans down to the left (when sitting or the right if you are standing in front of it). You can see in the photo how the bottom of the back touches the seat on one side and it doesn't do that on the other. It was fairly easy to assemble and I had assistance so it took about 45 mins to assemble with care. If the chair did not lean to one side, I'm sure it would be a great chair. But right now my chair is not ergonomically positioned which is the reason I purchased it therefore, I cannot currently recommend this product. I am looking for another chair.

reviews.title: Good for The Buck
reviews.review_text: Gifted this to my husband and he enjoys the comfort and ease of use. The price and availability was great for my needs. It was super easy to watch him set it up, I read the instructions to him as he assembled. He finds it recommendable to his friends, I believe one of them purchased this as well after the recommendation , I like to relax on it occasionally too.

reviews.title: Great desk chair!
reviews.review_text: This is a SOLID chair that is well made and comes with easy-to-follow instructions. The packaging even includes designated extra screws. I am not using the chair for gaming, but for my work-from-home desk. Long hours of sitting on a regular desk chair was torture for my back. This chair is more promising.

reviews.title: Very Narrow and Extremely Uncomfortable
reviews.review_text: I bought a blue one because my son has the white %26 black one. For $130 this chair is HORRIBLE. The blue was extremely narrow compared to my sons white n black one.. It tore into my hips and legs, hurt my back and bum, no lumbar support and extremely hard on the sides and tooo firm overall. Since I put the box out for recycling, I cannot return it. Now I am stuck with it and loss of money. So it just sits in the back room, which I will probably just give it away to someone's less fortunate child to make his or her day. Never again will make another purchase from GTRacing.. Nick Capella

reviews.title: Love the chair great price
reviews.review_text: I started working at home and I'm at my desk for long days. My grandson suggested I get this gaming chair. I love it because it has a high back and a neck and lumbar cushion. It's firm but comfy. I use a memory foam cushion for the seat. Love it. Great chair.

reviews.title: Great chair with some shortcomings
reviews.review_text: Pros: It's a great chair, comfortable, and supportive. It raises higher than other chairs I've had and stays lifted. I don't slide off when reclining. It looks nice and fits well behind my desk. Cons: The arms aren't adjustable and not in the best place for my body size, but they're not terrible. The paddles for adjusting the recline is a bit out of reach, so I keep grabbing the one that lowers me down instead. Wish it was a bit closer to the front. Attaching the lumbar and head pillows was a bit of a pain and don't adjust as well as I'd like. The straps are cheaply made so it'll probably snap off eventually. I had to use another pillow for lumbar as the one it came with isn't great. Overall though I like the chair and have less back problems now compared to my old chairs.

reviews.title: Highly recommend this chair!
reviews.review_text: Here's a review of the gaming chair from my personal experience: I recently upgraded my gaming setup with the GTRACING gaming chair, and honestly, it's been a game-changer for me. As someone who spends hours gaming, working, or just chilling at my desk, comfort is a huge deal. This chair nails it with its adjustable pillows that perfectly support my neck and back—no more post-session aches for me! The upholstered cushion is super comfy, making those extended gaming sessions feel like a breeze. What I absolutely love is the ergonomic footrest and the reclining feature that allows me to kick back and relax in style. It's not just about comfort; this chair makes my gaming space look more modern and sleek. It's sturdy too, handling up to 290 pounds with ease, and the customizable features like seat height, headrest, and lumbar pillow adjustments are top-notch. I can tweak everything to fit just right, which is a big plus. Overall, investing in this chair was a smart move. It's enhanced my gaming experience significantly and also doubled up as a comfy spot for work. Highly recommend it to anyone looking to upgrade their seating!

reviews.title: Perfect %26 Comfy for a Teenager
reviews.review_text: Super cute and perfect for my teenager who loves to play video games all night on weekends. I did not want to buy a fancy, expensive chair, so this one was perfect! The color blue was perfect for my son's blue %26 gray bedroom. The only thing was that I wasn't present when it arrived and it took him a little while to put it together. I recommend two people to assemble.

reviews.title: Excellent choice
reviews.review_text: I ordered online without actually sitting in it, relying on the reviews posted. I am very pleased with the results of this chair. I like the adjustments that can be made especially with regards to the leaning back adjusting. As far as the ease of assembly, it is detailed and took some time ( one hour), but all parts are clearly marked and well packaged, needing only the provided enclosed tool for all assembly. I have had this chair for over a week now and would recommend it.

reviews.title: I'm very happy with it.
reviews.review_text: This is a basic "gaming chair". It was exactly as expected. The padding and cushions (lumbar and cervical) make the chair very comfortable to sit in. I'm very happy with it. Assembly was relatively easy. And it comes with all necessary tools. The small parts (screws, etc.) are in a labeled blister pack that coordinates with the instructions. All parts are labeled. II would buy again.

reviews.title: Good chair for the right price.
reviews.review_text: I am 6'1", 250lbs and I can sit comfortably in this chair. I'm probably pushing the limit of what it can handle, but it's doing well so far. It took an hour to construct and the parts and instructions were clear and well packaged. I hope the chair lasts a few years.

reviews.title: Definite Great Product!
reviews.review_text: My wife has severe arthritis in her hips %26 back. We had trouble finding a comfortable chair for her to use at our dining room table. The CNA that cares for my wife, while I'm at work, suggested I look into a gaming chair for her. I researched %26 read reviews from several companies. So we purchased this chair, feeling it was the best fit for my wife. We were not disappointed! This chair is perfect! The cushions are comfortable %26 the padded arm rests %26 lumbar support %26 neck pillows are a big plus ! My wife loves this chair! She can finally sit without pain while eating a meal. I liked it so well, that I bought a chair for myself, in black. I love my chair too. I like the height adjustment %26 reclining feature, alot ! Even our CNA loves this chair, that is here during the day! The price was very reasonable, very well constructed, easy to assemble. We recommend this chair!

reviews.title: Great Chair for Casual or Competitive Gaming
reviews.review_text: I've had it for about 6 months now and it's still feels brand new. Took me less than 20 min to put together so that's a plus for me. Overall it's really comfortable and you can adjust/ lock the back in position. Great for sitting straight up or leaning back a little bit (or all the way back). It's sturdy so either option and you still feel well supported.

There are some things I would have changed with the design. The foot rest is rather awkward as it folds back into the chair upside down. Also, it is actually not a foot rest but more of a place to rest your thighs as it does not extend to the feet, which is what a foot rest should do. The arm rests should be adjustable upwards to actually make contact with the elbows. Currently, they sit too low if you're working at a desk and provide no real purpose.

reviews.title: Better than my expectation
reviews.review_text: Literally the best chair l've purchased. Comfortable. Great back support. Good quality material. Easy to build. I'm 31 years old and spend a lot of time sitting down for being on the computer a lot. Several hours of working in and gaming in. Even fell asleep in it. No back pain. I had the best use experince with this one and it doesnt disapoint with comfort.

reviews.title: 4 ½ star chair
reviews.review_text: the three flaws i have is that the head pillow doesn't stay up or tight and lumbar support pillow the straps go up the chair you can feel the straps on your back. The last flaw is the recline lever is away short and tucked into far making hard to reach and adjust while sitting. It could have used more padding in the seat. My bad the footrest is 100% garbage its to short and not supported strong enough. other than that good chair for beginners or someone on a budget

reviews.title: wouldnt recommend
reviews.review_text: I like the idea of footrest and weist support. The chair looked like it would meet my expectations since I spend most of my time on my computer. I wanted to be comfortable and have some flexibility to stretch. I enjoyed setting up the chair; the instructions were clear. It felt like a puzzle. However, the quality of the material is not what I expected. The leather looks cheap, and I dont think it is durable. The color of the black leather is different for each part, which also makes it look cheap. The wheels don't feel safe; it gets off from adjusting myself to the table. It is not securely attached. The footrest also doesn't feel safe. like if I put in a little weight, it might actually cause me to lose balance, which will also push wheels out. Overall, I think the chair is not worth the money, and it is probably not even safe to use it.

reviews.title: Nice chair and really comfy! Well built
reviews.review_text: After reading tons and tons of reviews I finally settled on this one for my 15 year old 6'2" son who has a habit of leaning back in chairs and just went through a (bad) brand new one he got for Christmas from Walmart with super cruddy support bars in the lower back area that were not even properly welded. Literally just tack welded. Needless to say, that 4 month old chair is garbage now. Very flimsy and not well built. I set out on a search for a better built chair with better back support bracing and more comfortable. He spends alot of time in his chair for homeschooling and also gaming so I decided on this one and it has a very wide support bracing in the back area where teens have a habit of leaning back in the chair. Much better. I was pleased to see this. This chair is very comfortable and the back comes up nice and high and I love how the sides feel like they sort of wrap around your body and offer support. It's good and roomy and the wheels are nice and smooth and it came with a support pillow for your neck and low back. He put it together himself in about 20 minutes. Overall, I wouldn't hesitate to buy this chair again. Infact, I am about to purchase a second chair for my daughter who is also homeschooling and spends alot of time in a chair and needs a good comfortable chair and this is a great choice. I am big on reading reviews and found them extremely helpful for me when I was searching for this one so I hope this review helps someone else who is in search for a great chair.

reviews.title: Awesome chair
reviews.review_text: Awesome chair, i can now be comfortable while in class, i like to sit cross legged while in my chair and be comfortable.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.review_text: Excellent Chair, Very Comfortable, Assemble was easy to follow instruction. Would Recommend this chair.
Helps relax, back feels good, adjustable. Could not ask for a better chair. Works for homework and reading as well.
Definitely on the small size. Some parts were poorly designed. The footrest is an abomination. Parts are too small,pulling and pushing the foot rest back is almost impossible. Not worth the money

I guess what Im saying is, if you're looking for a good chair for your office or Man-cave, do yourself a favor and get this one.

reviews.title: Great Gaming Chair!

Instead, I put one drop of silicone and rubbed it around each metal leg end for easier installation and smoother operation!

Also the foot rest is a pain or pull out and push away. It does not glide easy. Otherwise the chair is fine. I personally would not get it again.

If you're looking for an affordable chair without sacrificing quality, this one is definitely worth considering. A good chair for a king

The perfect blend of comfort and style, it’s quickly become my favorite spot in the master bedroom. Whether I’m enjoying a morning coffee or unwinding with a good book, this chair has made the space feel so much more cozy and inviting. Highly recommend it to anyone looking to elevate their room!

reviews.review_text: It looks so beautiful. So classy and elegant. I sprayed mine with scotch guard to protect it. The color is so nice, looks more like a white to me and not cream but I still love it. It’s so comfortable and you can have a nice relaxed day just watching tv or reading. It’s very comfortable. What I also don’t protect it’ I put a white towel over the chair while I sit on it. So don’t let the color discourage you from getting the cream color, you won’t regret it. It’s also great that it swivels. I’m in love with my chairs.

You guys are *****. You left my package sitting down in the driveway when I specifically said put it on the porch. reviews.title: REFUND NEVER ISSUED
reviews.review_text: Be warned. I ordered a chair that was defective. I contacted the manufacturer first, they were wonderful, but advised the only solution was to return since the arm/part that needed to be replaced was on backorder. I called Walmart.com customer service and a freight company called Estes picked up the item from my front door on May 28. Walmart.com has no record of the pickup. Our security cameras have the entire event recorded. I called Walmart.com Monday and was promised my money would be refunded. it has not. Called Estes today 15 days later explaining there is no record on Walmart.com of them even picking the item up. I was told just wait 24-48hrs and I can contact Walmart back. It seems I am not the only person with this issue. I did my part, and someone is holding my refund hostage. DO NOT BUY!

The chair has NOT BEEN DELIVERED. The order has been cancelled three times. According to the walmart.com customer service reps that we've contacted each time, the issue lies with the 3rd party delivery agent. If Walmart is going to be the exclusive seller of this chair, then you must have a REPUTABLE delivery agent to follow-thru. There are multiple comments on the internet about the similar delivery issues. this is unacceptable from a National Retailer to have this type of poor order fulfillment rate!

I really, really wanted to love this chair, but I don't and can't! This chair is beautiful, but it is sooo uncomfortable! The gray fabric is rough - really, truly rough. Nothing soft about it at all! I read all the reviews before I bought it and figured those who said it's rough were just being nitpicky. They were not! It's rough and uncomfortable to the point that I can only sit on it if I have a blanket over it. And it is*not* the perfect chair for a reading nook! The back is way too short to settle in and get comfy to read. I have to slouch way down and pile up the pillows just right behind my head for support, and it's still not comfortable. I can, however, see that this would be a great chair (or chairs, if you need multiples) for a sitting/conversation area where everyone will be sitting upright and, presumably, fully dressed. It has a maximum load weight of 225 lbs, so many big and/or tall people will exceed the weight limit. Something to consider if you're purchasing it to have company over. The instructions say you must have two or more people to assemble it, but I have janky shoulders and was able to assemble it by myself, so two people aren't absolutely necessary. I don't necessarily not recommend it, but I only recommend it for certain situations. This is not the chair for snuggling in for a cold, rainy day of reading and relaxing.

reviews.title: Buy the Chair!
reviews.review_text: I have debated this chair for months, and I am so glad I finally purchased it. It looks high-end at such an amazing price, and it goes great with any decor. It is comfortable, and I love the swivel. It was super easy to assemble, which is a huge plus. You literally can't go wrong with this chair!

reviews.title: Beautiful chairs!!
reviews.review_text: So I went back and forth on the dark gray and white. I normally always always veer towards white, I got the dark gray to change things up a bit and I am soooo glad I did. Although you can't go wrong with either. The dark gray is a beautiful color and complimented my room very nicely! Super comfy and I don't have to worry about being a spaz about the possibility of stains on the white

reviews.title: Look great, but super uncomfortable
reviews.review_text: This is the first time I've felt compelled to write a product review. I'd like to first say that my wife and I really wanted to like these chairs (we bought two). The chairs are attractive and are reasonably priced. At first, we also found them relatively cozy. However, as time has gone on we have come to the conclusion that these are the most uncomfortable chairs we have ever owned. The seat bottom is extremely hard. We thought the bottoms might soften somewhat over time, but they have not. My wife has taken to sitting on a pillow when using the chair. In addition, the back being composed of three separate pillows seems like a good idea, but in practice it's a pain (literally). Every shift in position requires moving the pillows and it's difficult to find a consistently comfortable position. The back/pillows are also relatively low, meaning there is inadequate back support. Finally, the seat height is low. If you use the chair with an ottoman, your feet tend to be higher than your backside, resulting in an awkward sitting position. We have given up trying to make due with these chairs and are currently looking for new ones.

Love the size. The color is tooooooo white to be labeled as cream. But it's growing on me. One thing Drew Barrymore can you please make decorative chair covers for this item greatly appreciated sincerely Lady T.

reviews.title: Gorgeous chair
reviews.review_text: Love this chair, I was just super worried about it being so white. I found my daughter going to touch it and I was like no! Then I knew I needed the dark gray ones. With that said this chair is gorgeous and super comfortable. You can curl right up into it. For me I was just too worried about keeping it clean with kiddos! But no worries with the dark gray! Drew did another great job!

reviews.title: Missing pieces. Lacking customer service
reviews.review_text: Received the chair but pieces were missing. We are unable to put the chair together. Spoke with customer service and they said they would send me a new chair the following day, to dispose of the chair with the missing pieces. Called customer service and was told that they were unable to send a new chair because they were out of stock and offered a refund. Before accepting the refund I saw that the chair was NOT out of stock. So I was then told that the chair would be delivered the next day. Then I was told it would only be delivered if I give them the damaged chair. Which I had already disposed of as told by customer service. They also refused to give me a refund which I was offered earlier. Someone in the customer service department needs to retrain the workers to be honest and not make promises that they know they won’t keep. I’m very sad and disappointed for the dishonesty.

reviews.title: Great Quality Comfort Chair
reviews.review_text: It’s a very beautiful chair. Comes in one big box which I had to open outside the door. Has 4 pieces to put together which only took about 15-20 mins. Love the quality %26 comfort. The cushion is deep enough to fold up my legs which I love.

reviews.title: AMAZING!!!

reviews.title: I’M IN LOVE
reviews.review_text: These chairs are so beautiful in my home! I couldn’t be more pleased with the design, quality and how stunning my home looks with them!!! I can’t wait until I complete it.

reviews.title: Happy cat
reviews.review_text: Well, my cat likes it. Honestly, I guess that is what matters most! I got to lounge in it once so far and I will be buying another one in the future for sure!

reviews.title: No go for cat owners
reviews.review_text: This review is for the cat owners. This fabric is horrible for cat claws. My cats shredded this within a week of setting it up. I would not recommend to cat people. However, it is comfortable and I can see why people like it

reviews.title: Literally beautiful!
reviews.review_text: If you have been looking at this chair, just get it! I had done a lot of research on several swivel chairs for my bedroom and I kept coming back to the Drew. Beautiful chair. For my bedroom aesthetic, I wanted the FAWN color, but it was chronically out of stock until, in the middle of one random night, I checked, and it was in! I ordered two of them immediately. They shipped quickly, and I got them within a few days. Set up was great, no issues. The size, look and comfort are exceptional. I was a little iffy about getting a corduroy chair, but it looks really cool and the fabric is very soft.. I wanted a chair that my husband would be comfortable in, and this one is perfect. As other reviewers had noted, there is a pink or mauve undertone in the FAWN color. But it is definitely more tan or beige than pink and, depending on lighting, you don’t see the pink at all. These chairs are perfect to watch the sunrise from our bedroom window and swivel around to watch the morning news. Super practical and literally beautiful.

reviews.title: Beautiful Chair by Drew-Fawn
reviews.review_text: This chair is absolutely incredible! It’s big enough to curl up in, but still compact enough to fit in any space. I looked for a chair like this everywhere and this was definitely the most affordable option, especially since the quality is outstanding. Putting it together was a little bit difficult, because you have to line the sides up just right, but once we nailed that it was perfect!! I absolutely love the fawn color and ribbed material. 10/10 would recommend. BUY IT!!

reviews.title: Beautiful, yes!
reviews.review_text: Overall, this couch is beautiful and comfortable. I was skeptical on ordering the color fawn due to no previous real pictures of customers, however I still went for it and as I imagined the color didn’t match my eyes. This color gives a pink hue, however, it is a beautiful color. In the room it’s surrounded by brown tones, so that may be the issue yet now I need to wait for the cream couch to get back in stock. I want to note the corded look is nice! I just don’t find it working for my space. Overall assembly was easy and again the couch itself is soft and comfortable, but the color didn’t meet expectations which is why I didn’t give it full stars. Hopefully I get to exchange for the cream when it gets back in stock.

reviews.title: Lives up to its name: Beautiful!
reviews.review_text: a beautiful, comfortable, functional chair at an affordable price. the color and style is perfect for the beach theme I was going for. the firm seat is not too firm, and the back pillows can be moved around for the most comfortable setting position. the 360° swivel capability means you can place the piece almost anywhere. assembly is pretty easy, but will require two people to position the back onto the base.

Fedex could not or would not deliver this chair to my house. they kept saying out for delivery for a week, then a woman from meridian ms called to tell me that my item was still there at the facility,she continued by saying the item weighed 89 lbs and she was going to check on this and call me back, she didn't call back. I tried calling her back, but the number could not be reached. back and forth with CS from walmart and CS fedex, no chair, but we are sorry for your inconvenience. It was stated over and over, day after day, until I realized no chair would be coming. Fedex failed walmart, and walmart failed me. I'm sure the chair would have been beautiful, and the price was excellent for those lucky enough to receive it. now, if walmart shipped with ups, I would be sitting in my chair and enjoying it. UPS delivers in my neck of the woods. Fedex allows its drivers to decide where and if a delivery is fit to be moved. I'm old enough to remember when K-mart was king and wal-mart was an infant. you are king now walmart how much longer will you rein. I'm going to take a look at some other discount stores... who!! like you were, once upon a time, an infant just trying to grow. a small store trying to survive and had the best of everything customer oriented, so thanks for your service of yesteryear.

reviews.title: Since you don't reply 2 emails. Unacceptable!
reviews.review_text: This is completely unacceptable. I live in a NYC high rise with a doorman and exceptional package acceptance service, which logs every single delivery into the building. They have ZERO record of this being delivered. It’s also interesting that upon dispute of this, Federal Express actually went into their system and changed important details of the delivery, including the actual delivery date. They clearly are in error and at fault. I wonder why this isn’t being taken up with your actual delivery service Federal Express, as I see these chairs being offered all over Facebook Marketplace in my area, new and in box at reduced rates. You have to wonder if they are being stolen by actual Federal Express workers and then re-sold. I should not and will not dispute this with my bank. Your staff already told me on a phone call yesterday that I was being sent a new chair. So, are you now telling me Walmart is now not standing by what was already promised to me? You can refer back to that call that took place yesterday. I am sure it was recorded. I was told that a replacement would be sent between Jan 11 and Feb 11, and I would receive an email confirmation, which I have yet to receive. Would you like to speak to the package delivery service, which is provided by my building to confirm that ZERO package was delivered here. Walmart chose to deliver a $300 plus item without getting signature confirmation or even a photograph of where it was delivered. Even Amazon does that. That was NOT my choice. This fault falls on Walmart and Federal Express and I should and will receive a refund from Walmart for an item that was not received. Margo Osborne

reviews.title: Buy this chair now
reviews.review_text: I bought the sage green and it is beautiful! I put it together myself in less than 30 minutes after watching a YouTube video. It’s extremely comfortable and I can easily curl my legs under me with plenty of room to spare. I cannot believe the overall quality of this chair, and for less than $300!

I want you to know that WALMART is the worst for delivering orders, they are. Disorganized, I have been trying for 1 month to get some Drew Barrymore chairs. I have ordered them twice and they always get the address wrong and the solution is to refund the money. I don’t know how people buy from them. Terrible service. This is very frustrating that only you have the Drew Barrymore sale.

reviews.title: Not worth the trouble!
reviews.review_text: First… I had to FIGHT with Fed Ex to get this chair delivered, after contacting Walmart twice with ZERO resolution from them. Walmart prints a label saying 40lbs, when the chair weighs 112. So note delivery may be a battle for you too. THEN it finally gets delivered, and I have TWO right hand modules and NO left hand module. I’m so over it. I’m over Walmart and I’m over this chair.

Be aware if you will be delivered a wrong color it would take Walmart an eternity to send you a replacement, even though it’s not your fault!!!!! Awful customer service!!! Ordered this chair to get it before my baby is born to use it in my nursery ,now it’s never gonna make it.

reviews.title: "Beautiful" is the right word!
reviews.review_text: The price / value of this chair is outstanding. I ordered two because of a sale and I am very pleased. The construction on this chair is heavy duty, not some particle board junk. Each chair comes in one box and the box is pretty heavy. The delivery was to my front sidewalk! I opened the boxes outside and brought in the pieces one by one which worked fine. Assembly was pretty straightforward and the instructions were very simple and the hardware was packaged well. I assembled them by myself and it took about 20 minutes for the first one and a little shorter on the second. No problems with damaged boxes and the packaging was great! Delivery time was very fast, with my order being placed late on December 1 and delivery on December 5! As other reviewers have pointed out, comparable chairs at other retailers are double what this chair sells for. If you are looking for this type of style chair, I highly recommend purchasing this one. Great job, Drew!

reviews.title: Nice but uncomfortable and difficult to swivel.
reviews.review_text: Aesthetically this chair is nice, but it is not comfortable and the backrest rubs on the ground making it difficult to swivel unless you scoot all the way to the front edge of the chair. I got this chair on sale so I'd say it was a good deal but if I had to pay full price then not so much.

reviews.title: Not stain resistant at all
reviews.review_text: I do truly love these chairs. The reason I only gave 3 stars is for 2 reasons. First, they are advertised as having stain resistant fabric and that is far from the truth. Would not recommend these for anyone with kids or pets, I have both. Second, I had to exchange one of the chairs because the frame was defective and the exchange process was an absolute nightmare and took over a month to get a new chair. All that said, I do love the look of these chairs and they are super comfortable.

reviews.title: Great reading chair!
reviews.review_text: The chair is very easy to assemble. It looks great in my living room and is very comfortable. it is sturdy, and the material is thick. Great quality for the price. My only complaint is FedEx left the package at the end of my drive by the road. I had to lift it in the back of my truck and bring it back my drive.

reviews.title: Product came Stained... poor customer service
reviews.review_text: I was delivered a stained and dirty product, we noticed it immediately while removing the pieces from the box. Started the return process within minutes of receiving the product. After 20 mins of back and forth, before I finally got a return accepted. I had to wait 3 days before FedEx would pick it up (7am - 2pm) window. After 2pm with no communication or information I reached out to Walmart - no update, they have no idea where FedEx is, I should just keep waiting is what I am told. I cannot continue to wait. So we reschedule, I have to wait another 3 days before... maybe.. hopefully FedEx comes to get it. Can they send a replacement now - No! Do I get a credit - No! Do I get anything for this trouble - No! Amazing. I receive a product with a large grease or oil stain and now I get to wait another week before I can get someone to pick up the product, then after they have processed it, then I will get sent my product. This is the last time I purchase furniture from Walmart.

reviews.title: Nice chair, expensive shipping fees not so much
reviews.review_text: The chair itself is beautiful. Easy to put together, my 8 year old son helped me assemble it and only took about 15 minutes per chair. Not happy with Walmart though. When ordering it had no free shipping, so had to pay $100 in shipping but reallllyyyy wanted the chairs. The next day it went to free shipping and they won’t refund the shipping fees I paid. Wouldn’t have ordered if I knew it was going to go to free shipping. Can’t return to get shipping cost back. Customer service rep I talked to was nice but they couldn’t help me since Walmart wouldn’t let them lol. Love the chair, not so much Walmart. Probably won’t order from Walmart.com for furniture again. So if you’re wanting to order the chair and it has a shipping fee, just be patient until it goes to free shipping.

Beautiful Chair! However the Chair was delivered with 2right arms, and completely unusable. Had to go through obstacles to get the chair picked up and still waiting on my replacement. This is my first time purchasing furniture from Walmart and my last! I was hoping the chair would be in my new apartment before Christmas, but will now be here most likely after. I have no words!

I had read the reviews for this chair, which were mostly 4s and 5s but there were some 1s. For the price it was definitely a 5 for me. I realized that out of the thousands of chairs shipped there are going to be a few unhappy people. But everything mentioned in the 1 reviews were not true for my experience. The chair was in pristine condition in solid packaging and very easy to assemble. And it not only looks stunning but welcomes anyone to curl up in it with a good book or just to relax.

reviews.title: Drew Barrymore Swivel Chair
reviews.review_text: I love Drew’s furniture. A throw back furniture style %26 so me :) I wanted a chair so badly but there were only a couple colors. I was elated when she dropped the brown chair! It’s beautiful!! When people visit they always compliment everything Drew. I love the brand.
Absolutely love these! I got 4 of them for a sitting area and get compliments all the time! They look amazing and are super comfortable too!

I love this chair SO much, but I got it in white %26 cannot keep it clean for the life of me. It is SO frustrating. They are so cozy, oversized, and comfortable, but you will have to clean them alll the time.

reviews.title: In LOVE!!!
