reviews.title: A must have!
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love these chairs. Ordered 6, to have for family gatherings and/or parties. Love the black color the durability and easy to fold away. Kept the boxes for storage. Goes great with the black tables I also purchased. Crisp clean elegant conformed look.

reviews.title: Good old folding chairs.
reviews.review_text: These things shipped quickly and arrived just in time for Thanksgiving. The last time I purchased a metal chair like this was from Lowes' about 10 years ago for around $9. Considering that was a decade ago, these are not bad at all for $11.25 each delivered free to my house with Walmart . The thing I love about Walmart compared to Amazon is that they know how to charge the correct tax rate. Some large online retailers charge a negotiated tax rate for each state. For example, Alabama's is 8%. That's cheaper that some cities rate in Alabama. I don't live in a city though. My tax rate should only be 5%. I love that Walmart puts forth the effort to get it right and get the money to the correct places. I know that has nothing to do with the chairs, I just wanted to point that our. Buy stuff from Walmart when you can instead of Amazon. Back to the chairs, they are decent quality and sturdy. I'm 6'2" and weigh about 260lbs and I feel very secure sitting in these chairs, unlike some of the plastic folding chairs that I'm afraid I will break.

reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
reviews.review_text: With limited space I needed extra chairs for dinner guests that I can put away. These portable folding chairs were everything that I expected but more. They're steel and very well made. They have weight to them but are not overly heavy. The polished finish is very nice and smooth. The seat may be too small for a hefty adult especially if they need more depth but otherwise should do the job. I am 5"10 and the chair makes me sit up pretty straight. I am especially pleased with them for what I need them to do. Entertain and put them away. Delivery went well all things considered too. They were very fairly priced too. Provided they hold up, I feel I got great value for my money.

I ordered 8 chairs, 4 to a box. One box perfect. The second box had legs bent. Chairs were not wrapped in plastic. Looked as though they had been purchased and returned and then shipped to us. Trying to find out how to contact someone for replacement. Not very satisfied with one box.

I expect these will last just the same as the ones I was raised with.

reviews.title: more surface for projects
reviews.review_text: It is much larger than a standard "TV tray", so it offers a lot more surface for projects and artwork. It stands pretty sturdy with minimal wobbliness. I have a very small space to work with at the moment, so I find this works great!

reviews.title: Best table buy
reviews.review_text: Great Price extra space compared to other trays works good for a temporary desk. I use for projects and as a table to eat Infront of tv so many uses. easy to clean and durable. Also, light weight so easy to move and set up also can adjust for three different Hights and locks in place

My son just came home from the hospital and needed a table because he is stuck in bed for a while and there is no putting anything together, It comes fully assembled and it is very sturdy He has a ton of stuff on it right now and I wouldn't be afraid to put a TV on it I thought it was a little pricey at first until I seen how sturdy and how well it was made

it's wonderful it's big enough to do what you need to do and it's pretty sturdy and I'm not sure colors would be nice but at least black is neutral I can do my diamond painting on it My small ones so that's nice it's pretty sturdy and pretty strong! so I'm perfectly happy with it!

reviews.title: Excellent all-purpose small foldable table
reviews.review_text: This table does exactly what I purchased it to do. It is lightweight, easy to assemble (intuitive) and fold. I needed it as an all purpose, easy to move, table for crafts, cooking, and as a flat surface when I'm at my computer. All these functions have worked out perfectly. I am very pleased with this purchases, especially as I bought it on line without "seeing" it in action.

reviews.title: Sturdy and Adjustable Snack Tables
reviews.review_text: These are very sturdy and adjustable snacktables. The tray is larger than the standard wooden folding snack table. I replaced a set of the old light wood tables for these nice, large black tables. These Mainstay snack tables are lighter and fold up thinner than the wooden tables so they are easier to store. I recommend these tables for anyone looking for one.

reviews.title: Mainstays 26" Adjustable Folding Table Is Great
reviews.review_text: I saw this table at a friend's who, after owning for a few months, highly recommended. I ordered a couple of tables for myself. I love that there are several heights it can be adjusted (very easily) to. It is so very lightweight that it is easy for even a disabled elderly person to carry 2 at a time. They fold up very slim and that makes it easy to tuck away for storage. The thing that caught my eye in the first place was the large table . . . bigger than normal TV Tray.

Recently, I purchased a table from Walmart. It is a fantastic extra table to have in your house. It's just a bit larger than a TV tray and that extra amount of room makes it so so much easier to use. The one move application to make it go up or down Makes it easy to do even with a child on your hip. Great buy for any family or a single person. Could even sub substitute as a desk.

reviews.title: Bad design of legs that are massive %26 long bulky
reviews.review_text: It's a good size table when horizontal but the way the lake stand it would get in the way of almost anything around you. Annoying. Tall, wide, but legs so wide hard to get close to it if sitting on any furniture. (I used it for eating from couch or snacking, legs banged into couch making that impossible).

reviews.title: sturdy and q
reviews.review_text: This is the 2nd one I've purchased. I'm in a wheelchair so it serves me well for breakfast, lunch and dinner table. Also I do jigsaw puzzles, Word Searchs, and Adult Coloring Books. My son and daughter-in-law set up the 2nd one as a Coffee Station.

reviews.title: Great for all around the house.
reviews.review_text: I love the size and ability to raise/ lower according to my needs. It's lightweight yet sturdy. It folds up fairly thin and is easy to hide under the couch, bed or in a closet. I wish this came in other colors. Black may be basic, but a nice neutral tan color would be fantastic. I once found one in a lime green 💚 color. It went home with one of the nibblings. It works great for a quick computer 💻 stand.

reviews.title: Light weight, adjustable
reviews.review_text: Adjusts to several heights making it great for chairside use. Perfect size for playing cards, sorting items, etc. Do not use it to steady youself or to push up from a chair as it's not that sturdy. A great foldable storage table that is easy to adjust. Comes ready to use.

reviews.title: Very handy
reviews.review_text: This is super handy and sturdy enough for my purposes -- mainly working on quilt projects while watching TV. I have drawn diagonal lines for dozens of half-square triangles on it already. Really convenient near my chair. I dinged it one star because it arrived from the store unwrapped and has an ugly gouge on the top, likely from being jostled in the truck.

reviews.title: Crafty Table
reviews.review_text: I bought this for simple crafts and it's the perfect size to fit next to my desk plus there's three different height sizes to choose from which is handy for different sitting positions. It's wider than a tv tray normally is which helps too. Definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Computer table that's versatile
reviews.review_text: I really like this computer table it's easy to set up and it's folds great for storage. I also use it for lunch as a dining table . This is very versatile and easy and light to carry. It dual uses if you need a table as a senior it's very light and you can easily eat a snack on it..

reviews.title: Folding tray table

i liked the sturdiness and beung able to adjust height..Doesnt look special.It just does its job of being to have my lunch or laptop on it and not have to worry about it wobbling or collapsing out of nowhere or when somebody walks by it.

reviews.title: A waste of money!
reviews.review_text: I was really excited about purchasing this adjustable height personal table. However, once I received it and started using it, my expectations weren't met. The table has a hump in the surface, which causes anything placed on it to slide off. As a result, the table is actually of no use to me.

it would be nice if it was a little sturdier. The top is too thin. i had foot surgery that took forever to heal. i had to stay off of it for quite awhile and sat at the table. it's now cracked. i purchased a new one 1 month ago and is starting to not be level. my sons has lasted longer. he uses it to eat 1 meal 6 days per week. 2 one day per week. otherwise its nice. just needs a thicker top.

The only problem with it was it only stayed stable on the lowest level...I decided to replace it because it was looking old and worn from constant use and I'm sure glad I did! This new one is made so much better and it stays stable at the highest level.

will surprise you how easy it can be folded up, flat!!!! for easy storage holds well stands straight. I have bought this table in colrs now black, throughout the years several different times for many reasons, never fails to impress love, it, thank you 😊

Love them. So glad they are back after gone. i used to have some in varied colors just like these new black ones. My daughter, now grown up, has the old ones at her apartment. I am enjoying the new ones at my home. Well made. Last a long time.

reviews.title: Ticked all the boxes
reviews.review_text: This dandy little table served its purpose just fine. I needed to display a few flyers and brochures at a health fair where I was presenting. I needed this little table top to be light, easy to transport, easy to set up and take down, and very, very portable. It was all those things. And it looked good too.

This desk is just what I needed to work at home. I use the highest height when using my laptop while sitting on the couch. The top is more spacious than I expected, you can fit a laptop, remote, control, drinks etc on it. I also use it if I want to eat a meal in front of the TV. I find it easy to fold and put away if I need it it is really multifunctional. Glad I bought it.

reviews.title: Folding Table is perfect for my needs
reviews.review_text: I love the size of the table. Easy to use with its 3 height levels. It's working great as an eating table and a crafting table. It's durable but light. Second time buying this item, 1st one burned in a wildfire. So I'm a happy customer 2nd time around!!

I have bought three of these now. I am disabled and use them for chair side tables. Very strurdy and easy to clean. They are light weight and foldable making them easy to move if needed. The surface is large enough for a meal and medicine. I use one for a desk with a lamp attached.

reviews.title: Sturdy little table
reviews.review_text: I use these tables for side tables, computer desk, and for eating in front of the tv. They are very sturdy but lightweight. You don't have to worry about it toppling over like an ironing board, despite the similarities in appearance. I've bought 3 of these and I'll buy a couple more when they get back in stock.

reviews.title: Great choice on my part
reviews.review_text: This table is large enough for my crafts without taking up space around the house. It does everything from sit in front of my couch, next to my bed or just middle of room where I can pull up a chair. The surface is smooth enough to draw or paint on without issue and easy to wipe down or clean. I even use it as my computer stand when I need to and it's easy to take places when I travel. I do wish it went a bit higher though. Over all a great purchase. No regrets.

reviews.title: Perfect for Small Spaces and Versatile Use!
reviews.review_text: I purchased the Mainstays 26" Adjustable Height Personal Folding Table for use in my home office, and I couldn't be happier with it! The table is the perfect size for tight spaces, providing just enough surface area without taking up too much room. The adjustable height feature is a game changer – I can easily switch between sitting and standing positions, making it great for both work and leisure. The table is lightweight yet sturdy, and the folding mechanism makes it super convenient to store when not in use. I love the sleek black finish, which complements my décor nicely. It was easy to set up right out of the box, and I've used it for everything from paperwork to crafting. It's durable enough for daily use and can handle a variety of tasks. Overall, a fantastic value for the price, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a compact, adjustable, and multi-purpose table!
The product is exactly as described, the deliver was done by Superman. I ordered them in the morning and was using them at 3:00 pm. I did not expect to have Amazon like service. A-Ma-Zing!!
This tray is roomy and suitable for a variety of uses. I'll use the item as my go to work table as it's easy to transport around the house. This was a good buy.

reviews.title: BUY IT! DO IT! YOU WONT REGRET IT!
reviews.review_text: this is the perfect side table/tv table/desk. My 1st one lasted 5 years, with lots of daily use. I just bought my 2nd one, and i love it more, only because i like the color better
I love these. I bought 4 of them. You can set them to different heights, sturdy, One of them I bought is for our microwave, and we keep our air fryer on top of the microwave. Great table!

sturdy great for laptop and mouse use this is the second one i purchased first one has held up for 4 years not heat or scratch resistant same ware from use but will recommend to purchas one if i had to choose over wood or aluminum brands

reviews.title: Easily fold up
reviews.review_text: I love this table for work. It's not too small and just the right size to fit in a small corner but still has enough room to place multiple items. Not too heavy to carry. Easily folds up and placed in a convenient corner.

reviews.title: adjustable table
reviews.review_text: we have three of these tables in our house they are great because they have three different sizes once the table is set up so you can have a tall table or a very short table depending on whether you're sitting on a chair or the couch or the floor. the only downside is it is a very slippery table things slide off very easily

reviews.title: Favorite foldout
reviews.review_text: Favorite table. Other foldouts I’ve had were clunky and instantly showed any stain. I appreciate how think the table on this is, which makes it easy to fold and stow away, as well as easy to pick up and move around the room. The legs slope in on one side so my knees aren’t constantly bumping the frame. I got my first one as a hand me down from my dad, and I’ve repurchased since, only to get one that wasn’t scratched up. Both still work great. It’s a bummer you can’t order it online, but it was worth goin to a store for it.

reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to set up
reviews.review_text: The trays are easy to set up and take down. They are portable and easy to store when not in use. They are lightweight. The only negative thing is that the top scratches very, very easily. and one scratched, you can not buff it out or even sand it out...the scratch is permanent! I have six of thats now, and all of them have deep scrathes or gouges, ALL from jyst normal usage.

reviews.title: Durable, Convenient, Multi-functional mini table
reviews.review_text: I love this table. Easy to Assemble and Disassemble. Durable, Convenient, Compact and Multi-functional. I use it for computer work, portable writing desk, tv tray, and even small events to set up a mini table. Definitely recommend if you are looking for something that you can pull up to a chair, bed and/or anywhere you sit and need a quick and easy workspace.

reviews.title: Amazing Portable Table
reviews.review_text: I have 4 of these. They are just amazing for the price. They are sturdy, the height is adjustable, and they are a great size. They make a great portable desk for a laptop. They work as a TV tray, they work as a crafting table. I had to buy more because my cats love to lay on them. They lay on them next to my recliner like it's their kitty couch. I have a folded blanket on them. I still have my first one that I bought in 2019. It has a few scratches, that's the only sign of wear. It even held up my heavy gaming computer. Buy this!

reviews.title: Awesome trays
reviews.review_text: I bought this tray for an extension to my computer desk. I had plenty of room for my monitor, keyboard and mouse.....along with the TV remote, plus room left over. It's made well and is adjustable for height. The only problem I had was I couldn't put my feet under the table, which was uncomfortable for me. I will definitely keep these trays. They can be used for many things. They are very sturdy and well made. This is a super nice tray.

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: This is the only TV tree you'll ever need it just Heights, which is great when you wanna just eat off of it or if you want to use it as an end table, very durable durable this is the only TV tree you'll ever need it just Heights, which is great when you wanna just eat off of it or if you want to use it as an end table, very durable durable and steady

reviews.title: Great little tables!
reviews.review_text: I used 2 of these to help with being part of the backstage crew at a local playhouse. Worked out great. I clipped a book light on each one , and had enough space for needed items without getting in the way of the cast. Going to use them again for a future production for which I'm the stage manager.

reviews.title: Folding Work Table under $20! Excellent Deal!
reviews.review_text: This is perfect for a small laptop and cuppa tea for those working from home, or doing online school. It's a large surface and it is super sturdy. It will hold plenty of weight, maybe don't sit on it, but definitely your laptop, a plate of food, etc will hold up just fine. I also love that the height can go up or down. For under $20 this is a steal and I would highly recommend for those needing a folding work table.

reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
reviews.review_text: The folding table is very sturdy and can be used in so many different ways... it really comes in handy. I noticed one customer complained about legs being bent. This is not a defect, but a plus. The legs on one side are very slightly bent so as to allow for some knee room when it is used as table or desk. it is not detract from the functionality, that adds to it.

reviews.title: YES! WORTH THE MONEY! GO BUY IT
reviews.review_text: it fits my laptop, keyboard, computer mouse and pad, and has room for other things like placing a quick snack nearby if you cant leave your computer. it is adjustable in height and super cheap and light weight as well as durable! no need to buy a fancy $100 computer desk guys!! this is more than what you think! and it folds up for easy storage! even the photo sticker on the product showed a laptop sitting on it with extra room. i love this and may get 1 more just because it is such a great product for me!

reviews.title: Nice little sturdy side table for outdoors!
reviews.review_text: My husband and I bought this table to go between two outdoor chairs on the patio. It’s perfect for that space! I love that it’s adjustable in height as well. I never would’ve known this little table existed at Walmart, had it not been for the customer in front of us at the checkout in the garden center. He had it in his cart and at the last minute he decided to not buy it, so the cashier just set it next to his register. When we got to the cashier, I asked him how much the table was and it was affordable so I said I’ll take it! Now I’m buying one for my daughter and her husband’s porch to go between their two chairs.

reviews.title: Virtual School Must
reviews.review_text: Living in a relatively small home, we don’t have room for a full size desk however my children are older and don’t want to sit at our dining room table to do homework so we had to find a solution and this is it. This table is sturdy enough to hold a laptop without tipping or collapsing and is large enough to also hold a mouse, snack, water bottle, paper, pencil- whatever my son needs. At the end of the day it is easy to fold up and move out of the way. This table is extremely affordable and would be great for any area in your house, camping, outdoor use, etc. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.title: great foldable work table
reviews.review_text: this table is fairly sturdy (I wouldnt put all my weight on it or anything) it easily holds my full sized laptop with plenty of room to use my mouse and still has room behind to set my headset and a drink on it. its perfect for working at home when I need to. I like that I can fold it away when I dont need it to save space. I saw another review stating itwasn'tt level and this concerned me but I haven't had any issue with that. Mine was delivered in perfect condition as well. I'm very happy with this table overall.

reviews.title: Love these folding tables!
reviews.review_text: I actually ordered 2 of these %26 am so glad I did! They are perfect! 3 easy to adjust heights - 25", 26" %26 28". Lighter weight makes them really easy to set up, take down or move around (I am 77 so this is important to me). Yet when in use they are sturdy %26 steady with no worries about tipping. Ease of handling means convenient for me. Love these!

reviews.title: Useful and Affordable in a Pinch
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for something that is quick and easy to assemble to put your laptop, monitor, small desk or even lunch on, this is it. I would NOT recommend using it around large, playful sheepdogs or toddlers. The construction is a little wobbly. They will up-end everything!! You can collapse this unit rather easily. It will be great for camping.

THE ONLY REASON I TOOK AWAY A STAR is because of the design of the legs. Im not fond of how it criss crosses and causes me to have to place my feet while using it. But I dont use this desk all the time so I overlook that. Overall its worth the money and I was satisfied.

Long story short, I had just received it, I set it up then tripped and fell on top of this side table! Incredibly, it held me. Ive gained a lot of weight during my treatments and to my surprise it stopped me from falling on the pavement. So...money very well spent.

reviews.review_text: This table is exactly what I need next to my sewing table for cutting and pressing quilt block pieces. The height is easy to change. It is stable and has a large enough surface space. It was recommended by another person on an online quilter's group. Glad that I bought it!

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.review_text: This table is light weight and perfect for my needs. I like the adjustable height. It's also the perfect table top size for a laptop with room for a writing pad, or breakfast/lunch with room for my tablet.

reviews.title: Great table for home, camping etc
reviews.review_text: Sturdy, adjustable , easy to stand up and lightweight. We have one in our house for crafts etc and one in the rv to replace a miserably heavy awkward to set up table.

reviews.title: Veritable little table
reviews.review_text: I recently moved into a smaller apartment with no room for a kitchen table. This table is perfect for eating meals on, writing, or putting my laptop on, and for things I probably haven't thought of yet. It is light weight but sturdy and adjusts to three different heights. I really like it, and it will be very useful.

reviews.title: Portable Table
reviews.review_text: We purchased 2 of these tables for our grandchildren to use as portable desks. They have a very small space in which to do their homework and crafts. The tables are easy to set up and take down, and are adjustable. They can be taken from room to room, or even outside. Heavy items can be placed on them without fear of collapse. If you need an adjustable, portable, sturdy table, this is a good choice. We also sent one to my mother while she recuperated from knee replacement surgery. It made a convenient bedside table for her, and was easily moved by her caretakers.

reviews.title: really nice sturdy table
reviews.review_text: I purchased this table for my camper. It is light weight and folds easily for travel. It exceeded my expectations. I was able to move table all over camper depending on our needs at the time. So much better than heavy tables in camper that have to fit in fixed position. I plan to use outside for eating also. This table was plenty big enough for the three of us to eat and could have seated four. Love this table and would recommend to any one.

reviews.title: Great buy!
reviews.review_text: I purchased this table as a gift for a friend who travels in his motorhome and has a screen tent (also purchased at Walmart). My friend has no patience in assembling anything, so things have to be easy setup. This table fits the bill! The adjustable height is perfect for board games, or to use as a food table, or as an end table inside his screen tent. I can't wait 'til Christmas...he'll love it!

reviews.title: Great personal project table
reviews.review_text: This table is a good size project/work table. It folds up flat making it super easy to store. The 'ironing board' legs make it very accessible to wheelchairs etc., as well as the adjustable height positioning. It seems very durable, not likely to break. Neutral in color & easy to clean. However those with limited hand strength may have a problem with the 'squeeze trigger' mechanism for height adjustment. Confined to a chair, I had to fumble with it a bit before getting it set. But its fairly lightweight & the legs snap lock when its folded for storage. There are plastic end caps on the legs so they don't scratch the floor. After surgery & in a wheelchair I've used this in the kitchen as a prep table (when my boyfriend isn't using it for his model planes or other hobby work!)

reviews.title: Great little table
reviews.review_text: We bought this as a replacement for a broken keyboard stand for our 7 year old. So many of the tables are four feet and more in length, and we wanted something shorter. I was surprised at how durable it was, and how easily it set up. It has four settings for height, every two inches, so we were able to adjust it to be the perfect height for him. It also has the crossed legs offset so that you can place the table with the legs more to the back, allowing for more room for your legs and feet when you are sitting at it; a great feature. Lightweight, easy to clean, sturdy, and inexpensive; that's a deal!

reviews.title: Have 4 so far!
reviews.review_text: I have 3 of these tables for home use and purchased one for a friend already. Possibly will purchase 3 more for Christmas gifts. They are Great and Very Sturdy. I can fit 2 behind my loveseat against the wall comfortably for storage...if they are ever NOT in use... Mine are used for just about everything and seldom get to "rest" in storage. Be SURE you understand how to adjust the legs! Looks like the little bar should go on the outside BUT it does NOT! It goes INSIDE the tube -- you will see what I mean when you get your table. Be sure you are squeezing the handle the correct way. Done right -- it is easy to put up and down + adjust for one person.

reviews.title: Great Table
reviews.review_text: Just the right size for a working table. It is sturdy enough to use for a sewing table. It folds up for easy storing.The price is right and I would recommand it to anyone.

reviews.title: Great folding table
reviews.review_text: The way they have the legs farther away from one side makes it able to put closer to you & have space for your legs. Very sturdy.Love it .Has more space on top larger than most

reviews.title: Good table for grill
reviews.review_text: I have a small table top gas grill and I needed a small table to hold it. The grill sits high on legs so there is no problem with heat from the grill. I just had to add a raised edge on the back and sides to prevent the grill from falling off. This table fits my needs very well and was inexpensive.

reviews.title: great little table
reviews.review_text: The height adjustments are really nice. I bring it out and set it low as a couch or bed to provide a place for stuff a sick person needs at hand when suffering on a couch or in bed. On the other end, it can be set tall enough to match most desk heights. Only one complaint -- the surface does not work well with an optical mouse if you want to use it as a temporary computer table.

reviews.title: Great Lifetime Table
reviews.review_text: This 30" Lifetime Table is great. It is very durable, strong, it has a nice appearance. Easy to set up. I have a 26" Lifetime Table also, I use it for my laptop and other electronic gadgets. This is a excellent table to buy, you can trust the Lifetime products. I would recommend a Lifetime product. Get the Lifetime products through Walmart.com, excellent prices. Every home should have a Lifetime product.

reviews.title: Good table

It matches the other one in height so she has an extra long surface when she needs it. Not a complaint, but I just wish I could have got it in slate to match the other one.

reviews.title: Perfect table for my sewing machine!
reviews.review_text: Having down-sized to a small apartment and letting go of my sewing room, I found that trying to sew on my dining table was very uncomfortable. I realized I needed a small, sturdy, adjustable height table for those times I planned to do a bit of sewing. I saw a Lifetime table at a friend's home, and when she told me she'd purchased it at Walmart, I ordered one for myself. It is exactly what I needed, and now I can sew at the proper height without stressing my arms and shoulders.

reviews.title: Great Universal Table
reviews.review_text: I own one of these tables and wanted another. It is a very durable table with adjustments perfect for several uses. It is great for TV dinner table, hobby table, table for food preparation, or anything where a sturdy table is needed. At 1 1/2' thick, the collapsed table will store almost anywhere.

reviews.title: Perfect size for camper dinette.
reviews.review_text: Looked all over for a replacement smaller dinette table for our travel trailer. We have a "u" shaped dinette and table was just a touch too big that came with it for bigger people to be comfortable when sitting. This table is heavy duty and does the trick. Base to table is a little off center which serves to allow table to be used closer to wall. It's a little tricky to fold table at first.

reviews.title: Craft table
reviews.review_text: Great size table for anyone as it has adjustable height. It's perfect for teaching 3 young girls how to sew. They can't sit at the dining room table as their feet don't touch the floor and therefore can't use the sewing machine foot control. It is narrow enough that the vibration of the running machine doesn't cause the table to shake.

reviews.title: 30" portable table
reviews.review_text: I have had this table for two weeks now. It is great because it is 30" wide so I can put my 15" laptop plus mouse & pad on it comfortably. I can adjust the height for easy typing on my laptop and it is very sturdy and doesn't shake when typing. It is easy to put into my car and take with me. Don't even bother to try and find a different one. You will be very happy with this model.
I bought one several years ago. Ordered a newer one, it's great but not as beefy as the other one.
Table is great ! But, ... 3 days later WMT had an on-line price of $5 less... -:(

The Table is being used outside to Pot My Plants on. Anyway it IS A Great Little Table & I Love It!

Love the adjustable height and Lifetime quality. Bonus, I caught this on sale 10 less than the 26". It does fold slim, but is longer, so would eat room for trunk if no truck or RV. hope this helps someone.

reviews.title: Just Right
reviews.review_text: My wife had total ankle replacement and needs to spend weeks on her back or semi-reclined with her foot elevated. I purchased a Lifetime table to put in the living room beside the sofa on which she could keep her medications, reading material, water, etc. along with personal items so that they will be within easy reach. It works so well. It is adjustable in height and it is very sturdy and stable. I would certainly buy it all over again.

reviews.title: Satisfied
reviews.review_text: This is the second one of these tables that I have ordered from Walmart.com. They are perfect for what I needed them for. The price was good and shipping was done timely and I picked up at the store. Overall I am very satisfied with my online order, pick up at store experiences.

reviews.title: amazing service
reviews.review_text: I bot a 30" table many years ago. through multiple moves, the plastic feet had been lost off two of the legs, making the table wobbly. I contacted customer service to find out if they could be purchased, and after sending a picture of the tag underneath the table to identify it correcting, Vendla, my customer service contact had a new set sent out to me as warranty service. I'm floored that a company is trying to make their already great products even better with equally great customer service. Bravo!

reviews.title: a great size for my needs
reviews.review_text: I alreaady have the same table that i bought quite awile agol I dont remember where i bought it. I use it as a table that guests can put their suit cases on when thet visit and it folds away until needed......I was sorry that i could not find it at any store that sells your product.

reviews.title: A table for quilting help.
reviews.review_text: I join friends for quilt retreats and see some with a table next to their sewing machine. They just sew and turn and iron. I saw some had this table...light weight, practical, flexible height adjustment and success...pure ease of a woman's working area. I read several reviews indicating a challenge opening and adjusting height. I did not find that to be the case. This table works for my practical needs and doesn't take over my life. I use a wool pad for the iron cover top but probably anything is ok. Sturdy and easy to carry. Arrived in good shape and ready for use.

reviews.title: Great Customer Service
reviews.review_text: We bought this table over fifteen years ago. We loaned it to a friend and it came back to us missing one of the brackets that hold the legs up when retracted. I looked at the web sight for the part number and it was not listed. I Emailed Customer Support asking for the part number so I could order one. The next day I received a response telling me that they would send me the parts for free. I sent them the necessary shipping information and within a week I received not one but two brackets.

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.review_text: Really love this table. Bought it for my husband who spends much of his day in a wheelchair and was having trouble eating from a TV table since it wasn't quite high enough. This table has an extra couple of inches in height which make all the difference and it is much more sturdy. We also like the larger size since it makes it much easier for him to read his paper in the morning. Very glad we bought this table.

reviews.title: Loooovvveee this table!!!
reviews.review_text: Bought this to add to the collection of Lifetime products we already have and love it! We know it's great quality and love how it's the perfect size for small projects when you need a table but don't have a lot of room. We will definitely get a lot of use out of this one.

reviews.title: Great Customer Service
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I somehow was missing some clips that hold the legs in place when you fold up the rectangular table. I've had the tables for many years and love them. I called customer service to see if they could send me a few clips and they came to me immediately by mail! This saved lots of pinched fingers! I'm a big fan of Lifetime products and how the company stands behind them 100%. I've recommended Lifetime to all my friends. Thx.

reviews.title: replacment parts
reviews.review_text: after repeated use the clips to hold the legs just wouldn't keep the legs locked in place when I tried to store the table. Had to tie them together. Contacted Lifetime via the web/chat and viola--I have new clips and the legs stay in place. Love this table even more!

reviews.title: Great For Hunting
reviews.review_text: Portable table that is easy to carry and set up in a hunting blind. I used it to prop up a cross bow on some shooting bags so my 5-yr old grandson can shoot a pig. The table is easy to set up, small enough to fit In a comfortable blind, and sturdy enough to ensure a stable shot. I'll probably buy a couple more for around the home.

reviews.title: Wonderful Table
reviews.review_text: My Lifetime Personal Table is one of the best investments I've made to enhance my sewing/quilting hobby. It's light weight yet sturdy, the adjustable feature is awesome, you never know what type of chair you'll have when you go to Sit n Sew or retreats. I highly recommend you add one to your line up of sewing / crafting lineup.

reviews.title: perfect size
reviews.review_text: This is an awesome table. Perfect heights for laptop or sewing machine. Fits great in a bedroom and would purchase this or recommend it over and over. Had the 6: banquet table but just too big for where I needed it. Might even consider it in the living room to use as food table. Adjustable legs make it convenient.

reviews.title: Love this Table so Much I got a Second ONE!
reviews.review_text: This is my second table. My daughter confiscated my first one. It works great for her schoolwork by her easy chair in her room. I missed it greatly, so just bought this one for myself (Again). Love, love this table. It is so easy to collapse and move. Light weight enough to move easily, but very sturdy when I want to put my 32" monitor and laptop on it to do some extra work. It is fabulous for working on crafts from my chair in front room while hubby is watching TV and doesn't want to "be by himself".

reviews.title: Good Sized and Sturdy
reviews.review_text: This is a sturdy plastic folding table. That's really the big headline. I will also say that it's not cheap-feeling, relatively easy to set up and take down, and doesn't wobble too much once up. I know that some other tables don't actually meet those same criteria I mentioned, so I'd say this one is well worth what I paid for it.

the table was perfect for my diamond art and is easy to put up when im finished. its not to big or too small. there are many other uses around the house it can serve as a TV tray for extra people at dinner time as well as snack tray for great grand kids

reviews.review_text: This is my second one. We do small jeweler shows and needed portable tables. This table is ideal for all occasions and heights. Portable and height adjustable. Storage friendly the way the legs fold And lock.

reviews.title: Employees won't go out in rain

Now, who would get hit by lightening?!!!! I had to get another customer coming out to load my dirt! I hurt my hand trying to do this and I was charged a pick up/load fee? Refund that fee because they did not do the JOB! I DID!!!!!

reviews.title: Bad experience!!

I contact Walmart customer service immediately and they help me with the return, but to be honest I should’ve to deal with it driving it wasting my time and gas money when it wasn’t my fault. reviews.title: Where is the quality control?

reviews.review_text: The first one I ordered arrived damaged bc it was shipped in a box too small and the outer edge was exposed and scraped. I waited and finally ordered it bc no way it would be damaged a third time, but it arrived today and the finish is peeling at the top and the black rubber-ey resin exposed. Every once in a while I order from Walmart and then remember why I stopped. It's not that bad, but I can only imagine that it will worsen upon exposure to the elements since advertised as a weather resistant planter.

reviews.title: Works better and easier
reviews.review_text: I have never seen anything that works better or easier than this. The trick is to apply a thin layer slowly with total coverage and let it sit several minutes before gently scrubbing. It works great and leaves the bowl sparkling clean. If ring stains are old and set it may take a second direct application and a little more scrubbing. It also works well on sink and tub residue.

reviews.title: Still Like The Contents, New Nozzle SUX
reviews.review_text: I have removed one star because they folks at Clorox decided to "improve" something that was working fine, and now it doesn't work well at all. The old nozzle always had a small round opening through which the product dispensed. The harder you squeezed the bottle, the farther the product launched so it was easy to get it up under the rim during the application. The new nozzle has a longer, slit-style opening for "wider application". In theory, this sounds like it could be a good idea. The reality is that this opening is simply too large to get the product to project from the bottle- regardless how hard I squeeze. It just globs out and falls straight down. Didn't anyone test this idea prior to putting it into production?? I ended up having to manually spread the cleaning gel around inside the bowl with my brush. This means having to clean the brush after each application, apply to the next toilet, wash the brush, apply to the next toilet... After they all have cleaner in them, then I go back where I started and scrub each of the bowls and rinsing the brush AGAIN before moving on to the next. When this is gone, I will not buy again unless I find it is bottled with the old cap. It's a shame too because I actually prefer the product inside over the competition's.

I seem to have trouble after I start using this product. It seems like my surface thereafter has to be cleaned constantly to keep red mildew from growing. Its happened in three houses. It does clean the surface but I have to stop buying it and find something better.

reviews.review_text: I love this lightweight jacket! The pink color is gorgeous, and the fabric is stretchy and great quality. However, I purchased this in a large in case I wanted to wear it over a thick top or light sweatshirt. The fit is perfect!

reviews.title: A great casual or workout jacket!
reviews.review_text: This this zip up jacket is very comfortable! It's great to use if going on a walk on a cool spring day or to use at my workplace. I like the variety of colors available. I have bought three different ones. And I look forward to buying some more colors when available in the future.
Jacket was perfect for my wife. Just what she needed to bring on our Europe trip this summer. Great quality and great price.

reviews.title: Comfort and warmth
reviews.review_text: Love these for indoor and outdoor use. Light enough to wear inside if chilled and warm enough to wear outside on a chilly morning. The colors are vibrant .

Excellent jacket, light weight, very comfortable, gorgeous color. In addition to the two hand pockets, it has two inside pockets that are great for carrying a cellphone %26 wallet. well thoughtout design, this is my 3rd jacket, love them.
Love it ! I use it for work in the hospital and it's perfect with so many pockets stylish and keeps me warm, I bought one for my daughter that just started high school and she loves it !
Definitely need to use the size chart. I ordered the jacket in a much larger size than I normally wear. It fits perfect. I wear it to work and it's a beautiful color.

reviews.title: Must buy!
reviews.review_text: Love It!! It fits really well and looks really nice on me. I have the blue and black. Wish they had bubble gum pink and blood red. I would definitely get it!

love the comfort plus the higher quality good looks of Avia active wear. Actually in my case everyday,, all occasion options mostly black and size small . I got size M this time and the fit is perfect better size up.
This is one of my favorite clothing buys, as big as Calvin was to jeans( in my opinion) and the fit is perfect for any woman that likes style and fit to be simple but Makes You Feel Fabulous!!!

reviews.title: AMAZING ZIP UP JACKETS! SIZE UP
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this zip up jacket. I purchased the Pink Melon and Black. I love the quality the material the comfort the style and the price point is not bad either. Glad I purchased two of these jackets. They are lightweight but at the same time they do block out wind and cold. I did size up I'm usually between large and extra-large but I did get a XX. From my personal experience my suggestion would be to size up.

The quality of the product is very good but the availability isn't very great. Often times when I try to look for my appropriate size they don't have it in stock or in stores. It took me months just to find one of these jackets in black after going to multiple Walmarts. The jacket is pretty pricey but is a great alternative to other high end brands like Lululemon, alo and other yoga brands. Overall I would buy another set in a different color or style any day!! Thank you Walmart!!

reviews.title: Avia brand is hard to beat in athleisure styles!
reviews.review_text: The quality and fit of this athleisure jacket was outstanding. I find that the Avia brand fit is consistent and the fabrics shape you perfectly, whether you are curvy or more of an athletic build. I highly recommend. For reference, I wear an 18/XL in bottoms and a 16/18 in most tops.

This jacket covers the rump area. Cute comfortable and the color is gorgeous. I'm going to be pretty in pink. I purchased the pants to go with jacket. You can't go wrong. Just purchased 2 more colors. Perfect year round, especially in warmer climates! Go ahead ladies make that purchase. Great color for breast cancer survivors!!!

reviews.title: Amazing.
reviews.review_text: I got an xs in both top and bottom and the bottom fit really snug. If it helps I'm a 0 in American eagle jeans. Although the top still looks the slightest bit big and I am a medium in shirts depending on the brand. it's not bad and they are amazing quality and they feel butter soft! I recommend.

reviews.title: Cute But Snug Fit
reviews.review_text: Like every other piece of women's athletic wear, sizing runs small and I purchased this a size larger. Still it's a snugger fit than I prefer, but going up two sizes would be like wearing a potato sack. The material, cut and color are great but I'm going to keep banging on about the sizing issues with women's athletic wear till the retailers and manufacturers address the issue. I honestly never know what to expect with fitness wear and sizing!

reviews.title: Don't wait BUY IT!
reviews.review_text: This looks expensive and fits amazingly. I love the material and quality and would certainly recommend over the top name brands for the affordable price! I'll be buying more colors. True to size %26 I would have got an XL for more fitted look but this is perfect!

reviews.title: Highly recommend
reviews.review_text: I'm super picky and had only purchased kids' clothes from Walmart, but I saw these and loved the colors, so I tried it. They're great! A good length, good sleeve length, thumb holes, zipped pockets, and a collar. And the material is soft and stretchy, so form fitting. I purchased in green, khaki, and purple. Wish I'd also gotten the black. I would highly recommend!

The product seems great, but there was not adequate information for me to determine my size, it was not the right size. Quality was great, I had hoped to buy 3 different colors - instead I think I'll order from Target.

reviews.title: Cute and comfy jacket
reviews.review_text: This is a comfortable fit. For a medium it's a bit loose. I always go for medium and they're tighter in the body. I don't mind this to be comfortable.

reviews.title: Avia jacket
reviews.review_text: These jackets by Avia are wonderful! I have them in many colors %26 have given several as gifts. They are perfect for layering in the changing weather too! I am very sad Walmart is no longer carrying them 😩 Bring them back !!!!!

I have previously bought 2 of these in different colors, and I loved them! Saw this color and had to purchase. Opened box and pulled out jacket...it had a big atain on tge back side. I will be returning it. Disappointed. How could the packers have missed it?

reviews.title: Very comfortable!
reviews.review_text: I found this product to be very comfortable! I was intrigued because someone compared it to Lululemon. I couldn't see myself paying the price that they charge, but if this is an indication of the comfort of that brand, I would consider investing in it in the future. I am very happy with my purchase.

Great quality and form fitting. As another reviewer said its definitely a Lula dupe without the high price tag. I wish they had other colors available online cause Id get them all. Runs slightly small. If you like a compressed fit then go to your normal size. If you like it looser go up 1 size.

These jackets make me look snatched! I love the colors. These are honestly identical to lululemon but the best part is they don't break the bank. I already have so many colors and would definitely purchase more. I usually wear a large in these type or jackets but there's so much stretch that I was able to fit a small.

reviews.title: Comfort and Fit for the price!
reviews.review_text: Comfort and fit are great. Fabric content is easy to launder, and keeps its color, size, and shape. As long as the zipper pulls don't start showing wear from wash and dry, this should be good. (They are a color matching cover, so paint should not chip or look beat up.)

reviews.title: My fav
reviews.review_text: Oh my goodness! This is my favorite zip up. I have one of every color. I love running so this is my go to and I tuck my thumb in the thumb hole. Which I feel like it makes me run faster ha ha!!! I got a size small for a nice tight fit, but it wasn't too tight. It was perfect.

reviews.title: Great comfy jackets
reviews.review_text: I have several of these jackets in various colors, and they hold up extremely well, wash and dry without problems, and are well-made with all seams nicely finished off. I wish the zipper had a longer pull tab, but I can add that. I like the flattering shape of them and the weight and stretch is perfect, and the fabric is very soft. I have bright blue, pink, lilac, and black. I think they run true to size. I hope walmart keeps re-stocking these.

reviews.title: Travel jacket
reviews.review_text: Bought this for a recent trip to CA. Perfect weight for wearing on airplane. Wore in CA while visiting several vineyards with the weather being very windy and chilly. This jacket was the perfect weight keeping me very comfortable, but not bulky. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Well Made
reviews.review_text: Well made. A little shorter length wise than I like, but overall a fantastic piece. I picked up something similar at TJ Maxx and the zipper broke within a couple of days. I have both the black and gray/beige of this jacket and they are holding up better than I anticipated.

reviews.title: Great fit for longer torso %26 tall female!
reviews.review_text: Wonderful fabric!! Very soft, sleek and fitted - the sleeves are a great length for taller women with longer arms! I am 5'9”, 36D, 29” waist %26 175lb and got a Large. It is fitted but with enough room to wear a long sleeve tee in colder months (TX). It's being embroidered for my company and I was told the fabric is perfect for it…will update with photos when finished! I LOVE THIS JACKET. It's been hard for me to find the right fit for my longer torso :)
absolutely love this bought it in 5 different colors tried for more but they were sold out patiently waiting for news they are back in stock
I fell in love with this jacket! I love the fit and the awesome color! I purchased 3 of them! I wanted to make sure I always have one!
The fit is perfect! Love the color and quality. Buying another color as soon as I finish this review!!
Cute, lightweight jacket that I'm planning to take on my summer travels! Great blue color. TTS. Better than expected quality!

reviews.title: 10/10 DUPE!!!!
reviews.review_text: Dupe for the name brand! Very good quality I'm ordering the other colors as well! Light-medium weight perfect for spring.
I have one like that already but in pink color, so I ordered in black and I totally love it. It fits perfectly
The product was very fresh And at a very good price I have this in three colors and absolutely love it.

reviews.title: Super cute and great quality
reviews.review_text: Super cute and great quality. The color is a muted green which is perfect for transitioning into fall also. Buy the jacket you won't regret it.

reviews.title: A total grab!!!!
reviews.review_text: I've purchased this item six years ago x 3 and the updated version is just as wonderful and comfortable. I'm actually about order some more colors. Totally satisfied with this product.

reviews.title: Runs small
reviews.review_text: I was brokenhearted this felt so good and snuggly but ran small. This was a total disappointment.!!! I needed to upsize. I weigh 132 lbs and a xl was to tight

reviews.title: This jacket🤌🏼😍
reviews.review_text: Material is as good as high end. Lulu dupe for sure. Bought in two different colors. Wish I would have bought all of the colors.Absolutely love my jacket!!!! 😍

reviews.title: Love love love
reviews.review_text: I love this jacket so much that I bought it in 2 colors. I get a lot of use out of both of them. Even though it's a fitted jacket, it doesn't feel tight when you wear it.

reviews.title: Soft, warm, stylish and cheap.
reviews.review_text: Love this hoodie. Very soft and warm. The price is very good. I wanted to by one more of another color, but they were already sold out in all stores and online.

reviews.title: Highly Recommend
reviews.review_text: These are my favorite shirts to workout in. They are very comfortable and breathable. Material is thick and very good quality. I have bought in all colors I could find.

reviews.title: Great buy
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice work out jacket for the money! My niece actually thought is was from high end store. I think it runs true to size. I am really busty so I bought a size up and it looks great.

reviews.title: Avia pink hacket
reviews.review_text: I love this jacket! It fits great and is soft. The color is great for Spring but I managed to get it for a clearance price! Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.title: Perfect for chilly morning walks
reviews.review_text: This jacket is coparable to a name brand one. The fit it more loose which i love! If you rather have it be super form fitting then id suggest sizing down 2 sizes. Im 150lbs and got a size M and its a loose fit. Perfect for those chilly mornings.
I Love this Zip up Jacket with pockets and thumb holes It's comparable to the LuLu Lemon Brand If you don't want it skin tight then go up 1 size from your regular size

reviews.title: The best athletic jacket
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love these I got 3 colors and still want more if that says enough. I hope they keep making these!!!
Sweater was soft and pretty, but sent it back because it was too small sweater was soft and pretty, but sent it back because it was too small

reviews.title: Great jacket
reviews.review_text: Love this jacket! I had it in black for a few years. Just bought it in the beige color. Very comfortable. I love the way it fits.

reviews.title: GREAT value and GREAT product!!
reviews.review_text: BEAUTIFUL rich color and some of the best quality I've seen. I LOVE it and already bought in 3 colors!!

reviews.title: Perfect jacket
reviews.review_text: This jacket is very comfortable and is a good match for many of my tee shirts. It fits well and I have had MANY compliments on it.
i love tjis jacket, I wear them for work and they hold up and are made so nicely fornthe price pount its an A!

reviews.title: Great jacket
reviews.review_text: I have 2 of these jackets. Black and green. I love them. Attractive fit, washes well,nice fabric. Wear them all the time. I get compliments when I wear them

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: Wow, just received this after seeing a video review from a blogger. It is really nice!!! Can't wait to actually wear it. I hope it wears well and washes well.

reviews.title: Love this jacket.
reviews.review_text: I love these jackets! They fit so well and look very feminine. I like it so much I bought two more. Side note - they run large, so buy the next size down.

reviews.title: Luv it
reviews.review_text: I'm not usually a jacket kind of person. Got the green one from the store to take on a trip and loved it. Bought the black one online. Very comfortable fit and fabric

The quality and comfort from this jackets is comparable to Lululemon. Super cute looks options. For sizing, I tend to be a large but I could still sit in XS comfortly for a more smug and compressed feel.

reviews.title: Why buy lululemon??
reviews.review_text: I have two of these jackets — they're great quality and look great on me. The blue color is gorgeous. I don't get why people buy lululemon when you can have something like this for $20.

reviews.title: Great Jacket
reviews.review_text: These jackets are very nice - good length and nice fabric. Wish I would have bought another color (or 2)! I could have worn a small, but prefer medium. Size up, unless you like it very fitted. Hope they restock these soon!

reviews.title: Comfy for any occasion
reviews.review_text: I usually wear small/medium t shirt. I bought XS in this jacket and fits perfectly. I love how soft it is, and sleek design. I also love that the pockets zip to secure my things.

reviews.title: Love this zip up. Great quality.
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite long sleeve zip up to wear at work. It's a thick and soft material. It's also perfect for spring and fall. In the winter I wear it under a sweatshirt.

reviews.title: Just get it!
reviews.review_text: TikTok brought me here and it is just as soft as described. For my more chesty girls, no pulling near the zipper and I'm a DDD. Get it with some pants for a cute ‘running errands' set

This Avia jacket is very similar to an athleta style jacket that is four times the cost. The Avia is sleek looking, comfortable and well made. It does run a bit small as I usually wear a medium but purchased a large.

reviews.title: Awesome jacket.
reviews.review_text: This is an awesome jacket. Super comfortable and nice fitting. The material is soft and stretchy. Highly recommend!!! Love it and the price if great!!! I bought 3 different colors.

Fits true to size. I usually wear mediums and got a medium. So soft and excellent quality. Love so much that I bought 2 of them. Lightweight but material doesn't feel cheap or thin. Very good dupe to the more expensive brands!

reviews.title: Love these Avia jackets
reviews.review_text: I love these Avia Jackets! Every fall I buy at least three not because the jacket has worn out but to match my new legging. These jackets do not bind when fully zipped, the jacket does keep you warm on those early cool fall mornings. The jackets are easy care you can wash the jacket in the washing machine but don't place the jacket in the dryer the heat of the dryer will break down the moisture wicking material.

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.review_text: Very nice jacket. Material is very soft and colors are nice. I originally bought 2 in size medium as I wear a size 10 in dress and pants and medium in shirts however it fit too snug for my liking when zipped up. I ordered 2 more in a large and it fits better around my torso but the sleeves are a bit looser than I like. I decided to keep the size large items.

reviews.title: Track suit
reviews.review_text: I i absolutely love this tracksuit. I have the jacket top and pants. It's very comfortable and I get a lot of compliments when I wear it. People can't believe I got it from Walmart. Too bad there aren't any more left to purchase. I would get more. They went fast. I absolutely love this tracksuit. I have the jacket top and pants. It's very comfortable and I get a lot of compliments when I wear it. People can't believe I got it from Walmart. Too bad there aren't any more left to purchase. I would get more. They went fast.

reviews.title: Great Value
reviews.review_text: Very comfortable and soft this is my second jacket from this brand. Same style, different color. Usually a size 3x/2x but ordered an XL for a more fitted look. I'm 280lb and my chest is 51in and waist 43in. Will hopefully be buying more in he future!

I really love the Avia brand, but this was a disappointment, it runs small, I normally wear a small, but this was very form fitting. I really wish Avia would make athletic jackets without those crazy hand holes in the sleeves, so hard to find any athletic jackets without them now fays.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.review_text: This jacket is perfect. Good quality, vibrant colors, slim fitting. I prefer to wear this as a top rather than layered, so I got the small. I'm 5'2”, 138 lbs, 34HH. The arms are slim fitting and not too long. I like the thumb holes too. Bought in all the colors. Please don't stop making this style. It's a great value.

reviews.title: Absolutely love this
reviews.review_text: There is nothing to not like abt this jacket. It's very well made, super soft, and fits great. I only wish it came in more colors. (The photo is pretty accurate--It's what I wld call a dusty rose.) For reference, I'm 5'9" and typically wear an 8 or 10. I cld hv worn a L but like jackets a little loose so kept the XL.

reviews.title: love it!
reviews.review_text: size up such good quality material already ordering more

reviews.title: Love jacket
reviews.review_text: Love this jacket. Please bring out some new colors.

reviews.title: Love this!
reviews.review_text: Love this! Great dupe! Great quality! Will buy more colors if they restock!

reviews.title: Cute warmup
reviews.review_text: Love the bright pink color. Fits great, looks great!
i have fallen in love with avia products. The material is so soft and worthy of its quality.

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.review_text: Nice colors and quality construction. I bought blue, pink and black.
The size runs a bit small this is a xxxl and I'm usually a 1 x

reviews.title: Buy the jacket.
reviews.review_text: Great fit, excellent quality. I bought several to wear with my scrubs at work.
This is second one I bought. Love the feel. Fits great!

love color. fits great. puchased in 3 colors soft but breathable

I love the fabric the quality is good just a little thin however great for Louisiana weather iyt doesn't get cold for long

reviews.review_text: I bought this jacket to replace one that I've had for years that was a danskin. Love the jacket Love the leggings they make.

reviews.review_text: great colors, fabric soft and stretchy, sleeves long enough, got xl, i am 5'10" , bought 6 of them for the price of one similar expensive brand

reviews.review_text: My new favorite light weight jacket. I wear it as a lab coat to the hospital . It's lightweight and stylish and pairs great with my scrubs

reviews.title: Great active wear

reviews.review_text: I love these jackets! They are perfect for throwing on over a shirt or for the gym! I have about 6 of them now! Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Nice color and comfy
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It's tight fitting and comfortable and it has thumb holes. I would recommend this.

reviews.title: Sixty %26 Sexy
reviews.review_text: Avis is an excellent brand, it's standing tall up to some of its competitors, I brought three different colors sets!

reviews.title: workout full zipper jacket
reviews.review_text: I bought it in black, of course safe color. Love the comfort and fit so much I ordered it in the periwinkle. Now I want the pink too!
Because the first one I ordered my expectations weren't that high however once received I was very satisfied.

The jacket fits perfectly, the material was of high quality, perfect stitching, and the color matched the photo

reviews.title: Great fit! Stylish
reviews.review_text: This is a great jacket dupe for a much more expensive line. I ordered 2! 5”7 130 pounds the small worked great. I wanted a more fitted.

reviews.title: Best Jacket Ever!
reviews.review_text: I love this jacket. It is light weight and fits great. I bought several of them. The price was also great.
I really like the jackets. I have been looking for jackets in this type of material for a while. Overall price was not too bad.

reviews.title: Buy multiple colors!
reviews.review_text: I loved it so much I bought multiple colors. Sadly the dark green ran large. The rest were perfect! I have 3 and my mom has 2!
The quality of the item is amazing especially for the price point of it. It's very comfortable and well made.

reviews.title: Good quality
reviews.review_text: I got a ton of compliments when wearing this. I sized down for a more fitted look and it was perfect. Going to get this in other colors!

reviews.title: I'll pass

This is a jacket that is very comfortable and nice for light warmth. This is a jacket that is very comfortable and nice for light warmth.

reviews.title: Cute Jackets
reviews.review_text: These jackets are sooo soft and everyone thought I was wearing lululemon. Very cute and effective at keeping you warm.
1st time to order with Walmart; very easy and great to locate via the Walmart app when searching for size and color.

reviews.title: My fav
reviews.review_text: My favorite zip up to wear when I go running! I have every color. I purchased a size small, which fits me great, not too tight not too loose.

reviews.title: Thicker than expected, well made
reviews.review_text: This seems really well made! It is thicker than I would have expected and the appliqués seem well stuck on. It seems like it might be a tiny bit big for my son but we can layer and he can grow into it. This seems a great quality piece for the price. The inside is soft but not fleeced. It has buttons that work easily, no zipper. I would buy this in other designs also, it's a great fall/spring jacket and seems like it would repel rain

reviews.title: Awesome jacket!
reviews.review_text: My son absolutely loves this little jacket! It's not too thick, not too thin. He wears 3t so that's what I purchased but it does run a little big. He'll just get to wear it a little longer. Can't wait for him to wear it when it gets a little cold outside.

reviews.title: The Cutest Character Jacket EVER!!!
reviews.review_text: My 3 year old is obsessed with his new Spider-Man jacket. He loves any and everything Spider-Man so I knew he would be so excited to get it. We got a size 4T and it is perfect. I prefer brand new clothing to be just a slight bit on the bigger side just so he has room to grow and more time to wear it. I honestly think this was perfect. A 4T is his true size and it did run just a little bigger but I believe the makers may have had the same thing in mind because it isn't so big that he can't wear it right away. The material is top notch and the jacket overall is a really great quality. The embroidered patches all over make this jacket really pop. The price is too good to be true in my opinion so to me this one is a no brainer.

reviews.title: Looking good in my bomber jacket
reviews.review_text: Love this jacket. It is very soft, super trendy and perfect for my little guy. He felt like such a cool dude in it. It appears to be very well made. Characters are crisp and cute. Quality is top notch. I ordered a 2T for my 18 month old and it will be just right come fall. Not much negative to say about this coat! It's pretty awesome! Might get in another color (I also saw Spider-Man)!

reviews.title: It looks great on my son and he loves it !
reviews.review_text: This jacket is perfect for the cooler mornings and evenings in the transition of the seasons or for layering in the fall and spring .My son is in the chunky side and tall but it fit him perfectly like it was made for him.He is a big 3 year old and fits awkwardly in size 6 usually but it's obvious it's taller . He opened the package and screamed with joy and said thank you mom I love it and won't take it off because he loves it .Boys clothes usually don't excite them or make them feel good so it was nice moment for us to see.Looks like it will hold up to a lot of wear and he looks so comfortable in it .The only thing they can't button it up themselves it's the hard snap buttons .

reviews.title: Very cute jacket to toddlers!
reviews.review_text: This is a super cute SpiderMan jack for toddler boys. I ordered my twenty month old son a 2T and it fit him perfectly. He usually wears a 2T/3T but I felt sizing down on this would be best. He loved it. He was jumping around yelling spidey while wearing it. It has a lot of really cute details on it and is perfect for a SpiderMan lover. The sleeve even has some cute designs on it!

reviews.title: Big kid looks for the little ones
reviews.review_text: My toddler is obsessed with “pider man” lately, so when I saw this jacket I showed him and he said he had to have it! Even though we live in Florida, this jacket will come in handy this fall/winter, and I bought it a size larger (we tried the 4T) than he currently is (90th percentile 3 year old usually wears a 3T) so he can wear it next year too. It fits him just baggy enough to work as an outer layer when we travel up north this winter as well. The material is soft and thick without being heavy. The graphics are a mix of color dtf and sewn on patches and direct embroidery. He will look so cool!

reviews.title: “Awesome” thin character jacket for fall
reviews.review_text: Cute character bomber jacket for toddlers! My son saw this and had to have it - anything with spidey on it is always a hit but he also thought the jacket looked “pretty cool, Mom” and that's a win for me too. Definitely not a thick jacket, but will work for us this fall. My son occasionally wears a 5T and is outgrowing toddler sizes fast, but this one fits true to size and he's finally excited to wear a jacket.

reviews.title: Not at all a Jacket
reviews.review_text: I got the item and it is not at all what I ordered.. item description is a jacket and I received a two piece jogger set. Talk about false advertising. It's a cute set however it is not the item on the jacket.

reviews.title: They charged more than what it was originally
reviews.review_text: They had it on “sale” for 15.00 when it came the Walmart tag had originally 13.99. Scamming people on the price by raising it and then acting like it's on sale when they are actually charging you more than it's supposed to be sold for is crazy.

reviews.title: Walmart purchaser beware
reviews.review_text: I wouldn't know. I ordered Mickey 4t and was sent spidey18 mo. Sent back and asked for correction item. Can't find a human to talk to but they cancelled the order as out of stock and card charge had to be disputed.
Cars is my grandson's favorite. I was able to get him this jacket and I didn't have to “fight” the crowd especially with the rebranding of our local store.

reviews.title: Great cool weather jacket for a Spidey lover
reviews.review_text: I ordered this jacket for my son in a 5T. He is four years old, but is a bit tall for his age and is typically wearing 5T clothing. My first impression of the jacket is that it's not as good of quality as I was expecting, but it is good for the price. My son says the jacket is comfortable And he likes all the cool Spider-Man designs all over. I think this is going to be one he really likes to wear once the weather cools off. It's not a very thick jacket, so it will definitely be more for the fall.

reviews.title: Beautiful Red Bomber Jacket
reviews.review_text: This is a very cute fleece jacket for toddlers. There are many different characters that you can choose from but they are all made for boys. The fabric of the jacket is so soft and it is perfect for those windy days when you're out walking or waiting at the bus stop. I love the bright red color of the Llightning McQueen crew jacket. I love the larger image on the back. this jacket is a 3T and fits well.

reviews.title: Cute and quality is good for the price.
reviews.review_text: It looks so cute on my toddler and quality is good for the price. I gave it 4 stars because one of the patches on the front was upside down. Not sure if it's on purpose but it's right side up on the model picture. Still waiting for the item replacement.

reviews.title: Adorable and surprisingly, very inexpensive!
reviews.review_text: Adorable. I was shocked it was only $12.98. I couldn't get it in store, in his size, or online at first. I just kept checking online until they became available. Definitely worth the money. I'm anticipating that my grandson will love it! May be the best $13 I've spent in a long while.

reviews.title: LMQ fans
reviews.review_text: I loved the look of these, and I had checked for months for these to come back in stock. My son and his two besties are big LMQ fans—got this for all the boys for Christmas this year! They were so excited, all three wore them immediately to school the next day 🤣

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I'm pretty sure it doesn't get any cuter than this! Are you kidding me?! A Mickey Mouse varsity jacket for a little human?! I was impressed with the quality of the whole thing overall. The stitching and lettering is great. The graphics are adorable. The front and back both have stuff on it. The color scheme is very retro and true to a varsity jacket which I like. The buttons make it easy to keep open or wear closed. It washed up really well. This is their (actually my) favorite jacket. I can't get over it. Oh, and this is definitely unisex. It can be worn by boy or girl.

The fabric quality is impressive—it's soft yet durable, making it perfect for active toddlers.
